tika-abh06t:5: Vanditvā sirasā buddhaṃ, dhammaṃ sādhugaṇampi ca.
tika-abh06t:29: Tattha cittanti visayavijānanaṃ cittaṃ, tassa pana ko vacanattho? Vuccate – sabbasaṅgāhakavasena pana cintetīti cittaṃ, attasantānaṃ vā cinotītipi cittaṃ.
tika-abh06t:34: Taṃ pana sārammaṇato ekavidhaṃ, savipākāvipākato duvidhaṃ. Tattha savipākaṃ nāma kusalākusalaṃ, avipākaṃ abyākataṃ. Kusalākusalābyākatajātibhedato tividhaṃ.
tika-abh06t:42_1: Vajjapaṭipakkhattā anavajjalakkhaṇaṃ vā kusalaṃ, vodānabhāvarasaṃ, iṭṭhavipākapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh06t:43: Tattha kusalacittaṃ ekavīsatividhaṃ hoti, tadidaṃ bhūmito catubbidhaṃ hoti – kāmāvacaraṃ, rūpāvacaraṃ, arūpāvacaraṃ, lokuttarañceti.
tika-abh06t:44_0: Tattha kāmāvacarakusalacittaṃ bhūmito ekavidhaṃ, savatthukāvatthukabhedato duvidhaṃ,
tika-abh06t:44_2: hoti. Seyyathidaṃ – somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikamekaṃ, sasaṅkhārikamekaṃ,
tika-abh06t:44_5: asaṅkhārikamekaṃ, sasaṅkhārikamekanti idaṃ aṭṭhavidhampi kāmāvacarakusalacittaṃ nāma.
tika-abh06t:52: Yasmiṃ pana padese so, kāmoyaṃ duvidhopi ca;
tika-abh06t:61: Svāyaṃ rūpabhavo rūpaṃ, evaṃ kāmoti saññito;
tika-abh06t:64: Tasmiṃ kāme idaṃ cittaṃ, sadāvacaratīti ca;
tika-abh06t:82: Puna tīṇeva sambhonti, dasa puññakriyāpi ca.
tika-abh06t:87: Purimā muñcanā ceva, parā tissopi cetanā;
tika-abh06t:88: Hoti dānamayaṃ puññaṃ, evaṃ sesesu dīpaye.
tika-abh06t:89_0: Idāni assa panaṭṭhavidhassāpi kāmāvacarakusalacittassa ayamuppattikkamo veditabbo.
tika-abh06t:89_1: Yadā hi yo deyyadhammappaṭiggāhakādisampattiṃ, aññaṃ vā somanassahetuṃ āgamma haṭṭhapahaṭṭho
tika-abh06t:89_2: “atthi dinna”nti ādinayappavattaṃ sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā parehi anussāhito dānādīni
tika-abh06t:89_3: puññāni karoti, tadāssa somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ paṭhamaṃ
tika-abh06t:89_4: mahākusalacittaṃ uppajjati. Yadā pana vuttanayeneva haṭṭhapahaṭṭho sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā
tika-abh06t:89_5: parehi ussāhito karoti, tadāssa tameva cittaṃ sasaṅkhārikaṃ hoti. Imasmiṃ panatthe
tika-abh06t:89_6: saṅkhāroti attano vā parassa vā pavattassa pubbappayogassādhivacanaṃ. Yadā pana ñātijanassa
tika-abh06t:89_7: paṭipattidassanena jātaparicayā bālakā bhikkhū disvā somanassajātā sahasā yaṃ kiñci
tika-abh06t:89_8: hatthagataṃ dadanti vā vandanti vā, tadā tesaṃ tatiyacittamuppajjati. Yadā pana te
tika-abh06t:89_9: “detha vandatha, ayye”ti vadanti, evaṃ ñātijanena ussāhitā hutvā hatthagataṃ dadanti
tika-abh06t:89_10: vā vandanti vā, tadā tesaṃ catutthacittamuppajjati. Yadā pana deyyadhammappaṭiggāhakādīnaṃ
tika-abh06t:89_11: asampattiṃ vā aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvaṃ āgamma catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitā
tika-abh06t:89_12: honti, tadā sesāni cattāri upekkhāsahagatāni uppajjanti. Evaṃ somanassupekkhāñāṇappayogabhedato
tika-abh06t:94: Sattarasa sahassāni, dve satāni asīti ca;
tika-abh06t:96: Taṃ pana yathānurūpaṃ kāmāvacarasugatiyaṃ bhavabhogasampattiṃ abhinipphādeti.
tika-abh06t:97_0: Itaresu pana rūpāvacarakusalacittaṃ savatthukato ekavidhaṃ, dvīsu bhavesu uppajjanato
tika-abh06t:97_1: duvidhaṃ, hīnamajjhimapaṇītabhedato tividhaṃ, paṭipadādibhedato catubbidhaṃ, jhānaṅgayogabhedato
tika-abh06t:98_0: Taṃ pana yathāsambhavaṃ pathavīkasiṇādīsu ārammaṇesu pavattivasena anekavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t:99_0: Sesesu pana dvīsu arūpāvacarakusalacittaṃ tāva upekkhāvedanāyogabhedato ekavidhaṃ,
tika-abh06t:99_2: catubbidhaṃ. Kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ, tattha pavattaviññāṇaṃ, tassa apagamo, ākiñcaññāyatananti
tika-abh06t:99_3: idamassa catubbidhamārammaṇaṃ. Yathāpaṭipāṭiyā etassārammaṇassa bhedato catubbidhaṃ
tika-abh06t:99_4: hoti. Seyyathidaṃ – sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ
tika-abh06t:100_0: Itaraṃ pana lokuttarakusalacittaṃ nibbānārammaṇato ekavidhaṃ, niyatāniyatavatthukabhedato
tika-abh06t:100_1: duvidhaṃ, tīhi vimokkhamukhehi pattabbato tividhaṃ, catumaggayogabhedato catubbidhaṃ.
tika-abh06t:100_5: idaṃ catubbidhaṃ lokuttarakusalacittaṃ nāma. Ekekaṃ panettha jhānaṅgayogabhedato
tika-abh06t:100_6: pañcavidhaṃ hoti, tasmā vīsatividhaṃ hoti. Sabbaṃ panetaṃ lokuttarabhāvanāpuññavasappavattaṃ
tika-abh06t:100_7: maggānurūpaphalappavattiyā cattāro ariyapuggale abhinipphādeti. Evaṃ lokuttarakusalaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh06t:102: Kāme aṭṭheva rūpe ca, pañca cattārirūpisu;
tika-abh06t:109_0: Akusalaṃ pana bhūmito ekavidhaṃ kāmāvacarameva, niyatāniyatavatthuvasena ca ekahetukaduhetukavasena
tika-abh06t:109_1: ca paṭisandhijanakājanakavasena ca duvidhaṃ, tīhi vedanāhi yogato ca lobhamūlaṃ dosamūlaṃ
tika-abh06t:109_2: mohamūlanti mūlato ca tividhaṃ hoti. Tattha lobhamūlaṃ pana somanassupekkhādiṭṭhippayogabhedato
tika-abh06t:109_3: aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti. Seyyathidaṃ – somanassasahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikamekaṃ,
tika-abh06t:110_0: Yadā hi “natthi kāmesu ādīnavo”tiādinā nayena micchādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā kevalaṃ haṭṭhatuṭṭho
tika-abh06t:110_1: kāme vā paribhuñjati, diṭṭhamaṅgalādīni vā sārato pacceti sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena
tika-abh06t:110_2: cittena, tadāssa paṭhamaṃ akusalacittaṃ uppajjati. Yadā pana mandena samussāhitena,
tika-abh06t:110_3: tadā dutiyaṃ. Yadā micchādiṭṭhiṃ apurakkhatvā kevalaṃ haṭṭhatuṭṭho methunaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-abh06t:110_4: vā paribhuñjati, parasampattiṃ vā abhijjhāyati, parassa bhaṇḍaṃ vā harati sabhāvatikkheneva
tika-abh06t:110_5: anussāhitena cittena, tadā tatiyaṃ. Yadā mandena samussāhitena, tadā catutthaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh06t:110_6: Yadā pana kāmānaṃ vā asampattiṃ āgamma aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvena catūsupi
tika-abh06t:110_7: vikappesu somanassarahitā honti, tadā sesāni cattāri upekkhāsahagatāni uppajjantīti.
tika-abh06t:111_0: Dosamūlaṃ pana ekantasavatthukato ekavidhaṃ, asaṅkhārasasaṅkhārabhedato duvidhaṃ
tika-abh06t:111_1: domanassasahagataṃ paṭighasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ, sasaṅkhāranti. Assa pana pāṇātipātādīsu
tika-abh06t:112_0: Mohamūlampi vicikicchuddhaccayogato duvidhaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ vicikicchāsampayuttaṃ,
tika-abh06t:112_1: upekkhāsahagataṃ uddhaccasampayuttanti. Tassa asanniṭṭhānavikkhepakālesu pavatti veditabbāti.
tika-abh06t:113: Evaṃ tāva dvādasavidhaṃ akusalacittaṃ veditabbaṃ, sabbaṃ panetaṃ yathānurūpaṃ apāyesu upapattiyā, sugatiyampi dukkhavisesassa abhinipphādakaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t:120_0: Itaraṃ pana abyākatamavipākārahato ekavidhaṃ hoti, jātibhedato duvidhaṃ vipākacittaṃ
tika-abh06t:120_1: kiriyacittanti. Tattha vipākacittaṃ bhūmibhedato catubbidhaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ
tika-abh06t:120_2: arūpāvacaraṃ lokuttaranti. Tattha kāmāvacaraṃ duvidhaṃ kusalavipākaṃ akusalavipākanti.
tika-abh06t:121_0: Tattha sahetukavipākacittaṃ sakakusalaṃ viya somanassupekkhāñāṇappayogabhedato aṭṭhavidhaṃ.
tika-abh06t:121_1: Seyyathidaṃ – somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ, sasaṅkhāraṃ, somanassasahagataṃ
tika-abh06t:121_2: ñāṇavippayuttaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ, sasaṅkhāraṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ,
tika-abh06t:121_3: sasaṅkhāraṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ ñāṇavippayuttaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ, sasaṅkhāranti idaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ
tika-abh06t:122_0: Yathā panassa kusalaṃ dānādivasena chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati, na idaṃ tathā. Idaṃ
tika-abh06t:122_2: pavattati. Sampayuttadhammānañca visese asatipi ādāsatalādīsu mukhanimittaṃ viya
tika-abh06t:122_3: nirussāhaṃ vipākaṃ, mukhaṃ viya saussāhaṃ kusalanti veditabbaṃ. Imesaṃ pana vipaccanaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh06t:122_4: veditabbaṃ. Imāni hi paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutitadārammaṇāni hutvā vipaccanti.
tika-abh06t:137: Appavattanato ceva, pākā puññehi no samā.
tika-abh06t:142: Tathā viratiyo tisso, na panetesu jāyare;
tika-abh06t:143: Pañca sikkhāpadā vuttā, kusalāti hi satthunā.
tika-abh06t:149: Ñeyyaṃ paccayato ceva, vipākesu ca viññunā.
tika-abh06t:157_0: Ahetukavipākacittaṃ pana alobhādihetuvirahitaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ
tika-abh06t:157_1: sotaviññāṇaṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ ghānaviññāṇaṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ, sukhasahagataṃ
tika-abh06t:158_0: Idaṃ pana aṭṭhavidhaṃ niyatavatthukato ekavidhaṃ, niyatāniyatārammaṇato duvidhaṃ.
tika-abh06t:158_1: Tattha viññāṇapañcakaṃ niyatārammaṇaṃ, sesattayaṃ aniyatārammaṇaṃ. Sukhasomanassupekkhāvedanāyogato
tika-abh06t:158_2: tividhaṃ. Tattha sukhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ, dviṭṭhānikaṃ santīraṇaṃ somanassupekkhāyuttaṃ,
tika-abh06t:159_1: pañcavidhaṃ. Tattha diṭṭhārammaṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, sutārammaṇaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ, mutārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh06t:160: Vatthuto chabbidhaṃ. Kathaṃ? Cakkhuviññāṇassa cakkhumeva vatthu, tathā sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇānaṃ sotaghānajivhākāyavatthu, avasesattayassa hadayavatthumevāti.
tika-abh06t:161_0: Ārammaṇato sattavidhaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ? Rūpārammaṇameva cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tathā saddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbārammaṇāni
tika-abh06t:161_1: paṭipāṭiyā sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇāni, rūpādipañcārammaṇā manodhātu, sesamanoviññāṇadhātudvayaṃ chaḷārammaṇanti.
tika-abh06t:162: Taṃ sabbaṃ pana ahetukavipākacittaṃ kiccato aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ? Dassanakiccaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, savanaghāyanasāyanaphusanasampaṭicchanasantīraṇatadārammaṇakiccāni avasesāni.
tika-abh06t:163_0: Tattha cakkhuto pavattaṃ viññāṇaṃ, cakkhumhi sannissitaṃ viññāṇanti vā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ,
tika-abh06t:164_0: Sesā pana dve ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyo chaḷārammaṇavijānanalakkhaṇā, santīraṇādirasā,
tika-abh06t:164_1: tathābhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānāti veditabbā. Tattha paṭhamā ekantamiṭṭhārammaṇe
tika-abh06t:164_2: pavattisabbhāvato somanassayuttāva hutvā pañcadvāre santīraṇakiccaṃ sādhayamānā pañcasu
tika-abh06t:164_3: dvāresu ṭhatvā vipaccati, chasu pana dvāresu balavārammaṇe tadārammaṇaṃ hutvā vipaccati.
tika-abh06t:164_4: Dutiyā pana iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe pavattisabbhāvato upekkhāsahagatā hutvā santīraṇatadārammaṇapaṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena
tika-abh06t:164_5: pavattanato pañcasu ṭhānesu vipaccati. Kathaṃ? Manussaloke tāva jaccandhajaccabadhirajaccajaḷajaccummattakapaṇḍakaubhatobyañjananapuṃsakādīnaṃ
tika-abh06t:164_6: paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle paṭisandhi hutvā vipaccati. Paṭisandhiyā vītivattāya pavattiyaṃ
tika-abh06t:164_7: yāvatāyukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ hutvā vipaccati. Iṭṭhamajjhatte pañcārammaṇavīthiyā santīraṇaṃ
tika-abh06t:164_8: hutvā, balavārammaṇe chadvāre tadārammaṇaṃ hutvā, maraṇakāle cuti hutvāti imesu pana
tika-abh06t:164_9: pañcasu ṭhānesu vipaccatīti. Evaṃ tāva ahetukavipākacittāni veditabbāni.
tika-abh06t:168_0: Idāni rūpāvacaravipākacittāni vuccanti. Tāni niyatavatthukato ekavidhāni, jhānaṅgayogabhedato
tika-abh06t:168_3: upekkhācittekaggatāsampayuttaṃ pañcamanti imāni pañcapi rūpāvacaravipākacittāni upapattiyaṃ
tika-abh06t:169_0: Idāni arūpāvacaravipākacittāni vuccanti. Tāni sakakusalāni viya ārammaṇabhedato catubbidhāni
tika-abh06t:187: Sesaṃ sabbaṃ ca sesena, kusalena samaṃ mataṃ. –
tika-abh06t:189_0: Idāni lokuttaravipākacittāni honti. Tāni catumaggayuttacittaphalattā catubbidhāni
tika-abh06t:189_2: arahattamaggaphalacittanti. Evaṃ panettha ekekaṃ jhānaṅgayogabhedato pañcavidhaṃ,
tika-abh06t:189_3: puna maggavīthiphalasamāpattivasena pavattito duvidhaṃ. Evaṃ lokuttarakusalavipākacittāni veditabbāni.
tika-abh06t:203_0: Idāni sattākusalavipākāni vuccanti. Akusalavipākaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ,
tika-abh06t:203_1: upekkhāsahagataṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ ghānaviññāṇaṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ,
tika-abh06t:204_1: kamme āyūhite kammakammanimittagatinimittesu aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā catūsu apāyesu
tika-abh06t:204_2: paṭisandhi hutvā vipaccati, paṭisandhiyā vītivattāya dutiyacittavāraṃ tato paṭṭhāya
tika-abh06t:204_3: yāvatāyukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ hutvā, aniṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇāya pañcaviññāṇavīthiyā santīraṇaṃ
tika-abh06t:204_4: hutvā, balavārammaṇe chasu dvāresu tadārammaṇaṃ hutvā, maraṇakāle cuti hutvā vipaccati.
tika-abh06t:204_5: Evaṃ pañcasu ṭhānesu vipaccati. Kevalaṃ hi tāni kusalavipākāhetukacittāni kusalakammapaccayāni,
tika-abh06t:208_1: rūpāvacaravipākaṃ pañcavidhaṃ, ārammaṇabhedato arūpāvacaravipākaṃ catubbidhaṃ, maggasampayuttacittaphalabhedato
tika-abh06t:212_0: Kiriyābyākatacittaṃ pana avipākato ekavidhaṃ, parittamahaggatato duvidhaṃ, kāmāvacararūpāvacaraarūpāvacarabhūmibhedato
tika-abh06t:212_1: tividhaṃ. Tattha kāmāvacaraṃ duvidhaṃ sahetukamahetukanti. Tattha sahetukaṃ ekavidhaṃ
tika-abh06t:212_2: arahato eva uppajjanato. Somanassupekkhāñāṇappayogabhedato kāmāvacarakusalaṃ viya
tika-abh06t:212_3: aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti. Seyyathidaṃ – somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ,
tika-abh06t:212_4: sasaṅkhārikaṃ, somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇavippayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ, sasaṅkhārikaṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ
tika-abh06t:212_5: ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ, sasaṅkhārikaṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ ñāṇavippayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ,
tika-abh06t:212_6: sasaṅkhārikanti imāni aṭṭha sahetukakiriyacittāni. Etāni pana yathānurūpaṃ dānādivasena
tika-abh06t:214_0: Tattha kiriyāhetukamanodhātu upekkhāsahagatā hadayavatthuṃ nissāya cakkhudvāre iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattaaniṭṭhaaniṭṭhamajjhattesu
tika-abh06t:214_1: rūpārammaṇesu yena kenaci pasāde ghaṭṭite taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā āvajjanavasena
tika-abh06t:214_2: cakkhuviññāṇassa purecārī hutvā bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭayamānā uppajjati. Sotadvārādīsupi
tika-abh06t:214_3: eseva nayo. Itarā pana dve ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyo sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇāti duvidhā
tika-abh06t:214_4: honti. Tattha asādhāraṇā pana kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu somanassasahagatā khīṇāsavasseva
tika-abh06t:214_5: chasu dvāresu chasu anuḷāresu ārammaṇesu hasituppādakiccā niyatavatthukā uppajjati.
tika-abh06t:214_7: tathābhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, sā tīsu bhavesu sabbesaṃ sacittakasattānaṃ sādhāraṇā, na
tika-abh06t:214_8: kassaci pana sacittakassa na uppajjati nāma. Uppajjamānā panāyaṃ pañcadvāramanodvāresu
tika-abh06t:214_9: voṭṭhabbanāvajjanakiccā uppajjati. Cha asādhāraṇañāṇānipi etāya gahitārammaṇameva
tika-abh06t:215_0: Idha ṭhatvā hasanacittāni pariggaṇhitabbāni. Terasa hasanacittāni. Kusalato catūhi
tika-abh06t:215_1: somanassasahagatehi, akusalato catūhīti imehi aṭṭhahi cittehi puthujjanā hasanti,
tika-abh06t:215_2: sekhā pana kusalato catūhi, akusalato dvīhi diṭṭhigatavippayuttasomanassasahagatehīti
tika-abh06t:215_3: chahi hasanti, khīṇāsavā kiriyato pañcahi somanassasahagatehi hasantīti.
tika-abh06t:221: Chahi sekhā asekhā ca, hasanti pana pañcahi.
tika-abh06t:223_3: Kevalaṃ panetāni kiriyacittāni khīṇāsavānaṃyeva uppajjanti, kusalāni pana sekhaputhujjanānaṃ.
tika-abh06t:223_4: Imāni ca khīṇāsavānaṃ bhāvanākāravasappavattāni, tāni pana sekhaputhujjanānaṃ bhāvanāpuññavasappavattānīti
tika-abh06t:228: Yāva khīṇāsavo bhikkhu, na samāpajjateva naṃ;
tika-abh06t:229: Tāva tā kusalā eva, samāpannā sace kriyā.
tika-abh06t:230_1: ahetukaṃ tividhaṃ, jhānaṅgayogabhedato rūpāvacaraṃ pañcavidhaṃ, ārammaṇabhedato arūpāvacaraṃ
tika-abh06t:230_2: catubbidhaṃ, evaṃ bhūmivasena vīsatividhaṃ kiriyacittaṃ veditabbanti.
tika-abh06t:242_0: Ettāvatā ekavīsatividhaṃ kusalaṃ, dvādasavidhaṃ akusalaṃ chattiṃsavidhaṃ vipākaṃ,
tika-abh06t:242_1: vīsatividhaṃ kiriyacittanti ādimhi nikkhittaṃ cittaṃ ekūnanavutippabhedena vidhinā pakāsitaṃ hotīti.
tika-abh06t:248: Aṭṭha lokuttare katvā, niddiṭṭhā hi samāsato.
tika-abh06t:254: Ye taranti imaṃ lokaṃ, parañceva taranti teti.
tika-abh06t:262_0: Tattha cittasampayuttā, citte bhavā vā cetasikā. Tepi cittaṃ viya sārammaṇato ekavidhā,
tika-abh06t:262_1: savipākāvipākato duvidhā, kusalākusalābyākatabhedato tividhā, kāmāvacarādibhedato catubbidhā.
tika-abh06t:263_1: tāva niyatā sarūpena āgatā ekūnatiṃsa dhammā honti. Seyyathidaṃ – phasso vedanā saññā
tika-abh06t:263_2: cetanā vitakko vicāro pīti cittekaggatā saddhā sati vīriyaṃ paññā jīvitindriyaṃ alobho
tika-abh06t:263_3: adoso hirī ottappaṃ kāyappassaddhi cittappassaddhi kāyalahutā cittalahutā kāyamudutā
tika-abh06t:263_4: cittamudutā kāyakammaññatā cittakammaññatā kāyapāguññatā cittapāguññatā kāyujukatā
tika-abh06t:263_5: cittujukatāti. Puna chando, adhimokkho, tatramajjhattatā, manasikāro cāti cattāro
tika-abh06t:263_6: niyatayevāpanakā honti. Imehi catūhi tettiṃsa honti. Puna karuṇā muditā kāyaduccaritavirati
tika-abh06t:263_7: vacīduccaritavirati micchājīvavirati ceti ime pañca aniyatā. Ime pana kadāci uppajjanti.
tika-abh06t:264_0: Imesu pana karuṇāmuditāvasena bhāvanākāle karuṇāpubbabhāgo vā muditāpubbabhāgo vā
tika-abh06t:264_1: etā uppajjanti, na panekato uppajjanti. Yadā pana iminā cittena micchākammantādīhi
tika-abh06t:264_2: viramati, tadā sammākammantādīni paripūrenti, ekā virati uppajjati, karuṇāmuditāhi
tika-abh06t:264_3: saha, aññamaññena ca na uppajjanti. Tasmā etesu ekena saha catuttiṃseva dhammā honti.
tika-abh06t:269: Kasmā panettha mettā ca, upekkhā ca na uddhaṭā;
tika-abh06t:273: Upekkhā gahitā yasmā, tasmā na gahitā ubho.
tika-abh06t:276: Sarūpeneva sabbete, pāḷiyaṃ na ca uddhaṭā.
tika-abh06t:278: Yasmā aniyatā keci, yasmā rāsiṃ bhajanti na;
tika-abh06t:279: Yasmā ca dubbalā keci, tasmā vuttā na pāḷiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:289: Phusitvā pana phassena, vedanāya ca vedaye;
tika-abh06t:290: Sañjānāti ca saññāya, cetanāya ca cetaye.
tika-abh06t:293: Phassova paṭhamaṃ vutto, tasmā idha mahesinā.
tika-abh06t:295: Akāraṇamidaṃ sabbaṃ, cittānaṃ tu saheva ca;
tika-abh06t:298: Ayaṃ tu paṭhamuppanno, ayaṃ pacchāti natthidaṃ;
tika-abh06t:302: Iccevaṃ pana viññeyyaṃ, viññunā na visesato.
tika-abh06t:306_0: Yasmā pana ime dhammā vacanatthalakkhaṇādīhi vuccamānā pākaṭā honti suviññeyyāva,
tika-abh06t:306_1: tasmā tesaṃ vacanatthalakkhaṇādīni pavakkhāmi. Seyyathidaṃ – phusatīti phasso. Svāyaṃ
tika-abh06t:306_3: vā, āpāthagatavisayapadaṭṭhāno. Ayaṃ hi arūpadhammopi samāno ārammaṇesu phusanākāreneva
tika-abh06t:306_4: pavattati, so dvinnaṃ meṇḍānaṃ sannipāto viya daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh06t:307_0: Sundaraṃ manoti sumano, sumanassa bhāvo somanassaṃ, somanassameva vedanā somanassavedanā.
tika-abh06t:307_1: Sā vedayitalakkhaṇā, iṭṭhākārānubhavanarasā rājā viya subhojanarasaṃ, cetasikaassādapaccupaṭṭhānā,
tika-abh06t:308_0: Nīlādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sañjānātīti saññā. Sā sañjānanalakkhaṇā, paccābhiññāṇakaraṇarasā
tika-abh06t:309_0: Cetayatīti cetanā. Saddhiṃ attanā sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe abhisandahatīti attho.
tika-abh06t:310: Vitakketīti vitakko. Vitakkanaṃ vā vitakko. Svāyaṃ ārammaṇe cittassa abhiniropanalakkhaṇo, āhananapariyāhananaraso, ārammaṇe cittassa ānayanapaccupaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh06t:311_0: Ārammaṇe tena cittaṃ vicaratīti vicāro. Vicaraṇaṃ vā vicāro. Anusañcaraṇanti vuttaṃ
tika-abh06t:311_1: hoti. Svāyaṃ ārammaṇānumajjanalakkhaṇo, tattha sahajātānuyojanaraso, cittassa anupabandhapaccupaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh06t:312: Pinayatīti pīti. Sā sampiyāyanalakkhaṇā, kāyacittapīṇanarasā, pharaṇarasā vā, odagyapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh06t:313_0: Cittassa ekaggabhāvo cittekaggatā. Samādhissetaṃ nāmaṃ. So avisāralakkhaṇo, avikkhepalakkhaṇo
tika-abh06t:313_1: vā, sahajātānaṃ sampiṇḍanaraso nhāniyacuṇṇānaṃ udakaṃ viya, upasamapaccupaṭṭhāno,
tika-abh06t:314_0: Saddahanti etāya, sayaṃ vā saddahati, saddahanamattameva vā esāti saddhā. Sā panesā
tika-abh06t:315: Saranti etāya, sayaṃ vā sarati, saraṇamattameva vā esāti sati. Sā apilāpanalakkhaṇā, asammosarasā, ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā, thirasaññāpadaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh06t:316: Vīrabhāvo vīriyaṃ. Vīrānaṃ vā kammaṃ vīriyaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ ussāhanalakkhaṇaṃ, sahajātānaṃ upatthambhanarasaṃ, asaṃsīdanabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, saṃvegapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh06t:317: Pajānātīti paññā. Sā panesā vijānanalakkhaṇā, visayobhāsanarasā padīpo viya, asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā araññagatasudesako viya.
tika-abh06t:318_0: Jīvanti tena taṃsampayuttadhammāti jīvitaṃ. Taṃ pana attanā avinibbhuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-abh06t:318_1: anupālanalakkhaṇaṃ, tesaṃ pavattanarasaṃ, tesaṃyeva ṭhapanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, yāpayitabbadhammapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh06t:318_2: Santepi ca tesaṃ anupālanalakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne atthikkhaṇeyeva taṃ te dhamme anupāleti
tika-abh06t:318_3: udakaṃ viya uppalādīni, yathāsakaṃ paccayuppannepi ca dhamme anupāleti dhāti viya
tika-abh06t:318_4: kumāraṃ, sayaṃpavattitadhammasambandheneva pavattati niyāmako viya, na bhaṅgato uddhaṃ
tika-abh06t:318_5: pavattayati attano ca pavattayitabbānañca abhāvā, na bhaṅgakkhaṇe ṭhapeti sayaṃ bhijjamānattā
tika-abh06t:319_0: Na lubbhanti tena, sayaṃ vā na lubbhati, alubbhanamattameva vā tanti alobho. So ārammaṇe
tika-abh06t:319_1: cittassa alaggabhāvalakkhaṇo kamaladale jalabindu viya, apariggaharaso muttabhikkhu
tika-abh06t:320_0: Na dussanti tena, sayaṃ vā na dussati, adussanamattameva vā tanti adoso. So acaṇḍikkalakkhaṇo,
tika-abh06t:320_1: avirodhalakkhaṇo vā anukūlamitto viya, āghātavinayanaraso, pariḷāhavinayanaraso vā
tika-abh06t:321_0: Kāyaduccaritādīhi hirīyatīti hirī. Lajjāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tehiyeva ottappatīti ottappaṃ.
tika-abh06t:321_1: Pāpato ubbegassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tattha pāpato jigucchanalakkhaṇā hirī, ottāsalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh06t:321_2: ottappaṃ. Ubhopi pāpānaṃ akaraṇarasā, pāpato saṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhānā, attagāravaparagāravapadaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh06t:322_0: Kāyapassambhanaṃ kāyapassaddhi. Cittapassambhanaṃ cittapassaddhi. Kāyoti cettha vedanādayo
tika-abh06t:322_1: tayo khandhā. Ubhopi panetā ekato hutvā kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā, kāyacittadarathanimmadanarasā,
tika-abh06t:323_0: Kāyalahubhāvo kāyalahutā. Cittalahubhāvo cittalahutā. Kāyacittānaṃ garubhāvavūpasamalakkhaṇā,
tika-abh06t:324_0: Kāyamudubhāvo kāyamudutā. Cittamudubhāvo cittamudutā. Kāyacittānaṃ thaddhabhāvavūpasamalakkhaṇā,
tika-abh06t:326_0: Kāyapāguññabhāvo kāyapāguññatā. Cittapāguññabhāvo cittapāguññatā. Kāyacittānaṃ agelaññabhāvalakkhaṇā,
tika-abh06t:327_0: Kāyassa ujukabhāvo kāyujukatā. Cittassa ujukabhāvo cittujukatā. Kāyacittānaṃ akuṭilabhāvalakkhaṇā,
tika-abh06t:327_1: kāyacittānaṃ ajjavalakkhaṇā vā, kāyacittānaṃ kuṭilabhāvanimmadanarasā, ajimhatāpaccupaṭṭhānā,
tika-abh06t:328: Chandoti kattukamyatāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tasmā so kattukamyatālakkhaṇo chando, ārammaṇapariyesanaraso, ārammaṇena atthikatāpaccupaṭṭhāno, tadevassa padaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh06t:329: Adhimuccanaṃ adhimokkho. So sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇo, asaṃsappanaraso, nicchayapaccupaṭṭhāno, sanniṭṭheyyadhammapadaṭṭhāno, ārammaṇe niccalabhāvena indakhīlo viya daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh06t:330: Tesu tesu dhammesu majjhattabhāvo tatramajjhattatā. Sā cittacetasikānaṃ samavāhitalakkhaṇā, ūnādhikatānivāraṇarasā, pakkhapātupacchedanarasā vā, majjhattabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh06t:331: Kiriyā kāro, manasmiṃ kāro manasikāro. Purimamanato visadisaṃ manaṃ karotīti ca manasikāro.
tika-abh06t:332_0: Svāyaṃ ārammaṇapaṭipādako, vīthipaṭipādako, javanapaṭipādakoti tippakāro. Tattha
tika-abh06t:332_1: ārammaṇapaṭipādako manasmiṃ kāro manasikāro. So sāraṇalakkhaṇo, sampayuttānaṃ ārammaṇe
tika-abh06t:332_3: ārammaṇapaṭipādakattena sampayuttānaṃ sārathī viya daṭṭhabbo. Vīthipaṭipādakoti pañcadvārāvajjanassetaṃ
tika-abh06t:332_4: adhivacanaṃ, javanapaṭipādakoti manodvārāvajjanassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, na te idha adhippetā.
tika-abh06t:333_0: Karuṇāti paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampanaṃ karotīti karuṇā, kināti vināseti
tika-abh06t:333_1: vā paradukkhanti karuṇā. Sā paradukkhāpanayanākārappavattilakkhaṇā, paradukkhāsahanarasā,
tika-abh06t:334_0: Modanti tāya, sayaṃ vā modatīti muditā. Sā pamodanalakkhaṇā, anissāyanarasā, arativighātapaccupaṭṭhānā,
tika-abh06t:334_1: sattānaṃ sampattidassanapadaṭṭhānā. Keci pana mettupekkhāyopi aniyate icchanti, taṃ
tika-abh06t:334_2: na gahetabbaṃ. Atthato hi adoso eva mettā, tatramajjhattupekkhāyeva upekkhāti.
tika-abh06t:335_0: Kāyaduccaritato virati kāyaduccaritavirati. Eseva nayo sesesupi dvīsu. Lakkhaṇādito
tika-abh06t:335_1: pana etā tissopi viratiyo kāyaduccaritādivatthūnaṃ avītikkamalakkhaṇā, kāyaduccaritādivatthuto
tika-abh06t:335_3: Keci pana imāsu ekekaṃ niyataṃ viratiṃ icchanti. Evaṃ kāmāvacarapaṭhamamahākusalacittena
tika-abh06t:335_4: ime tettiṃsa vā catuttiṃsa vā dhammā sampayogaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:336_0: Yathā ca paṭhamena, evaṃ dutiyacittenāpi. Sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva hi ettha viseso.
tika-abh06t:336_1: Puna tatiyena ñāṇavippayogato ṭhapetvā amohaṃ avasesā dvattiṃsa vā tettiṃsa vā veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:336_2: Tathā catutthenāpi sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva viseso, paṭhame vuttesu pana ṭhapetvā
tika-abh06t:336_3: pītiṃ avasesā pañcamena sampayogaṃ gacchanti. Somanassaṭṭhāne cettha upekkhāvedanā
tika-abh06t:336_5: Yathā ca pañcamena, evaṃ chaṭṭhenāpi. Sasaṅkhāramattameva hoti viseso. Sattamena
tika-abh06t:336_6: pana ṭhapetvā paññaṃ avasesā ekatiṃsa vā dvattiṃsa vā dhammā honti, tathā aṭṭhamenāpi.
tika-abh06t:336_7: Sasaṅkhāramattameva viseso. Evaṃ tāva kāmāvacarakusalacetasikā veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:340_0: Avasesesu pana rūpāvacaracittasampayuttā rūpāvacarā, tattha paṭhamacittasampayuttā
tika-abh06t:340_1: tāva kāmāvacarapaṭhamacitte vuttesu ṭhapetvā viratittayaṃ avasesā veditabbā. Viratiyo
tika-abh06t:340_2: pana kāmāvacarakusalalokuttaresveva uppajjanti, na aññesu. Dutiyena vitakkavajjā
tika-abh06t:340_3: dvattiṃsa vā tettiṃsa vā. Tatiyena vicāravajjā ekatiṃsa vā dvattiṃsa vā. Catutthena
tika-abh06t:340_4: tato pītivajjā tiṃsa vā ekatiṃsa vā. Pañcamena tato karuṇāmuditāvajjā tiṃsa honti,
tika-abh06t:340_5: somanassaṭṭhāne upekkhā paviṭṭhā. Evaṃ rūpāvacarakusalacetasikā veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:341: Arūpāvacaracittasampayuttā arūpāvacarā, te pana rūpāvacarapañcame vuttanayena veditabbā. Arūpāvacarabhāvovettha viseso.
tika-abh06t:342_0: Lokuttaracittasampayuttā lokuttarā, te pana paṭhamajjhānike maggacitte paṭhamarūpāvacaracitte
tika-abh06t:342_2: veditabbā. Karuṇāmuditānamabhāvo ca niyataviratibhāvo ca lokuttarabhāvo cettha viseso.
tika-abh06t:343_0: Akusalā pana cetasikā bhūmito ekavidhā kāmāvacarāyeva, tesu lobhamūlapaṭhamākusalacittasampayuttā
tika-abh06t:343_1: tāva niyatā sarūpenāgatā pannarasa, yevāpanakā niyatā cattāroti ekūnavīsati honti.
tika-abh06t:343_2: Aniyatā cha yevāpanakāti sabbe pañcavīsati honti. Seyyathidaṃ – phasso somanassavedanā
tika-abh06t:343_3: saññā cetanā vitakko vicāro pīti cittassekaggatā vīriyaṃ jīvitaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ
tika-abh06t:343_4: lobho moho micchādiṭṭhīti ime sarūpenāgatā pannarasa, chando adhimokkho uddhaccaṃ
tika-abh06t:343_5: manasikāroti ime cattāro niyatayevāpanakā, ime pana paṭipāṭiyā dasasu cittesu niyatā
tika-abh06t:343_6: honti, māno issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccaṃ thinamiddhanti ime chayeva aniyatayevāpanakā.
tika-abh06t:347_0: Tattha phassoti akusalacittasahajāto phasso. Esa nayo sesesupi. Na hirīyatīti ahiriko,
tika-abh06t:347_1: ahirikassa bhāvo ahirikaṃ. Kāyaduccaritādīhi ottappatīti ottappaṃ, na ottappaṃ anottappaṃ.
tika-abh06t:347_2: Tattha kāyaduccaritādīhi ajigucchanalakkhaṇaṃ, alajjālakkhaṇaṃ vā ahirikaṃ, anottappaṃ
tika-abh06t:348_0: Lubbhanti tena, sayaṃ vā lubbhati, lubbhanamattameva vā tanti lobho. So ārammaṇagahaṇalakkhaṇo
tika-abh06t:348_1: makkaṭālepo viya, abhisaṅgaraso tattakapāle pakkhittamaṃsapesi viya, apariccāgapaccupaṭṭhāno
tika-abh06t:349_0: Muyhanti tena, sayaṃ vā muyhati, muyhanamattameva vā tanti moho. So cittassa andhabhāvalakkhaṇo,
tika-abh06t:349_1: aññāṇalakkhaṇo vā, asampaṭivedharaso, ārammaṇasabhāvacchādanaraso vā, andhakārapaccupaṭṭhāno,
tika-abh06t:350_0: Micchā passanti tāya, sayaṃ vā micchā passati, micchādassanamattameva vā esāti micchādiṭṭhi.
tika-abh06t:351_0: Uddhatabhāvo uddhaccaṃ. Taṃ avūpasamalakkhaṇaṃ vātābhighātacalajalaṃ viya, anavaṭṭhānarasaṃ
tika-abh06t:352: Maññatīti māno. So uṇṇatilakkhaṇo, sampaggahaṇaraso, ketukamyatāpaccupaṭṭhāno, diṭṭhivippayuttalobhapadaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh06t:353: Issatīti issā. Sā parasampattīnaṃ usūyanalakkhaṇā, tattheva anabhiratirasā, tato vimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, parasampattipadaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh06t:354: Maccharabhāvo macchariyaṃ. Taṃ attano sampattīnaṃ niguhaṇalakkhaṇaṃ, tāsaṃyeva parehi sādhāraṇabhāvaakkhamanarasaṃ, saṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, attasampattipadaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh06t:355: Kucchitaṃ kataṃ kukataṃ, tassa bhāvo kukkuccaṃ. Taṃ pacchānutāpalakkhaṇaṃ, katākatānusocanarasaṃ, vippaṭisārapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, katākatapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh06t:356_0: Thinatā thinaṃ. Middhatā middhaṃ. Anussāhanasaṃsīdanatā, asattivighāto cāti attho.
tika-abh06t:356_1: Thinañca middhañca thinamiddhaṃ. Tattha thinaṃ anussāhanalakkhaṇaṃ, vīriyavinodanarasaṃ,
tika-abh06t:356_3: ubhayampi ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Sesā kusale vuttanayena veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:357_1: Iti ime ekūnavīsati cetasikā paṭhamākusalacittena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:357_2: Yathā ca paṭhamena, evaṃ dutiyenāpi. Sasaṅkhārabhāvo cettha thinamiddhassa niyatabhāvo
tika-abh06t:357_3: ca viseso. Tatiyena paṭhame vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhiṃ sesā aṭṭhārasa veditabbā. Māno
tika-abh06t:357_4: panettha aniyato hoti, diṭṭhiyā saha na uppajjatīti. Catutthena dutiye vuttesu ṭhapetvā
tika-abh06t:357_5: diṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā. Etthāpi ca māno aniyato hoti. Pañcamena paṭhame vuttesu
tika-abh06t:357_6: ṭhapetvā pītiṃ avasesā sampayogaṃ gacchantīti. Somanassaṭṭhāne panettha upekkhā paviṭṭhā.
tika-abh06t:357_7: Chaṭṭhenāpi pañcame vuttasadisā eva. Sasaṅkhāratā, thinamiddhassa niyatabhāvo ca
tika-abh06t:357_8: viseso. Sattamena pañcame vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā. Māno panettha
tika-abh06t:357_9: aniyato. Aṭṭhamena chaṭṭhe vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā. Etthāpi māno
tika-abh06t:358_0: Domanassasahagatesu paṭighasampayuttesu dosamūlesu dvīsu paṭhamena asaṅkhārikena
tika-abh06t:358_1: sampayuttā niyatā sarūpenāgatā terasa. Seyyathidaṃ – phasso domanassavedanā saññā
tika-abh06t:358_2: cetanā cittekaggatā vitakko vicāro vīriyaṃ jīvitaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ doso moho
tika-abh06t:358_3: ceti ime terasa dhammā chandādīhi catūhi niyatayevāpanakehi sattarasa honti issāmacchariyakukkuccesu
tika-abh06t:358_4: aniyatesu tīsu ekena saha aṭṭhārasa honti, etepi tayo na ekato uppajjanti.
tika-abh06t:359_0: Tattha duṭṭhu manoti dumano, dumanassa bhāvo domanassaṃ, domanassavedanāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh06t:359_1: Tena sahagataṃ domanassasahagataṃ. Taṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ, aniṭṭhākārasambhogarasaṃ,
tika-abh06t:360_0: Dussanti tena, sayaṃ vā dussati, dussanamattameva vā tanti doso. So caṇḍikkalakkhaṇo
tika-abh06t:360_1: pahatāsīviso viya, visappanaraso visanipāto viya, attano nissayadahanaraso vā dāvaggi
tika-abh06t:360_2: viya, dussanapaccupaṭṭhāno laddhokāso viya sapatto, āghātavatthupadaṭṭhāno. Avasesā
tika-abh06t:360_3: heṭṭhā vuttappakārāva. Iti ime sattarasa vā aṭṭhārasa vā navamena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti
tika-abh06t:360_4: veditabbā. Yathā ca navamena, evaṃ dasamenāpi. Sasaṅkhāratā, panettha thinamiddhasambhavo ca viseso.
tika-abh06t:361_0: Dvīsu pana mohamūlesu vicikicchāsampayuttena ekādasamena sampayuttā tāva phasso upekkhāvedanā
tika-abh06t:361_1: saññā cetanā vitakko vicāro vīriyaṃ jīvitaṃ cittaṭṭhiti ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ moho
tika-abh06t:361_2: vicikicchāti sarūpenāgatā terasa, uddhaccaṃ manasikāroti dve yevāpanakā niyatā. Tehi
tika-abh06t:362_0: Tattha pavattaṭṭhitimattā ekaggatā. Vigatā cikicchāti vicikicchā. Sabhāvaṃ vicinanto
tika-abh06t:362_1: etāya kicchati kilamatīti vicikicchā. Sā saṃsayalakkhaṇā, kampanarasā, anicchayapaccupaṭṭhānā,
tika-abh06t:363_0: Dvādasamena uddhaccasampayuttena sampayuttā sarūpenāgatā vicikicchāsahagate vuttesu
tika-abh06t:363_1: vicikicchāhīnā uddhaccaṃ sarūpena āgataṃ, tasmā teraseva honti. Vicikicchāya abhāvena
tika-abh06t:363_2: panettha adhimokkho uppajjati, tena saddhiṃ cuddasa honti. Adhimokkhasambhavato samādhi
tika-abh06t:363_3: balavā hoti, adhimokkhamanasikārā dve yevāpanakā, tehi saha pannaraseva honti. Evaṃ
tika-abh06t:364_0: Idāni abyākatā vuccanti, abyākatā pana duvidhā vipākakiriyabhedato. Tattha vipākā
tika-abh06t:364_1: kusalā viya bhūmivasena catubbidhā kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ lokuttarañceti.
tika-abh06t:364_2: Tattha kāmāvacaravipākā sahetukāhetukavasena duvidhā. Tattha sahetukavipākasampayuttā
tika-abh06t:364_3: sahetukā. Te sahetukakāmāvacarakusalasampayuttasadisā. Yā pana karuṇāmuditā aniyatā,
tika-abh06t:364_4: tā sattārammaṇattā vipākesu nuppajjanti. Kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ ekantaparittārammaṇattā
tika-abh06t:364_5: viratiyo panettha ekantakusalattā na labbhanti. Vibhaṅge “pañca sikkhāpadā kusalāyevā”ti
tika-abh06t:367: Bāttiṃsa pañcame chaṭṭhe, ekatiṃsa tato pare.
tika-abh06t:368_0: Ahetukacittasampayuttā pana ahetukā. Tesu cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttā tāva phasso upekkhāvedanā
tika-abh06t:368_1: saññā cetanā jīvitaṃ cittaṭṭhitīti sarūpenāgatā cha, manasikārena ca satta honti.
tika-abh06t:368_2: Sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇasampayuttāpi satta satteva cetasikā. Tattha kāyaviññāṇasampayuttesu
tika-abh06t:368_3: pana upekkhāṭhāne sukhavedanā paviṭṭhā. Sā kāyikasātalakkhaṇā, pīṇanarasā, sesā vuttanayā eva.
tika-abh06t:371: Sati kasmā upekkhāva, vuttā catūsu satthunā.
tika-abh06t:378_0: Tasmā kāyaviññāṇaṃ sukhādisampayuttanti veditabbaṃ. Manodhātunā sampayuttā sarūpenāgatā
tika-abh06t:378_1: cakkhuviññāṇena saddhiṃ vuttā cha, vitakkavicārehi saha aṭṭha, adhimokkhamanasikārehi
tika-abh06t:378_2: dvīhi yevāpanakehi dasa dhammā honti. Tathā manoviññāṇadhātuupekkhāsahagatena. Somanassasahagatena
tika-abh06t:378_3: pītiadhikā vedanāparivattanañca nānattaṃ. Tasmāvettha ekādasa dhammā honti. Evaṃ
tika-abh06t:379: Rūpāvacaravipākacittasampayuttā pana rūpāvacarā. Arūpāvacaravipākacittasampayuttā arūpāvacarā. Te sabbepi attano attano kusalacittasampayuttacetasikehi sadisāyevāti.
tika-abh06t:380_0: Lokuttaravipākacittasampayuttā lokuttarā. Te sabbe tesaṃyeva lokuttaravipākacittānaṃ
tika-abh06t:380_1: sadisā kusalacittasampayuttehi cetasikehi sadisā. Evaṃ rūpāvacarārūpāvacaralokuttaravipākacetasikā veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:381_0: Akusalavipākacittasampayuttā pana akusalavipākacetasikā nāma. Te pana kusalavipākāhetukacittesu
tika-abh06t:381_1: cakkhuviññāṇādīsu vuttacetasikasadisā. Ettha pana kāyaviññāṇe dukkhavedanā paviṭṭhā.
tika-abh06t:381_2: Sā kāyikābādhalakkhaṇā. Sesā vuttanayāyevāti. Evaṃ chattiṃsa vipākacittasampayuttacetasikā veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:382_0: Kiriyābyākatā ca cetasikā bhūmito tividhā honti kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā arūpāvacarāti.
tika-abh06t:382_1: Tattha kāmāvacarā sahetukāhetukato duvidhā honti. Tesu sahetukakiriyacittasampayuttā
tika-abh06t:382_2: sahetukā, te pana aṭṭhahi kāmāvacarakusalacittasampayuttehi samānā ṭhapetvā viratittayaṃ
tika-abh06t:382_5: pana vīriyindriyaṃ adhikaṃ. Vīriyindriyasambhavato panettha balappatto samādhi hoti.
tika-abh06t:382_6: Hasituppādacittena sampayuttā dvādasa dhammā honti pītiyā saha. Ayamettha viseso.
tika-abh06t:383_1: arūpāvacarā. Te sabbepi sakasakabhūmikusalacittasampayuttehi samānāti. Evaṃ vīsati
tika-abh06t:384: Ettāvatā kusalākusalavipākakiriyabhedabhinnena ekūnanavutiyā cittena sampayuttā cetasikā niddiṭṭhā honti.
tika-abh06t:402_0: Seyyathidaṃ – phasso vedanā saññā cetanā vitakko vicāro pīti cittekaggatā vīriyaṃ
tika-abh06t:402_1: jīvitaṃ chando adhimokkho manasikāro tatramajjhattatā saddhā sati hirī ottappaṃ alobho
tika-abh06t:402_2: adoso amoho kāyappassaddhiādīni cha yugāni, tisso viratiyo, karuṇā muditā lobho doso
tika-abh06t:402_3: moho uddhaccaṃ māno diṭṭhi issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccaṃ thinaṃ middhaṃ vicikicchā ahirikaṃ anottappañcāti.
tika-abh06t:410: Phassādīnaṃ tu dhammānaṃ, pavakkhāmi ito paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:416: Phasso ca vedanā saññā, cetanā jīvitindriyaṃ;
tika-abh06t:423: Upekkhā pañcapaññāsa-citte dukkhaṃ tu tīsu hi.
tika-abh06t:452: Tathā viratiyo tisso, sabbe te pañcavīsati;
tika-abh06t:458: Lobho doso ca moho ca, māno diṭṭhi ca saṃsayo;
tika-abh06t:464: Lobho aṭṭhasu niddiṭṭho, vuttā catūsu diṭṭhitu;
tika-abh06t:470: Phasso ca vedanā saññā, cetanā jīvitaṃ mano;
tika-abh06t:471: Vitakko ca vicāro ca, pīti vīriyasamādhi ca.
tika-abh06t:473: Chando cevādhimokkho ca, manasikāro ca cuddasa;
tika-abh06t:503: Maggo aṭṭhasu cittesu, mato aṭṭhaṅgikoti hi;
tika-abh06t:506: Balāni dve dvicittesu, ekasmiṃ tīṇi dīpaye;
tika-abh06t:510: Cittamevaṃ tu viññeyyaṃ, sabalaṃ abalampi ca.
tika-abh06t:527: Puññāpuññavipākā hi, kāme dasa ca pañca ca;
tika-abh06t:534: Sabbaṃ vuttapakāraṃ tu, tividhaṃ hoti mānasaṃ.
tika-abh06t:536: Sabbo kāmavipāko ca, rūpe pañcadasāpi ca;
tika-abh06t:548: Viññāṇāni ca dvepañca, aṭṭha lokuttarāni ca;
tika-abh06t:570: Evañcāpi hi taṃ cittaṃ, hoti sabbaṃ catubbidhaṃ.
tika-abh06t:573: Tathā dasa kriyā kāme, abhiññāmānasaṃ dvayaṃ.
tika-abh06t:576: Janayanti ca viññattiṃ, ime dvattiṃsa mānasā.
tika-abh06t:578: Kusalā ca kriyā ceva, te mahaggatamānasā;
tika-abh06t:582: Copanaṃ na ca pāpenti, dvikiccā niyatā ime.
tika-abh06t:584: Ṭhapetvā dasa viññāṇe, vipākā dvīsu bhūmisu;
tika-abh06t:591: Na karonti tikiccāni, ime soḷasa mānasā.
tika-abh06t:615: Idaṃ dviṭṭhānikaṃ nāma, hoti cittadvayaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:633: Tikiccaṃ navakaṃ dve tu, dvikiccā sesamekakaṃ.
tika-abh06t:638: Chabbidhaṃ hoti taṃ channaṃ, viññāṇānaṃ pabhedato;
tika-abh06t:645: Rūpārammaṇikā dve tu, dve dve saddādigocarā.
tika-abh06t:665: Dhātudvayaṃ tidhā katvā, pacchimaṃ puna paṇḍito;
tika-abh06t:681: Bahudhā panidaṃ cittaṃ, hotīti ca vibhāvaye.
tika-abh06t:696: Gatiyo pañca niddiṭṭhā, satthunā tu tayo bhavā.
tika-abh06t:698: Bhūmiyo tattha tiṃseva, tāsu tiṃseva puggalā;
tika-abh06t:699: Bhūmīsvetāsu uppannā, sabbe ca pana puggalā.
tika-abh06t:708: Idha cittādhikārattā, acittā na ca uddhaṭā.
tika-abh06t:716: Tiṃsabhūmīsu cittāni, kati jāyanti me vada;
tika-abh06t:717: Cuddaseva tu cittāni, honti sabbāsu bhūmisu.
tika-abh06t:719: Sadā vīsati cittāni, kāmeyeva bhave siyuṃ;
tika-abh06t:729: Cittāni pana jāyanti, cha ca chabbīsabhūmisu.
tika-abh06t:743: Arūpe ca apāye ca, ṭhapetvā aṭṭha bhūmiyo;
tika-abh06t:746: Suddhāvāse apāye ca, ṭhapetvā nava bhūmiyo;
tika-abh06t:753: Ṭhapetvā pana sabbāpi, bhūmiyo hi mahaggatā.
tika-abh06t:756: Aṭṭha cittāni jāyante, sadā sattasu bhūmisu.
tika-abh06t:759: Cattāri pana cittāni, tīsu tīsveva bhūmisu.
tika-abh06t:773: Neva jāyanti jāyanti, asīti hadayā sadā.
tika-abh06t:779: Imehi saha cittehi, tayo maggā phaladvayaṃ.
tika-abh06t:782: Cattāro heṭṭhimā pākā, suddhāvāse na labbhare.
tika-abh06t:787: Domanassādimaggo ca, kriyā ca dve ahetukā;
tika-abh06t:804: Sabbe mahaggatā ceva, sabbepi ca anāsavā;
tika-abh06t:805: Tihetukā vipākā ca, kāme nava kriyāpi ca.
tika-abh06t:807: Duhetuno na jāyanti, cattālīsaṃ tathāṭṭha ca;
tika-abh06t:826: Dutiyaṃ ca phalaṃ hitvā, yāni cittāni tāniti;
tika-abh06t:829: Kati cittāni jāyante, kāme arahato pana;
tika-abh06t:833: Maggacittaṃ siyā tesaṃ, ekacittakkhaṇā hi te.
tika-abh06t:842: Aṭṭhārasa kriyā ceva, aṭṭha lokuttarāni ca.
tika-abh06t:845: Etāni catupaññāsa, cittāni na ca labbhare.
tika-abh06t:884: Tathā vehapphale cāpi, sabbesaṃ honti mānasā.
tika-abh06t:904: Honti tevīsa cittāni, iti vatvā vibhāvaye;
tika-abh06t:952: Ādimaggo tayo pākā, āruppā ca tathūpari;
tika-abh06t:961: Attano attano pākā, cattāro ca anāsavā;
tika-abh06t:965: Catassopi ca āruppā, teraseva kriyā siyuṃ.
tika-abh06t:1003: Tiṇṇaṃ puthujjanānaṃ tu, pañceva pana jāyare;
tika-abh06t:1007: Ekameva bhave tesaṃ, iti vatvā vibhāvaye.
tika-abh06t:1009: Mayā bhavesu cittānaṃ, puggalānaṃ vasena ca;
tika-abh06t:1023: Sadā sādhu cinteti vāceti yo taṃ,
tika-abh06t:1031: Dassayissāmahaṃ tena, vinā natthi hi sambhavo.
tika-abh06t:1033: Rūpaṃ saddaṃ gandhaṃ rasaṃ, phoṭṭhabbaṃ dhammameva ca;
tika-abh06t:1063: Te dhammārammaṇā honti, yesaṃ rūpādayo kira.
tika-abh06t:1066: Neva paccanubhontānaṃ, mano tesaṃ tu gocaraṃ.
tika-abh06t:1074: Yaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ hontaṃ, taṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ kathaṃ;
tika-abh06t:1075: Evaṃ sati panetesaṃ, niyamoti kathaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t:1089: Nārūpaṃ na ca paññattiṃ, nātītaṃ na canāgataṃ;
tika-abh06t:1090: Ārammaṇaṃ karonte ca, vattamāno hi gocaro.
tika-abh06t:1119: Yāni vuttāvasesāni, cittāni pana tāni hi;
tika-abh06t:1141: Kāmato ca kriyā pañca, rūpato pañcamī kriyā;
tika-abh06t:1145: Sakkonti gocaraṃ kātuṃ, kati cittāni me vada.
tika-abh06t:1155: Cittesu pana sabbesu, kati cittāni me vada;
tika-abh06t:1158: Sabbesu pana cittesu, cha ca cittāni me suṇa;
tika-abh06t:1162: Kriyābhiññā manodhātu, cha ca sakkonti gocaraṃ.
tika-abh06t:1165: Nārahattaṃ phalaṃ maggaṃ, kātuṃ sakkonti gocaraṃ.
tika-abh06t:1168: Puthujjanā vā sekkhā vā, na sakkonti hi jānituṃ.
tika-abh06t:1190: Etesaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ, channaṃ ārammaṇaṃ siyā.
tika-abh06t:1193: Pañcannaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ, honti ārammaṇāni hi.
tika-abh06t:1204: Catunnaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ, hoti ārammaṇaṃ sadā;
tika-abh06t:1231: Yaṃ kriyāmānasaṃ rūpe, kāmapākaṃ tato vinā;
tika-abh06t:1232: Pañcannaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ, hoti ārammaṇaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:1255: Rūpārammaṇikā dve tu, dve dve saddhādigocarā;
tika-abh06t:1271: Na puññassa na pākassa, hoti ārammaṇaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:1277: Kusalaṃ kusalassāpi, vipākassa ca taṃ siyā.
tika-abh06t:1280: Ārammaṇaṃ tidhā hoti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā.
tika-abh06t:1282: Kriyassāpi kriyā hoti, kusalampi kriyassa ca;
tika-abh06t:1283: Kusalaṃ tu vipākassa, evaṃ hoti tidhā pana.
tika-abh06t:1286: Evameva dvidhā ceva, tidhā cārammaṇaṃ siyā.
tika-abh06t:1308: Tīsu dvāresu kammāni, vipākā chasu dissare.
tika-abh06t:1311: Taṃ taṃ paccayamāgamma, dadāti vividhaṃ phalaṃ.
tika-abh06t:1319: Duhetukaṃ tu yaṃ kammaṃ, taṃ na deti tihetukaṃ;
tika-abh06t:1359: Yadā hi dutiyaṃ cittaṃ, kusalaṃ javanaṃ tadā;
tika-abh06t:1365: Yadā hi tatiyaṃ puññaṃ, javanaṃ hoti tena ca;
tika-abh06t:1369: Iminā pana saddhiṃ cha, purimāni ca pañcapi.
tika-abh06t:1371: Yadā catutthaṃ kusalaṃ, javanaṃ hoti tena ca;
tika-abh06t:1372: Tulyaṃ catutthaṃ pākaṃ tu, tadārammaṇataṃ vaje.
tika-abh06t:1375: Purimāni cha pākāni, iminā honti satta tu.
tika-abh06t:1404: Kamme āyūhite tesaṃ, vipākehi ca tīhipi;
tika-abh06t:1405: Eseva ca nayo tehi, dinnāya paṭisandhiyā.
tika-abh06t:1410: Dassetabbā tappacchā tu, iṭṭhasmiṃ gocare idha;
tika-abh06t:1411: Ekekasmiṃ pana dvāre, dvādasa dvādaseva tu.
tika-abh06t:1417: Bhavatīti ayaṃ vāro, vutto ettāvatā mayā.
tika-abh06t:1419: Sandhimekaṃ tu kammekaṃ, janeti na tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:1422: Ekasmā hi yathā bījā, jāyate ekamaṅkuraṃ;
tika-abh06t:1426: Hotīti hi ayaṃ vāro, anupubbena āgato.
tika-abh06t:1431: Tena tulyena pākena, gahitā paṭisandhi ce;
tika-abh06t:1453: Imāni ca bhavaṅgāni, cakkhudvāre panaṭṭha hi.
tika-abh06t:1468: Hotītipi ayaṃ vāro, vutto ettāvatā mayā.
tika-abh06t:1471: Hotīti ca ayaṃ vāro, anupubbena āgato.
tika-abh06t:1479: Paṭisandhi na vattabbā, sā kammasadisāti hi;
tika-abh06t:1501: Purimāni ca tīṇīti, cattārova bhavanti hi.
tika-abh06t:1503: Evaṃ cattāri cittāni, dvāresupi ca pañcasu;
tika-abh06t:1512: Jātā sugatiyaṃ yena, pākena paṭisandhi tu;
tika-abh06t:1513: Tena tulyampi hīnaṃ vā, tadārammaṇakaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t:1518: Thero nerayikānaṃ tu, dhammaṃ deseti vassati;
tika-abh06t:1519: Gandhaṃ vāyuñca māpeti, yadā tesaṃ tadā pana.
tika-abh06t:1521: Theraṃ disvā ca sutvā ca, dhammaṃ gandhañca ghāyataṃ;
tika-abh06t:1522: Pivatañca jalaṃ vāyuṃ, phusataṃ mudumeva ca.
tika-abh06t:1531: Kusalaṃ pana sandhāya, taṃ vuttanti hi dīpitaṃ.
tika-abh06t:1567: Na hoti kiṃ nu kātabbaṃ, vada tvaṃ ābhidhammika.
tika-abh06t:1572: Āvajjanaṃ kimassāti, natthi taṃ jāyate kathaṃ;
tika-abh06t:1576: Phalacittassa vā evaṃ, natthi āvajjanaṃ kira.
tika-abh06t:1581: Vinā ārammaṇeneva, na hi jāyati mānasaṃ;
tika-abh06t:1585: Cittassa ca niyāmoti, ñeyyā pañca niyāmatā.
tika-abh06t:1594: Vipākaṃ tu yato deti, ayaṃ kammaniyāmatā.
tika-abh06t:1611: Idāni pana sabbesaṃ, etesaṃ mānasaṃ mayā;
tika-abh06t:1621: Gantvā suttānusārena, yūsaṃ pivati tassa sā.
tika-abh06t:1627: Cittaṃ pana ca daṭṭhabbaṃ, majjhe makkaṭako viya.
tika-abh06t:1644: Idaṃ tu pana opammaṃ, atthaṃ dīpeti kiṃ tu hi;
tika-abh06t:1648: Tato hi paṭhamaṃyeva, jāyatīti hi dīpitaṃ.
tika-abh06t:1656: Khago yathā hi rukkhagge, nilīyantova sākhino;
tika-abh06t:1657: Sākhaṃ ghaṭṭeti tassīdha, chāyā pharati bhūmiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:1662: Evameva ca rūpassa, pasādassa ca ghaṭṭanaṃ;
tika-abh06t:1720: Bhavaṃ tu pañcavokāraṃ, sandhāya kathito pana.
tika-abh06t:1723: Kāme dasa ca rūpesu, pañca cattārirūpisu.
tika-abh06t:1731: Aṭṭheva ca mahāpākā, tīṇi santīraṇāni ca;
tika-abh06t:1738: Kāme rūpe bhave ceva, hoti santīraṇattayaṃ.
tika-abh06t:1744: Kasmā na hoti ce tattha, bījassābhāvato pana.
tika-abh06t:1747: Rūpādigocare tassa, bhaveyya janakaṃ tu yaṃ.
tika-abh06t:1762: Hutvā vattanti te cāpi, idaṃ nevānubandhati.
tika-abh06t:1767: Kiṃ tena yuttivādena, vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu hi;
tika-abh06t:1779: Tathā mahaggate dhamme, ārabbha javane pana;
tika-abh06t:1786: Kathaṃ bhavaṅgato hoti, vuṭṭhānaṃ pana cetaso.
tika-abh06t:1789: Ghaṭṭanāya vinā tasmā, cittānaṃ hoti sambhavo.
tika-abh06t:1797: Kriyacittesu sabbesu, javanaṃ na ca hoti yaṃ;
tika-abh06t:1804: Yo dhammo yassa dhammassa, ṭhitiyuppattiyāpi vā.
tika-abh06t:1806: Upakāro hi so tassa, paccayoti pavuccati;
tika-abh06t:1810: Hetūti pana so dhammo, viññātabbo vibhāvinā.
tika-abh06t:1823: Na hi te pana rūpānaṃ, sādhenti kusalādikaṃ;
tika-abh06t:1824: Na tesaṃ pana rūpānaṃ, paccayā na ca honti te.
tika-abh06t:1856: Chando cittañca vīriyaṃ, vīmaṃsā cāti satthunā;
tika-abh06t:1859: Chandaṃ tu jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā, chandaṃ katvā dhuraṃ pana;
tika-abh06t:1862: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, sesesupi ca tīsupi;
tika-abh06t:1880: Tayo bhavā catasso ca, yoniyo gatipañcakaṃ;
tika-abh06t:1887: Dvedhā hi paccayā tesaṃ, bhavanti paṭisandhiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:1895: Aṭṭhannaṃ tu parittānaṃ, kāme duggatiyaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:1896: Pavatte paccayā honti, na honti paṭisandhiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:1907: Channaṃ pana pavatteva, honti no paṭisandhiyaṃ;
tika-abh06t:1910: Kāme sugatiyaṃ tesaṃ, sattannampi tatheva ca;
tika-abh06t:1911: Pavatte paccayā honti, na honti paṭisandhiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:1914: Pavatte paccayā honti, na honti paṭisandhiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:1923: Yathā ca paccayā honti, tathā ñeyyā vibhāvinā.
tika-abh06t:1925: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, yoniādīsu tatridaṃ;
tika-abh06t:1929: Datvāna paṭisandhiṃ tu, sabbapākaṃ janeti so.
tika-abh06t:1949: Ekissā yoniyā ceva, ekissā gatiyāpi ca.
tika-abh06t:1952: Catunnaṃ pākacittānaṃ, dvedhā so hoti paccayo.
tika-abh06t:1961: Tato hetuṃ vinā tassa, pātubhāvo na vijjati.
tika-abh06t:1967: Na ca satto na ca jīvo, na attā vāpi vijjati.
tika-abh06t:1978: Vatthusannissitaṃ cittaṃ, hoti tasmiṃ khaṇepi ca;
tika-abh06t:1985: Taṇhā nameti saṅkhārā, khipanti sahajā pana.
tika-abh06t:1987: Na mīyamānaṃ taṇhāya, taṃ santativasā pana;
tika-abh06t:1994: Purimaṃ cavanaṃ ettha, pacchimaṃ paṭisandhi tu.
tika-abh06t:1997: Kammādiñca vinā hetuṃ, pātubhūtaṃ na ceva taṃ.
tika-abh06t:1999: Ettha cetassa cittassa, purimā bhavato pana;
tika-abh06t:2011: Athāpi pana ekanta-nānatā sā bhaveyya ce;
tika-abh06t:2012: Khīrasāmī naro neva, dadhisāmī bhaveyya so.
tika-abh06t:2021: Paratthāgamato ceva, idha tassa katassa hi.
tika-abh06t:2023: Aññassa aññato ceva, kammato taṃ phalaṃ siyā;
tika-abh06t:2024: Tasmā na sundaraṃ etaṃ, vidhānaṃ sabbameva ca.
tika-abh06t:2027: Santāne yaṃ phalaṃ etaṃ, nāññassa na ca aññato;
tika-abh06t:2030: Ekasmiṃ pana santāne, vattamānaṃ phalaṃ pana;
tika-abh06t:2031: Aññassātipi vā neva, aññato vā na hoti taṃ.
tika-abh06t:2037: Madhuro phalaso tassa, hoti kālantare pana.
tika-abh06t:2039: Na hi tāni hi bījāni, abhisaṅkharaṇampi vā;
tika-abh06t:2045: Evaṃ santepi taṃ kammaṃ, vijjamānampi vā pana;
tika-abh06t:2051: Atha vāvijjamānaṃ taṃ, niruddhaṃ paccayo bhave;
tika-abh06t:2055: Kaṭattā paccayo kammaṃ, tasmā niccaphalaṃ na ca;
tika-abh06t:2058: Kaṭattāyeva taṃ kammaṃ, phalassa pana paccayo;
tika-abh06t:2071: Yaṃ ruppatīti rūpanti, tathā rūpayatīti vā;
tika-abh06t:2085: Cakkhu sotañca ghānañca, jivhā kāyo ca rūpatā;
tika-abh06t:2097: Pathavī patthaṭattā ca, vāyo vāyanato bhave;
tika-abh06t:2098: Tejo tejeti rūpāni, āpo āpeti pālanā.
tika-abh06t:2101: Lakkhaṇādīsu ñātesu, dhammā āvi bhavanti hi.
tika-abh06t:2103: Sāmaññaṃ vā sabhāvo vā, dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ mataṃ;
tika-abh06t:2104: Kiccaṃ vā tassa sampatti, rasoti paridīpito.
tika-abh06t:2108_3: samudīraṇarasā, abhinīhārapaccupaṭṭhānā. Ekekāya cettha sesabhūtattayapadaṭṭhānāti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:2112: Tattha paññāmayaṃ cakkhu, hoti pañcavidhaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:2132: Bahiddhā akkhilomehi, paricchinno ca yo pana;
tika-abh06t:2135: Sakalopi ca lokoyaṃ, kamalassa dalaṃ viya;
tika-abh06t:2136: Puthulaṃ vipulaṃ nīlaṃ, iti jānāti locanaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2138: Cakkhu nāma na taṃ hoti, vatthu tassāti vuccati;
tika-abh06t:2156: Cakkhu kāyappasādo ca, bhāvo jīvitameva ca;
tika-abh06t:2157: Cattālīsañca rūpāni, cattāri tu bhavanti hi.
tika-abh06t:2162: Yo panettha sito atthi, paribandho parittako;
tika-abh06t:2166: Tadetaṃ tassa majjhe tu, sasambhārassa cakkhuno.
tika-abh06t:2184: Sotādīsu ca eseva, nayo ñeyyo vibhāvinā;
tika-abh06t:2186_0: Suṇātīti sotaṃ, taṃ tanutambalomācite aṅgulivedhakasaṇṭhāne padese vuttappakārāhi
tika-abh06t:2186_1: dhātūhi katūpakāraṃ utucittāhārehi upatthambhiyamānaṃ āyunā paripāliyamānaṃ sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ
tika-abh06t:2187: Ghāyatīti ghānaṃ, taṃ sasambhāraghānabilassa anto ajapadasaṇṭhāne padese yathāvuttappakārā hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh06t:2188: Sāyatīti jivhā, jīvitamavhāyatīti vā jivhā, sā sasambhārajivhāmajjhassa upari uppaladalaggasaṇṭhāne padese yathāvuttappakārā hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh06t:2189: Kucchitānaṃ malānaṃ āyoti kāyo. Yāvatā pana imasmiṃ kāye upādinnakaṃ rūpaṃ atthi, sabbattha kāyapasādo kappāsapaṭale sneho viya yathāvuttappakāro hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh06t:2191: Sotukāmatānidānakammasamuṭṭhānabhūtapasādalakkhaṇaṃ sotaṃ, saddesu āviñchanarasaṃ, sotaviññāṇassa ādhārabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, sotukāmatānidānakammajabhūtapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2200: Te panevaṃ tu vattabbā, “suttaṃ āharathā”ti hi;
tika-abh06t:2201: Suttameva ca te addhā, na dakkhissanti kiñcipi.
tika-abh06t:2203: Visese sati bhūtānaṃ, pasādo hi kathaṃ bhave;
tika-abh06t:2210: Na hi bhūtavisesena, hoti tesaṃ visesatā.
tika-abh06t:2214_0: Rūpanti rūpayatīti rūpaṃ, vaṇṇavikāramāpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti attho.
tika-abh06t:2214_1: Taṃ pana cakkhupaṭihananalakkhaṇaṃ, cakkhuviññāṇassa visayabhāvarasaṃ, tasseva gocarabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh06t:2214_2: catumahābhūtapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Yathā cetaṃ, tathā sabbānipi upādārūpānīti.
tika-abh06t:2215: Saddoti saddayatīti saddo, so pana sotapaṭihananalakkhaṇo, sotaviññāṇassa visayabhāvaraso, tasseva gocarabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh06t:2216: Rasoti rasanti tenāti raso, so jivhāpaṭihananalakkhaṇo, jivhāviññāṇassa visayabhāvaraso, tasseva gocarabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh06t:2217: Gandhoti attānaṃ gandhayati sūcayatīti gandho, so ghānapaṭihananalakkhaṇo, ghānaviññāṇassa visayabhāvaraso, tasseva gocarabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh06t:2221: Yañcetaṃ itthiliṅgādi, na tu taṃ indriyaṃ siyā.
tika-abh06t:2226: Na ca taṃ cakkhuviññeyyaṃ, manoviññeyyameva taṃ;
tika-abh06t:2227: Itthiliṅgādayo cakkhuviññeyyā honti vā na vā.
tika-abh06t:2229: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, sesepi purisindriye;
tika-abh06t:2242: Evaṃ sante abhāvo ca, dutiyabyañjanassa tu.
tika-abh06t:2244: Na cābhāvo siyā kasmā, na taṃ byañjanakāraṇaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2245: Tassa kammasahāyaṃ hi, rāgacittaṃ tu kāraṇaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2246: Ubhayassa panetassa lakkhaṇādīni vuccati. Tattha itthibhāvalakkhaṇaṃ itthindriyaṃ, “itthī”ti pakāsanarasaṃ, itthiliṅganimittakuttākappānaṃ kāraṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2252: Lakkhaṇādīni panassa evaṃ veditabbāni. Sahajarūpaparipālanalakkhaṇaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ, tesaṃ pavattanarasaṃ, tesameva ṭhapanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, yāpayitabbabhūtapadaṭṭhānanti.
tika-abh06t:2257: Manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayalakkhaṇaṃ hadayavatthu, tāsañceva dhātūnaṃ ādhāraṇarasaṃ, ubbāhanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2258: Āhāratāti kabaḷīkāro āhāro. Ojaṭṭhamakaṃ rūpaṃ āharatīti āhāro.
tika-abh06t:2260: Yāya ojāya yāpenti, yattha yattha ca pāṇino;
tika-abh06t:2264: Kevalaṃ na ca sakkoti, pāletuṃ jīvitaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:2266: Ojā sakkoti pāletuṃ, harituṃ na ca pācakaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2267: Haritumpi ca pāletuṃ, ubho sakkonti ekato.
tika-abh06t:2268: Lakkhaṇādito panassa ojālakkhaṇo kabaḷīkāro āhāro, rūpāharaṇaraso, upatthambhanapaccupaṭṭhāno, kabaḷaṃ katvā ajjhoharitabbavatthupadaṭṭhānoti veditabbo.
tika-abh06t:2269_0: Kāyaviññattiniddese kāyena attano bhāvaṃ viññāpentānaṃ kāyaggahaṇānusārena gahitāya
tika-abh06t:2269_1: etāya bhāvo viññāyatīti viññatti. Sayaṃ vā kāyaggahaṇānusārena viññāyatītipi viññatti.
tika-abh06t:2269_2: “Kāyena saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu vācāya saṃvaro”ti āgato copanasaṅkhāto kāyova viññatti
tika-abh06t:2269_3: kāyaviññatti. Kāyavipphandanena adhippāyaviññāpanahetuttā sayañca tathā viññeyyattā
tika-abh06t:2293: Saddo na cittajo atthi, vinā viññattighaṭṭanaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2296: Sā viññāpanato ceva, ayaṃ viññeyyatopi ca;
tika-abh06t:2299: Na viññattidvayaṃ aṭṭha, rūpāni viya cittajaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2303: Na kassatīti ākāso, rūpānaṃ vivaro pana;
tika-abh06t:2305: So rūpaparicchedalakkhaṇo, rūpapariyantapakāsanaraso, rūpamariyādapaccupaṭṭhāno, asamphuṭṭhabhāvachiddavivarabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno vā, paricchinnarūpapadaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh06t:2311: Etāsaṃ pana tissannaṃ, kamato ca pavattiyaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2314: Kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, lahutādittayaṃ pana;
tika-abh06t:2316: Tattha adandhatālakkhaṇā rūpassa lahutā, rūpānaṃ garubhāvavinodanarasā, lahuparivattitāpaccupaṭṭhānā, lahurūpapadaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh06t:2317: Athaddhatālakkhaṇā rūpassa mudutā, rūpānaṃ thaddhabhāvavinodanarasā, sabbakiriyāsu avirodhitāpaccupaṭṭhānā, mudurūpapadaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh06t:2318: Sarīrakiriyānukūlakammaññatālakkhaṇā rūpassa kammaññatā, akammaññatāvinodanarasā, adubbalabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, kammaññatārūpapadaṭṭhānā. Etā pana tissopi na aññamaññaṃ vijahanti.
tika-abh06t:2321: Rūpānamācayo yo hi, vutto upacayoti so;
tika-abh06t:2326: Lakkhaṇādito pana ācayalakkhaṇo rūpassa upacayo, pubbantato rūpānaṃ ummujjāpanaraso, niyyātanapaccupaṭṭhāno, paripuṇṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno vā, upacitarūpapadaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh06t:2327: Pavattilakkhaṇā rūpassa santati, anuppabandhanarasā, anupacchedapaccupaṭṭhānā, anuppabandharūpapadaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh06t:2332: Rūpassa paripākatālakkhaṇā rūpassa jaratā, upanayanarasā, sabhāvānaṃ apagamepi nasabhāvāpagamapaccupaṭṭhānā vīhipurāṇabhāvo viya, paripaccamānarūpapadaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh06t:2333: Paribhedalakkhaṇā rūpassa aniccatā, saṃsīdanarasā, khayavayapaccupaṭṭhānā, paribhijjamānarūpapadaṭṭhānāti veditabbāti.
tika-abh06t:2344_0: Tattha samodhānanti sabbameva idaṃ rūpaṃ sabbasamodhānato pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu
tika-abh06t:2344_1: vāyodhātu cakkhāyatanaṃ…pe… jaratā aniccatāti aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ ca hoti, ito aññaṃ
tika-abh06t:2344_2: rūpaṃ nāma natthi. Keci pana middhavādino “middharūpaṃ nāma atthī”ti vadanti, te
tika-abh06t:2344_3: “addhā munīsi sambuddho, natthi nīvaraṇā tavā”ti ca “thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇañca
tika-abh06t:2344_5: paṭicca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā”ti arūpepi “kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ
tika-abh06t:2348_0: Apare “balarūpena saddhiṃ ekūnatiṃsa, sambhavarūpena saddhiṃ tiṃsa, jātirūpena saddhiṃ
tika-abh06t:2348_1: ekatiṃsa, rogarūpena saddhiṃ dvattiṃsa rūpānī”ti vadanti. Tepi tesaṃ visuṃ visuṃ
tika-abh06t:2348_2: abhāvaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhipitabbā. Vāyodhātuyā gahitāya balarūpaṃ gahitameva, aññaṃ
tika-abh06t:2348_3: balarūpaṃ nāma natthi. Āpodhātuyā sambhavarūpaṃ, upacayasantatīti jātirūpaṃ, jaratāaniccatādīhi
tika-abh06t:2348_4: rogarūpaṃ gahitaṃ, aññaṃ rogarūpaṃ nāma natthīti, tasmā aṭṭhavīsatividhāneva rūpānīti.
tika-abh06t:2352: Kammaṃ utu ca cittañca, āhāro rūpahetuyo;
tika-abh06t:2353: Eteheva ca rūpāni, jāyanti na panaññato.
tika-abh06t:2361: Cittena utunā ceva, saddo dvīhi samuṭṭhito;
tika-abh06t:2374: Kammena vīsati rūpā, sattarasa tu cetasā;
tika-abh06t:2383: Evaṃ sante tu tesampi, pākabhedā siyuṃ na hi;
tika-abh06t:2384: Pāko paccati bhedo vā, na ca bhijjati natthi taṃ.
tika-abh06t:2392: Na ceva jāyate jāti, iti ñeyyā vibhāvinā;
tika-abh06t:2395: Tattha yathā siyā jāti, yesaṃ dhammānameva sā;
tika-abh06t:2398: Labhateva tathā tesaṃ, pākabhedā labbhanti te;
tika-abh06t:2402: Na pākabhedā vohāraṃ, taṃ labhanti kadācipi.
tika-abh06t:2408: Tasmā labhati jāti ca, labhatī netaradvayaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2410: Jiyyatīti na vattabbaṃ, taṃ dvayaṃ bhijjatīti vā;
tika-abh06t:2414: Vuttattā jāyaticcetaṃ, atha maññasi ce tuvaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2416: Evampi ca na vattabbaṃ, sā hi pariyāyadesanā;
tika-abh06t:2420: Yadi evaṃ tayametaṃ, ajātattā ca sabbathā.
tika-abh06t:2422: Natthīti ce khaṃpupphaṃva, niccaṃ vāsaṅkhataṃ viya;
tika-abh06t:2426: Tasmā hi ca khaṃpupphaṃva, na natthi pana taṃ tayaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2429: Tasmā na pana niccaṃ vā, nibbānaṃ viya taṃ tayaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2430_1: aṭṭhārasa rūpāni nipphannāni nāma. Sesāni dasa anipphannāni nāma.
tika-abh06t:2433: Yadi honti anipphannā, bhaveyyuṃ te asaṅkhatā.
tika-abh06t:2436: Kathaṃ nāma bhaveyyuṃ te, nipphannā ceva saṅkhatā.
tika-abh06t:2443: Evaṃ sante tu dhammānaṃ, hoti saṅkaradosatā;
tika-abh06t:2446: Aññaṃ pana ca aññasmiṃ, na catthi paramatthato;
tika-abh06t:2450: Tesaṃ ṭhānantaraṃ vattuṃ, na sakkā samayaññunā.
tika-abh06t:2458: Tasmā hi pana dhammānaṃ, aññamaññaṃ vimissatā;
tika-abh06t:2478: Sesāni pana rūpāni, sukhumāni tu soḷasa;
tika-abh06t:2481_1: ca tividhaṃ. Tattha rūpāyatanaṃ sanidassanasappaṭighaṃ, ekādasavidhaṃ sesoḷārikarūpaṃ
tika-abh06t:2481_2: anidassanasappaṭighaṃ, sesaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ sukhumarūpaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ. Kammato
tika-abh06t:2481_3: jātaṃ kammajaṃ, aṭṭhindriyāni, vatthu ca kammajaṃ, tadaññappaccayā jātaṃ akammajaṃ,
tika-abh06t:2481_4: nakutoci jātaṃ nevakammajānākammajaṃ jaratā aniccatā ca. Evaṃ tividhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t:2482_0: Puna diṭṭhasutamutaviññātavasena ca, dvārañceva vatthu ca, dvārameva hutvā na vatthu
tika-abh06t:2482_1: ca, vatthumeva hutvā na dvārañca, neva dvārañca na vatthu cāti evaṃ bhedato ca, dvārañcevindriyañca,
tika-abh06t:2482_2: dvāraṃyeva hutvā nevindriyañca, indriyameva hutvā na dvārañca, neva dvārañca nevindriyañcāti
tika-abh06t:2482_3: evaṃ bhedato ca, vatthu ceva indriyañca, indriyameva hutvā na vatthu ca, vatthumeva
tika-abh06t:2482_4: hutvā nevindriyañca, nevindriyaṃ na vatthu ceti evaṃ bhedato ca catubbidhaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2483_0: Tattha diṭṭhaṃ nāma rūpāyatanaṃ, sutaṃ nāma saddāyatanaṃ, mutaṃ nāma gandharasaphoṭṭhabbāyatanattayaṃ,
tika-abh06t:2483_1: viññātaṃ nāma avasesacakkhāyatanādipañcakaṃ, soḷasavidhaṃ sukhumarūpañca. Cakkhāyatanādipañcakaṃ
tika-abh06t:2483_2: dvārañceva vatthu ca, viññattidvayaṃ dvārameva hoti, na vatthu, hadayavatthu vatthumeva
tika-abh06t:2483_3: hoti, na dvāraṃ, sesaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ neva dvāraṃ na vatthu ca. Tatiyacatukke indriyameva
tika-abh06t:2483_4: hutvā na dvāranti itthindriyapurisindriyajīvitindriyāni. Imāni hi indriyāneva honti,
tika-abh06t:2483_5: na dvārāni, sesamanantaracatukke vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Catutthacatukke tatiyapadaṃ
tika-abh06t:2483_6: hadayavatthuṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Evaṃ catubbidhaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2484_0: Puna ekajadvijatijacatujanakutocijātabhedato, dvārindriyaṃ vatthu ca, dvārameva hutvā
tika-abh06t:2484_1: nevindriyaṃ na vatthu ca, vatthumeva hutvā nevindriyaṃ na dvārañca, indriyameva hutvā
tika-abh06t:2484_2: na vatthu na dvārañca, nevindriyaṃ na vatthu na dvārañcāti evaṃ pabhedato pañcavidhaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2490: Saddo eko dvijo nāma, lahutādittayaṃ tijaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2496: Viññattīnaṃ dvayaṃ dvāraṃ, nevindriyaṃ na vatthu ca;
tika-abh06t:2497: Hadayavatthu vatthūva, na dvāraṃ nevindriyaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:2498: Itthipurisajīvitindriyāni indriyameva na vatthu na dvārañca, sesaṃ pana rūpaṃ nevindriyaṃ na vatthu na dvāranti. Evaṃ pañcavidhanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2500_0: Tattha aṭṭhindriyāni vatthu ca kammajameva, viññattidvayaṃ cittajameva, saddo utucittajo,
tika-abh06t:2500_1: lahutādittayaṃ utucittāhārajameva, sesaṃ ekādasavidhaṃ catujaṃ nāma, jaratā aniccatā
tika-abh06t:2500_2: nakutocijātaṃ nāma. Dutiyachakke cakkhuviññeyyaṃ nāma cakkhuviññāṇena viññeyyaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ…pe…
tika-abh06t:2500_3: kāyaviññeyyaṃ nāma phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, manoviññeyyaṃ nāma sesā pañca oḷārikā ca soḷasa
tika-abh06t:2500_4: sukhumarūpāni cāti ekavīsatividhaṃ hoti. Evaṃ chabbidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t:2501: Puna chavatthuavatthubhedato ca, cakkhuviññeyyaṃ sotaghānajivhākāyaviññeyyaṃ manodhātuviññeyyaṃ manoviññāṇadhātuviññeyyanti sattavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t:2502: Tattha cakkhādipañcavatthūni hadayavatthunā saddhiṃ cha vatthūni, sesaṃ bāvīsatividhaṃ rūpaṃ avatthu nāma, dutiyasattakamuttānameva. Evaṃ sattavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t:2503: Puna sattadvārādvārabhedato aṭṭhavidhaṃ. Tattha cakkhudvārādīni pañca kāyaviññattivacīviññattidvārehi saddhiṃ satta dvārāni, sesamadvāranti evaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t:2513: Yoniyo purimā tisso, na santīti viniddise.
tika-abh06t:2525: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, sabbesu dasakesupi.
tika-abh06t:2533: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, saddhiṃ bhāvena vatthunā;
tika-abh06t:2534: Cakkhādīhi ca yojetvā, dasakā satta viññunā.
tika-abh06t:2539: Cakkhu sotañca ghānañca, jivhā kāyo ca vatthu ca;
tika-abh06t:2540: Bhāvo cāti hi sattannaṃ, dasakānaṃ vasā pana.
tika-abh06t:2543: Dasakāni ca tīṇeva, navakaṃ jīvitassa ca.
tika-abh06t:2545: Catunnaṃ tu kalāpānaṃ, vasena pana rūpinaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2560: Ghānaṃ jivhā ca kāyo ca, tathā bhāvadvayampi ca;
tika-abh06t:2561: Brahmānaṃ pana rūpīnaṃ, pañca rūpā na vijjare.
tika-abh06t:2566: Rūpaṃ nibbattamānaṃ tu, sabbesaṃ pana pāṇinaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2572: Yatheva tassa uppāde, tiṃsa rūpāni jāyare;
tika-abh06t:2578: Rogato gaṇḍato rūpaṃ, parato ca palokato;
tika-abh06t:2579: Disvāna dukkhato rūpaṃ, rūpe chandaṃ virājaye.
tika-abh06t:2595_0: Tattha nibbānanti bhavābhavaṃ vinanato vānaṃ vuccati taṇhā, vānato nikkhantattā nibbānanti
tika-abh06t:2595_1: ca pavuccati amataṃ asaṅkhataṃ paramaṃ sukhaṃ. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ “yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho
tika-abh06t:2599: Etaṃ ca nibbānaṃ nāma tayidaṃ santilakkhaṇaṃ, accutirasaṃ, assāsakaraṇarasaṃ vā, animittapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, nissaraṇapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ vāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2600_0: Etthāha – na paramatthato nibbānaṃ nāma eko sabhāvo atthi, titthiyānaṃ attā viya,
tika-abh06t:2600_1: sasavisāṇaṃ viya ca anupalabbhanīyatoti? Na, paññācakkhunā upaparikkhiyamānānaṃ hitagavesīnaṃ
tika-abh06t:2600_2: yathānurūpāya paṭipattiyā upalabbhanīyato. Yaṃ hi puthujjanā nopalabbhanti, taṃ “natthī”ti
tika-abh06t:2600_3: na vattabbaṃ. Athāyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā “katamaṃ nu kho, āvuso,
tika-abh06t:2600_4: nibbāna”nti nibbānaṃ puṭṭhena “yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo”ti
tika-abh06t:2600_5: rāgādīnaṃ khayova dassito, tasmā rāgādīnaṃ khayamattameva nibbānanti ce? Taṃ na.
tika-abh06t:2600_6: Kasmā? Arahattassāpi rāgādīnaṃ khayamattapasaṅgadosāpattito. Kathaṃ? Nibbānaṃ pucchānantarameva
tika-abh06t:2600_7: “katamaṃ nu kho, āvuso, arahatta”nti puṭṭhena “yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo
tika-abh06t:2600_8: mohakkhayo”ti rāgādīnaṃ khayova vutto, tasmā tava matena arahattaphalassāpi rāgādīnaṃ
tika-abh06t:2600_9: khayamattatā bhaveyya, na cetaṃ yuttaṃ anuttarassa lokuttaraphalacittassa rāgānaṃ
tika-abh06t:2600_10: khayamattatāpajjanaṃ, tasmā mā evaṃ byañjanacchāyāya vadesi, ubhinnaṃ pana suttānaṃ
tika-abh06t:2601_0: Yassa pana dhammassādhigamena rāgādīnaṃ khayo hoti, so dhammo rāgādīnaṃ khayassa
tika-abh06t:2601_1: upanissayattā akkhayopi samāno “rāgādīnaṃ khayo nibbāna”nti khayopacārena vutto,
tika-abh06t:2601_2: “tipusaṃ jaro guḷo semho”tiādīsu viya phalūpacārena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Arahattaṃ
tika-abh06t:2601_3: pana khayante uppannattā “khayo”ti vuttaṃ. Yadi rāgādīnaṃ khayamattaṃ nibbānaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-abh06t:2601_4: sabbe bālaputhujjanāpi samadhigatanibbānā sacchikatanirodhā bhaveyyuṃ. Kiñca bhiyyo
tika-abh06t:2601_5: – nibbānassa bahuttādidosāpattito ca. Evañhi sati rāgādikkhayānaṃ bahubhāvato nibbānassāpi
tika-abh06t:2601_6: bahubhāvo bhaveyya, saṅkhatalakkhaṇañca nibbānaṃ bhaveyya, saṅkhatalakkhaṇattā saṅkhatapariyāpannañca,
tika-abh06t:2602_0: Kiñca bhiyyo – yadi khayo nibbānaṃ bhaveyya, gotrabhuvodānamaggaphalacittānaṃ kiṃ
tika-abh06t:2602_1: nu ārammaṇaṃ vadesi, vada bhadramukhāti? Rāgādīnaṃ khayameva vadāmīti. Kiṃ pana rāgādayo
tika-abh06t:2602_2: gotrabhuādīnaṃ khaṇe khīyanti, udāhu khīyissanti, atha khīṇāti? Kiṃ panettha “khīṇesveva
tika-abh06t:2602_3: khayaṃ vadāmī”ti. Suṭṭhu upadhāretvā vada bhadramukhāti, yadi khīṇesveva khayaṃ vadesi,
tika-abh06t:2602_4: na gotrabhucittādīnaṃ nibbānārammaṇatā sijjhatīti. Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Gotrabhukkhaṇe rāgādayo
tika-abh06t:2602_5: khīyissanti, tathā vodānakkhaṇe, maggakkhaṇe pana khīyanti, na khīṇā, phalakkhaṇe
tika-abh06t:2602_6: khīṇā. Evaṃ sante bhavato matena phalameva khayārammaṇaṃ, na itare, itaresaṃ pana
tika-abh06t:2602_7: kimārammaṇaṃ vadesīti? Addhā so ārammaṇaṃ apassanto niruttaro bhavissati. Apica kilesakkhayo
tika-abh06t:2602_8: nāma sappurisehi karīyati, yathānurūpāya paṭipattiyā uppādīyatīti attho. Nibbānaṃ
tika-abh06t:2602_9: pana na kenaci karīyati na uppādīyati, tasmā nibbānamamatamasaṅkhataṃ. Tamakataṃ
tika-abh06t:2608_0: Apica “nissaraṇa”nti bhagavatā vuttattā ca. “Nissaraṇa”nti hi nibbānassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2608_1: Yathāha “tayo khome, bhikkhave, dhammā duppaṭivijjhā. Katame tayo dhammā duppaṭivijjhā?
tika-abh06t:2608_2: Tisso nissaraṇadhātuyo. Kāmānametaṃ nissaraṇaṃ, yadidaṃ nekkhammaṃ. Rūpānametaṃ nissaraṇaṃ,
tika-abh06t:2608_3: yadidaṃ arūpaṃ. Yaṃ kho pana kiñci bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ, nirodho tassa
tika-abh06t:2608_4: nissaraṇa”nti hi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ vuttassa tassa nibbānassa abhāvapattidosato paṭhamajjhānākāsānañcāyatanānampi
tika-abh06t:2608_5: abhāvo bhaveyya, tasmā ayuttaṃ akkhayassa nibbānassa khayadosāpajjananti, na tu khayo nibbānaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2609_0: “Atthi nissaraṇaṃ loke, paññāya me suphusita”nti ca “atthi, bhikkhave, ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ
tika-abh06t:2609_1: akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti ca dhammasāminā tathāgatena sammāsambuddhena anekesu suttantesu
tika-abh06t:2609_2: paramatthavasena vuttattā “atthi nibbānaṃ nāma eko dhammo”ti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2609_3: Apica parittattike “katame dhammā appamāṇā”ti padamuddharitvā – “cattāro maggā apariyāpannā
tika-abh06t:2609_4: cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni nibbānañca, ime dhammā appamāṇā”ti vuttattā rāgādīnaṃ khayassa
tika-abh06t:2609_5: appamāṇattaṃ kathaṃ yujjati, tasmā paramatthato atthiyeva nibbānaṃ nāma eko sabhāvoti.
tika-abh06t:2609_6: Taṃ pana pakativādīnaṃ pakati viya, titthiyānaṃ attā viya ca sasavisāṇaṃ viya ca nāvijjamānaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2610_0: Atha paññattimattaṃ nibbānanti ce, tampi ayuttaṃ. Kasmā? Nibbānārammaṇānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ
tika-abh06t:2610_1: navattabbārammaṇattā. Kathaṃ? Parittārammaṇattike ca pana “katame dhammā appamāṇārammaṇā”ti
tika-abh06t:2610_2: padamuddharitvā “cattāro maggā apariyāpannā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, ime dhammā
tika-abh06t:2610_3: appamāṇārammaṇā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Yadi panetesaṃ paññattiārammaṇaṃ siyā, appamāṇārammaṇatā
tika-abh06t:2610_4: na yujjeyya, navattabbārammaṇapakkhaṃ bhajeyyuṃ. “Navattabbārammaṇā pana rūpāvacarattikacatukkajjhānā
tika-abh06t:2610_5: kusalato ca vipākato ca kiriyato ca, catutthassa jhānassa vipāko, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ
tika-abh06t:2610_6: ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ kusalato ca vipākato ca kiriyato ca, ime dhammā navattabbārammaṇā”ti
tika-abh06t:2610_7: hi vuttaṃ, tasmā na paññattimattaṃ nibbānaṃ. Yasmā ca paṇṇattibhāvo nibbānassa na
tika-abh06t:2610_8: yujjati, tasmā maggaphalānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhūtaṃ uppādādīnamabhāvato niccaṃ, rūpasabhāvābhāvato
tika-abh06t:2610_9: arūpaṃ, papañcābhāvato nippapañcaṃ nibbānaṃ nāma atthīti upagantabbanti.
tika-abh06t:2613: Paṇītaṃ saraṇaṃ khemaṃ, tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2622: Imehi pana nāmehi, nibbānaṃ tu kathīyati.
tika-abh06t:2624: Evañca pana viññāya, nibbānampi ca accutaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2635_0: Etthāha – “kiṃ ettakameva ñeyyaṃ, udāhu aññampi atthī”ti? Atthi paññatti nāmāti.
tika-abh06t:2635_1: Sā panesā paññapetabbato, paññāpanato ca “paññattī”ti vuccati. Tenevāha – “yā tesaṃ
tika-abh06t:2635_2: tesaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti
tika-abh06t:2635_3: byañjanaṃ abhilāpo”ti. Tattha saṅkhāyatīti saṅkhā, kathīyatīti attho. Kinti kathīyati?
tika-abh06t:2635_5: saṅkhā. Samaññāyatīti samaññā. Paññāpīyatīti paññatti. Voharīyatīti vohāro. Kinti
tika-abh06t:2635_7: paññapetabbato paññattīti vuttā. “Aha”nti hi rūpādayo dhamme upādāya paṭicca kāraṇaṃ
tika-abh06t:2635_8: katvā yathā te rūpādayo dhammā uppādavayavanto, na evaṃvidhā, kevalaṃ lokasaṅketena
tika-abh06t:2635_9: siddhā yā ayaṃ “aha”nti kathīyati ceva paññāpīyati ca, esā paññattīti attho.
tika-abh06t:2636_0: Idāni paññāpanato paññattiṃ pakāsetuṃ “nāmaṃ nāmakamma”ntiādimāha. Tattha nāmanti
tika-abh06t:2636_1: taṃ taṃ dhammaṃ “esa itthannāmo nāmā”ti paññapeti, tasmā taṃ paññattīti pavuccati.
tika-abh06t:2636_2: Nāmakammantiādīni tassā eva vevacanāni. Ayaṃ paññāpanato paññatti nāma.
tika-abh06t:2637_0: Sā panesā tajjāpaññatti upādāpaññatti upanidhāpaññattīti tividhā hoti. Tattha tajjāpaññatti
tika-abh06t:2637_2: duvidhā hoti. Tattha samūhapaññatti nāma rūpārūpadhammesu ekassa vā bahūnaṃ vā nāmaṃ
tika-abh06t:2637_3: gahetvā samūhamevopādāya vuccati. Kathaṃ? Acchataracchaghaṭapaṭādippabhedā. Ayaṃ
tika-abh06t:2638_0: Yadā pana sā vijjamānaṃ paramatthaṃ jotayati, tadā “vijjamānapaññattī”ti pavuccati.
tika-abh06t:2638_1: Yadā avijjamānaṃ samūhāsamūhabhedaṃ nāmamattaṃ jotayati, tadā “avijjamānapaññattī”ti
tika-abh06t:2638_3: viññāyati. Yāya gahitapubbasaṅketena manodvārajavanaviññāṇena paññāpīyati. Yaṃ sandhāya
tika-abh06t:2638_6: chakkanayo vutto. Tattha paramatthato vijjamānānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ paññāpanā vijjamānapaññatti.
tika-abh06t:2638_7: Tathā avijjamānānamitthipurisādīnaṃ paññāpanā avijjamānapaññatti. Ṭhapetvā pana vacanatthaṃ
tika-abh06t:2638_8: kenaci ākārena anupalabbhamānānaṃ pañcamasaccādīnaṃ, titthiyaparikappitānaṃ vā pakatipurisādīnaṃ
tika-abh06t:2638_13: evaṃ vuttā cha paññattiyopi ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Ayaṃ upādāpaññatti nāma.
tika-abh06t:2639_0: Upanidhāpaññattipi etissā eva pabhedā, sā pana “dīghaṃ upanidhāya rasso, rassaṃ upanidhāya
tika-abh06t:2639_1: dīgho”tiādinayappavattā “kapaṇaṃ mānusakaṃ rajjaṃ dibbasukhaṃ upanidhāyā”ti evamādikā
tika-abh06t:2639_2: ca, tasmā paññapetabbato ca paññāpanato ca paññattīti veditabbā. Samaññā samattā.
tika-abh06t:2641: Paramatthato ca paññatti, tatiyā koṭi na vijjati;
tika-abh06t:2642: Dvīsu ṭhānesu kusalo, paravādesu na kampati.
tika-abh06t:2647_0: Etthāha – niddiṭṭhā kusalādayo nāma dhammā, na panetesaṃ kārako attā niddiṭṭho. Tassa
tika-abh06t:2647_1: hi kārakassa vedakassa attano abhāve kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhāvo siyā, tesamabhāve
tika-abh06t:2647_2: tadāyattavuttīnaṃ tesaṃ vipākānamabhāvo hoti, tasmā kusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ desanā
tika-abh06t:2647_3: niratthikāti? Atra vuccate – nāyaṃ niratthikā, sātthikāvāyaṃ desanā. Yadi kārakassābhāvā
tika-abh06t:2647_4: kusalādīnamabhāvo siyā, tassa parikappitassa attanopi abhāvo siyā. Kiṃ kāraṇanti
tika-abh06t:2647_5: ce? Tassa attano aññassa kārakassābhāvato. Kārakābhāvepi kattā attā atthīti ce? Tathā
tika-abh06t:2647_6: kusalādīnampi asatipi kattari atthitā upagantabbā, kutoyaṃ tava tatthānurodho, idha
tika-abh06t:2647_7: virodhoti. Athāpi yathā pana loke kārakābhāvepi pathavīāpatejautuādayo paṭicca aṅkurādīnaṃ
tika-abh06t:2647_8: abhinibbatti dissati, tathā etesampi kusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ hetupaccayasāmaggiyā abhinibbatti hotīti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:2648_0: Athāpi cettha tassā paññāya parikappito nicco dhuvo kusalādīnaṃ kattā attā paramatthato
tika-abh06t:2648_1: atthīti ce? Tamupaparikkhissāma tāva, so pana tāva attā kārako vedako kiṃ sacetano
tika-abh06t:2648_2: vā, udāhu acetano vāti? Kiñcettha – yadi acetano siyā, pākāratarupāsāṇasadiso siyā.
tika-abh06t:2648_3: Tassa kārakavedakattābhāvo siyā. Yadi sacetano, so cetanāya añño vā siyā, anañño
tika-abh06t:2648_4: vā. Athānañño, cetanāya nāse attanopi nāso siyā. Kiṃ kāraṇanti ce? Cetanāya anaññattā.
tika-abh06t:2649_0: Athāpi bhavato adhippāyo evaṃ siyā, attano pana nāso na bhavati niccattā, cetanāyayeva
tika-abh06t:2649_1: nāso bhavatīti? Vuccate – attano anāse sati cetanāyapi nāso na bhavati. Kiṃ kāraṇanti
tika-abh06t:2649_2: ce? Cetanāya anaññattā. Cetanattānaṃ anaññatte sati cetanāyayeva nāso bhavati, na
tika-abh06t:2649_3: attanoti ayuttametaṃ. Atha cetanāyayeva vināse visesakāraṇaṃ natthi, attāva nassatu,
tika-abh06t:2649_4: tiṭṭhatu cetanā. Atha cetanāya nāse attano nāso na bhavatīti ce? Cetanāya attā añño
tika-abh06t:2649_5: siyā. Atha aññassa attassa nāse sati sayaṃ nāso na bhavati, evañca sati “cetanāya
tika-abh06t:2649_6: anañño attā”ti tava paṭiññā hīnā. Athāpi cetanattānaṃ anaññatte sati attano anāso
tika-abh06t:2649_7: cetanāyapi anāso bhavatu. Atha na bhavati, paṭiññā hīnā. Atha vuttappakārato viparītaṃ
tika-abh06t:2649_8: vā siyā, attā nassatu, cetanā tiṭṭhatu. Atha pana evaṃ na bhavatīti ce? Anaññattapakkhaṃ
tika-abh06t:2649_9: pariccaja. Atha pana na pariccajasi, paṭiññāhīno bhavasi.
tika-abh06t:2650_0: Athāyaṃ bhavato adhippāyo siyā “nāyaṃ mama attā cetanāya anañño, aññoyevā”ti? Tatra
tika-abh06t:2650_1: vuccate – idha pana aññattaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti lakkhaṇakatamaññattañca desantarakatamaññattañcāti.
tika-abh06t:2650_2: Tattha kiṃ tvaṃ cetanattānaṃ lakkhaṇakatamaññattaṃ vadesi, udāhu desantarakatamaññattanti?
tika-abh06t:2650_3: Ahaṃ lakkhaṇakatamaññattaṃ vadāmīti. Yathā hi rūparasagandhādīnamekadese vattamānānampi
tika-abh06t:2650_4: lakkhaṇato aññattaṃ hoti, evaṃ cetanattānamekadese vattamānānampi lakkhaṇato aññattaṃ
tika-abh06t:2650_5: hoti, tasmā lakkhaṇakatamaññattaṃ vadāmīti. Tatra vuccate – yathā hi jātavedassa
tika-abh06t:2650_6: ḍayhamāne āmakasaṅghaṭe āmakavaṇṇavināse rasādīnaṃ vināso bhavati, tatheva cetanāya
tika-abh06t:2650_7: vināse attanopi vināso siyā. Kiṃ kāraṇanti ce? Rūparasādīnaṃ viya ekadesattāti.
tika-abh06t:2651_0: Athevaṃ bhavato mati siyā “ekadesatte satipi attano pana nāso na bhavati, cetanāyayeva
tika-abh06t:2651_1: vināso bhavatī”ti? Atra vuccate – attano anāse cetanāyapi anāsova hoti. Kiṃ kāraṇanti
tika-abh06t:2651_2: ce? Rūparasādīnaṃ viya avinibbhogato. Atha samāne ekadesatte avinibbhogabhāvepi kena
tika-abh06t:2651_3: hetunā cetanāya eva nāso bhavati, na pana attano. Atha visesakāraṇaṃ natthi, tava
tika-abh06t:2651_4: laddhiyā attāva nassatu, tiṭṭhatu cetanā. Atha cetanāya nāse attano nāso na bhavati,
tika-abh06t:2651_5: ubhinnaṃ ekadesatā natthi. Evañca sati ko dosoti ce? Yaṃ pana tayā vuttaṃ, yathā
tika-abh06t:2651_6: rūparasagandhādīnaṃ ekadese vattamānānampi lakkhaṇato aññattaṃ, tathā cetanattānamekadese
tika-abh06t:2651_7: vattamānānampi lakkhaṇato aññattanti? Tamayuttanti tava paṭiññā hīnā. Atha rūparasādīnaṃ
tika-abh06t:2651_8: viya samānepi ekadesatte yadi attano anāse cetanāyapi anāso na bhavati, paṭiññāhīno
tika-abh06t:2651_9: asi. Atha vuttappakārato viparītaṃ vā siyā, tava attā nassatu, cetanā tiṭṭhatu. Athevaṃ
tika-abh06t:2652_0: Atha desantarakatamaññattaṃ vadesi, cetanattānaṃ aññatte sati ghaṭapaṭasakaṭagehādīnaṃ
tika-abh06t:2652_1: viya aññattaṃ siyā. Cetanāya vinā anaññatā te attā na ghaṭena vinā paṭo viya añño
tika-abh06t:2652_2: siyā. Añño ca hi ghaṭo añño ca paṭoti? Na, evañca sati ko dosoti ce? “Acetano attā”ti
tika-abh06t:2652_3: pubbe vuttadosato na parimuccatīti. Tasmā paramatthato na koci kattā vā vedako vā
tika-abh06t:2684: Vuttanti. Saccaṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā, tañca kho sammutivasena, na paramatthato. Nanu bhagavatā idampi vuttaṃ –
tika-abh06t:2686: “Kiṃ nu sattoti paccesi, māra diṭṭhigataṃ nu te;
tika-abh06t:2693_0: Tasmā na vacanamattamevāvalambitabbaṃ, na ca daḷhamūḷhagāhinā ca bhavitabbaṃ, garukulamupasevitvā
tika-abh06t:2693_1: suttapadānaṃ adhippāyo jānitabbo, suttapadesu abhiyogo kātabbo. Dve saccāni bhagavatā
tika-abh06t:2693_3: asaṅkarato ñātabbāni. Evaṃ asaṅkarato ñatvā koci kārako vā vedako vā nicco dhuvo
tika-abh06t:2693_4: attā paramatthato natthīti upaparikkhitvā paccayasāmaggiyā dhammānaṃ pavattiṃ sallakkhetvā
tika-abh06t:2695: Yo imaṃ ganthaṃ accantaṃ, cinteti satatampi so;
tika-abh06t:2696: Kamena paramā paññā, tassa gacchati vepulaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2716: Natthi jhānaṃ kuto maggo, tasmā sīlaṃ visodhaye.
tika-abh06t:2724: Ratanaṃ saraṇaṃ khemaṃ, tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2747: Piyo garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
tika-abh06t:2748: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako.
tika-abh06t:2753: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetabbaṃ, vattaṃ katvā panassa tu;
tika-abh06t:2754: Tenāpi caritaṃ ñatvā, dātabbaṃ tassa bhikkhuno.
tika-abh06t:2760: Tehi attho na catthīti, na mayā idha dassitā.
tika-abh06t:2775: Ime pana ca cattāro, anukūlāti dīpitā.
tika-abh06t:2777: Cattāropi ca āruppā, sesāni kasiṇāni ca;
tika-abh06t:2808: Na ca vaḍḍhaniyā sesā, bhavanti asubhādayo.
tika-abh06t:2825: Catutthaṃ kasiṇaṃ hitvā, kasiṇā asubhāni ca;
tika-abh06t:2835: Upekkhā appamaññā ca, arūpā ceva pañcime.
tika-abh06t:2841: Kasiṇā nava honte ca, arūpānaṃ tu paccayā.
tika-abh06t:2843: Dasāpi kasiṇā honti, abhiññānaṃ tu paccayā;
tika-abh06t:2865: Dīghā kesā nakhā lomā, chinditabbā vibhāvinā.
tika-abh06t:2867: Cīvaraṃ rajitabbaṃ taṃ, kiliṭṭhaṃ tu sace siyā;
tika-abh06t:2868: Sace patte malaṃ hoti, pacitabbova suṭṭhu so.
tika-abh06t:2873: Vajjetvā mattikaṃ nīlaṃ, pītaṃ setañca lohitaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2880: Saṃhārimaṃ vā kātabbaṃ, taṃ tatraṭṭhakameva vā.
tika-abh06t:2883: Cammaṃ vā kaṭasāraṃ vā, dussapattampi vā tathā.
tika-abh06t:2889: Vallīhi taṃ vinandhitvā, kātabbaṃ kaṇṇikaṃ samaṃ.
tika-abh06t:2892: Vaṭṭaṃ vattati taṃ kātuṃ, vivaṭṭaṃ pana micchatā.
tika-abh06t:2895: Sammajjitvāna taṃ ṭhānaṃ, nhatvā āgamma paṇḍito.
tika-abh06t:2912: Na vaṇṇo pekkhitabbo so, daṭṭhabbaṃ na ca lakkhaṇaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2913: Vaṇṇaṃ pana amuñcitvā, ussadassa vasena hi.
tika-abh06t:2918: Pathavī medanī bhūmi, vasudhā ca vasundharā;
tika-abh06t:2922: Yāvuggahanimittaṃ tu, nuppajjati ca tāva so.
tika-abh06t:2927: Yathā ummīlitekāle, tathāpāthaṃ tu yāti ce;
tika-abh06t:2930: Nimitte pana sañjāte, tato pabhuti yoginā;
tika-abh06t:2931: Nisīditabbaṃ no cevaṃ, tasmiṃ ṭhāne vijānatā.
tika-abh06t:2940: Sace nassati taṃ ṭhānaṃ, gantvāvādāya taṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:2945: Nimittaṃ pana taṃ hitvā, cittaṃ dhāvati ce bahi;
tika-abh06t:2957: Ko panāyaṃ viseso hi, imassa purimassa vā;
tika-abh06t:2981: Dvinnaṃ pana samādhīnaṃ, kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ pana;
tika-abh06t:2987: Pallaṅkena ca teneva, vaḍḍhetvā taṃ nimittakaṃ;
tika-abh06t:2988: Appanaṃ adhigantuṃ so, sakkoti yadi sundaraṃ.
tika-abh06t:2996: Nimittaṃ rakkhato laddhaṃ, parihāni na vijjati.
tika-abh06t:2999: Rakkhitabbaṃ hi tasmā taṃ, tatrāyaṃ rakkhaṇāvidhi.
tika-abh06t:3001: Āvāso gocaro bhassaṃ, puggalo bhojanaṃ utu;
tika-abh06t:3005: Na cireneva kālena, hoti bhikkhussa appanā.
tika-abh06t:3008: Appanāya ca kosallaṃ, sammā sampādaye budho.
tika-abh06t:3017: Tathāpi na jahe yogaṃ, vāyametheva paṇḍito.
tika-abh06t:3035: Javanāni ca jāyante, tassa cattāri pañca vā.
tika-abh06t:3044: Yaṃ taṃ sabbantimaṃ ettha, gotrabhūti pavuccati.
tika-abh06t:3053: Catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ vāti, appeti na tato paraṃ.
tika-abh06t:3055: Chaṭṭhe vā sattame vāpi, appanā neva jāyati;
tika-abh06t:3058: Purimehāsevanaṃ laddhā, chaṭṭhaṃ vā sattamampi vā;
tika-abh06t:3076: Kukkuccaṃ vicikicchā ca, pahīnā pañcime pana.
tika-abh06t:3078: Vitakkena vicārena, pītiyā ca sukhena ca;
tika-abh06t:3082: Ito cito bhamantassa, vane makkaṭako viya.
tika-abh06t:3112: Upacārampi vā patvā, vaḍḍhetuṃ tañca vattati.
tika-abh06t:3114: Appanaṃ pana patvā vā, tatrāyaṃ vaḍḍhanakkamo;
tika-abh06t:3130: Ubhato bhaṭṭhobhave yogī, paṭhamā dutiyāpi ca.
tika-abh06t:3136: Mandassa yogino jhānaṃ, hoti taṃ ṭhitibhāgiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:3145: Paṭhamā paguṇato jhānā, vuṭṭhāya vidhinā tato.
tika-abh06t:3150: Iti ādīnavaṃ disvā, paṭhame pana yoginā;
tika-abh06t:3162: Thūlaṅgānaṃ pahānāya, tadā tassa ca yogino;
tika-abh06t:3172: Javanāni hi jāyante, tassa cattāri pañca vā.
tika-abh06t:3181: Evaṃ duvaṅgahīnaṃ tu, tīhi aṅgehi saṃyutaṃ.
tika-abh06t:3189: Tasmā paguṇato jhānā, vuṭṭhāya dutiyā puna;
tika-abh06t:3195: Tattha ādīnavaṃ disvā, tatiye santato pana;
tika-abh06t:3199: Athassa dutiyajjhānā, vuṭṭhāya ca yadā pana.
tika-abh06t:3204: Thūlaṅgānaṃ pahānāya, tadā tassa ca yogino;
tika-abh06t:3214: Javanāni ca jāyante, tassa cattāri pañca vā.
tika-abh06t:3219: Satiyā sampajaññena, sampannaṃ tu sukhena ca;
tika-abh06t:3231: Tasmā paguṇato jhānā, vuṭṭhāya tatiyā puna;
tika-abh06t:3237: Iti ādīnavaṃ disvā, jhānasmiṃ tatiye puna;
tika-abh06t:3238: Catutthaṃ santato disvā, cetasā pana yoginā.
tika-abh06t:3243: Athassa tatiyajjhānā, vuṭṭhāya hi yadā pana;
tika-abh06t:3246: Thūlato tassupaṭṭhāti, sukhaṃ taṃ mānasaṃ tato;
tika-abh06t:3253: Catutthaṃ panidaṃ jhānaṃ, uppajjissati taṃ iti.
tika-abh06t:3259: Javanāni ca jāyante, tassa cattāri pañca vā.
tika-abh06t:3274: Ayamettha viseso hi, sesaṃ vuttanayaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:3276: Yaṃ catukkanaye jhānaṃ, dutiyaṃ taṃ dvidhā pana;
tika-abh06t:3279: Tatiyaṃ taṃ catutthañca, catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ idha;
tika-abh06t:3285: Sumadhuravarataravacano, kaṃ nu janaṃ neva rañjayati;
tika-abh06t:3307: Catutthe pana jhānasmiṃ, hutvā ciṇṇavasī vasī;
tika-abh06t:3313: Iti ādīnavaṃ disvā, catutthe tattha sabbaso;
tika-abh06t:3324: Ugghāṭento hi kasiṇaṃ, na saṃvelleti taṃ pana;
tika-abh06t:3325: Na cuddharati so yogī, pūvaṃ viya kapālato.
tika-abh06t:3327: Kevalaṃ pana taṃ neva, āvajjati na pekkhati;
tika-abh06t:3338: Āsevati ca bhāveti, taṃ nimittaṃ punappunaṃ;
tika-abh06t:3342: Idhāpi purime bhāge, tīṇi cattāri vā pana.
tika-abh06t:3365: Āsevati ca bhāveti, taṃ nimittaṃ punappunaṃ;
tika-abh06t:3369: Appeti appanā yasmiṃ, nayo vuttanayova so.
tika-abh06t:3386: Evaṃ manasi katvāna, kātabbo manasā puna;
