tika-abh06t:3398: Āsevati ca bhāveti, taṃ nimittaṃ punappunaṃ;
tika-abh06t:3415: Sannipātaṃ yathā koci, disvā saṅghassa katthaci;
tika-abh06t:3416: Gate saṅghe tu taṃ ṭhānaṃ, suññamevānupassati.
tika-abh06t:3427: Evaṃ manasi katvāna, puna tattheva dhīmatā;
tika-abh06t:3436: Āsevati ca bhāveti, taṃ nimittaṃ punappunaṃ;
tika-abh06t:3454: Santato taṃ karonto hi, manasā sukhumaṃ paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:3469: Paṭusaññāya kiccaṃ sā, kātuṃ sakkoti neva ca.
tika-abh06t:3473: Tasmā pana ca sā saññā, “nāsaññā”ti pavuccati.
tika-abh06t:3512: Alaṅkāro hi tāṇanti, satthanti ca pavuccati.
tika-abh06t:3530: Vuṭṭhāya hi sataṃ vāpi, sahassaṃ vā yadicchati.
tika-abh06t:3556: Tassevaṃ pana saddassa, nimittaṃ manasi kubbato;
tika-abh06t:3562: Javanāni hi jāyante, tassa cattāri pañca vā;
tika-abh06t:3563: Purimānettha cittesu, tīṇi cattāri vā pana.
tika-abh06t:3568: Sahajātaṃ tu yaṃ ñāṇaṃ, appanāmānasena hi;
tika-abh06t:3571: Thāmajātaṃ karontena, taṃ ñāṇaṃ tena yoginā;
tika-abh06t:3582: Phuṭṭhokāsagate sadde, sabbe pana suṇāti so;
tika-abh06t:3589: Ālokaṃ pana vaḍḍhetvā, tasmā dibbena cakkhunā;
tika-abh06t:3590: Hadayaṃ pana nissāya, vattamānaṃ tu lohitaṃ.
tika-abh06t:3623: Yāva asmiṃ bhave sandhi, tāva tena ca bhikkhunā;
tika-abh06t:3633: Katvā javanacittāni, honti cattāri pañca vā;
tika-abh06t:3639: Tena cittena yaṃ ñāṇaṃ, saṃyuttaṃ tena yā pana;
tika-abh06t:3659: Passitabbaṃ bhave rūpaṃ, passato pana tassa taṃ.
tika-abh06t:3664: Tasmiṃ antarahite rūpa-gatampi ca na dissati;
tika-abh06t:3681: Manodvāre manakkāre, jāte yāni tadeva ca;
tika-abh06t:3682: Rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā, jāyanti javanāni hi.
tika-abh06t:3721: Mahaggate ca cittasmiṃ, samāropeti so tadā;
tika-abh06t:3727: Pādakajjhānacittaṃ taṃ, kāye ropeti so tadā;
tika-abh06t:3745: Paccuppanno paritto ca, saddo ārammaṇaṃ yato;
tika-abh06t:3781: Yathā ca pupphamuṭṭhimhi, ukkhitte gagane pana;
tika-abh06t:3788: Tesaṃ dvinnaṃ sahaṭṭhānā-bhāvato taṃ na yujjati.
tika-abh06t:3791: Aniṭṭhe pana hi ṭhāne, ayuttanti pakāsitaṃ.
tika-abh06t:3794: Vasena paccuppannaṃ taṃ, hoti ārammaṇaṃ idaṃ.
tika-abh06t:3802: Ārammaṇaṃ tadā katvā, tena saddhiṃ nirujjhati;
tika-abh06t:3803: Javanāni hi jāyante, tassa cattāri pañca vā.
tika-abh06t:3808: Etesaṃ pana sabbesaṃ, niruddhaṃ tu tadeva ca;
tika-abh06t:3809: Cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti, tasmā sabbāni tānipi.
tika-abh06t:3815: Parassa cittaṃ jānāti, netarāni yathā pana.
tika-abh06t:3817: Cakkhudvāre tu viññāṇaṃ, rūpaṃ passati netaraṃ;
tika-abh06t:3818: Evameva ca taṃ iddhi-cittameva ca jānāti.
tika-abh06t:3832: Atīte attanā maggaṃ, bhāvitaṃ tu phalampi vā;
tika-abh06t:3839: Atītārammaṇā honti, kiñcāpi atha kho pana.
tika-abh06t:3857: Rūpaṃ saddoti dvinnaṃ tu, ayameva visesatā.
tika-abh06t:3874: Atha kho pana taṃ satta-divasabbhantaraṃ pana;
tika-abh06t:3875: Cittameva ca jānāti, na hi taṃ aññagocaraṃ.
tika-abh06t:3913: Bhāvetabbā yato paññā, bhikkhunā tena dhīmatā.
tika-abh06t:3924: Pajānātīti paññā sā, jānanā vā pakārato.
tika-abh06t:3930: Lakkhaṇappaṭivedhaṃ tu, kātuṃ sakkoti neva sā.
tika-abh06t:3935: Ussakkitvā na sakkoti, maggaṃ pāpetumeva taṃ;
tika-abh06t:3936: Paññā vuttanayaṃ kātuṃ, sakkoti tividhampi taṃ.
tika-abh06t:3959: Parato pana sutvāna, laddhā paññā ayaṃ idha;
tika-abh06t:3960: Suteneva ca nipphannā, paññā sutamayā matā.
tika-abh06t:3962: Yathā vāpi tathā cettha, bhāvanāya vasena tu;
tika-abh06t:3968: Yaṃ kiñci paccayuppannaṃ, vipākā ca kriyā tathā;
tika-abh06t:3974: Tasmiṃ atthe ca dhamme ca, yā sabhāvanirutti tu;
tika-abh06t:3978: Tesu ñāṇesu yaṃ ñāṇaṃ, paṭibhānanti taṃ mataṃ.
tika-abh06t:3993: Rūpañca vedanā saññā, saṅkhārā ceva sabbaso;
tika-abh06t:3996: Tattha yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ taṃ, atītānāgatādikaṃ;
tika-abh06t:3997: Ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā, sukhumoḷārikampi vā.
tika-abh06t:3999: Hīnaṃ vāpi paṇītaṃ vā, yaṃ dūre yañca santike;
tika-abh06t:4005: Cittajaṃ pana yaṃ kiñci, taṃ sañjānanalakkhaṇaṃ;
tika-abh06t:4011: Tattha cittaṃ tu yaṃ kiñci, taṃ vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ;
tika-abh06t:4026: Phālento viya tālassa, kandaṃ tu yamakaṃ dvidhā;
tika-abh06t:4038: Evamettha paṇḍito poso, vavatthapeti taṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:4054: Na hettha satto manujo ca vijjati;
tika-abh06t:4066: Sakeneva hi tejena, na sakkoti pavattituṃ.
tika-abh06t:4068: Na byāharati no seti, na tiṭṭhati na gacchati;
tika-abh06t:4069: Na bhedeti na coreti, na bhuñjati na khādati.
tika-abh06t:4071: Tathā rūpampi nittejaṃ, vinā nāmañca sabbathā;
tika-abh06t:4072: Sakeneva hi tejena, na sakkoti pavattituṃ.
tika-abh06t:4077: Nāmaṃ nissāya rūpaṃ tu, rūpaṃ nissāya nāmakaṃ;
tika-abh06t:4083: Yathā hi nāvaṃ nissāya, manussā yanti aṇṇave;
tika-abh06t:4086: Yathā manusse nissāya, nāvā gacchati aṇṇave;
tika-abh06t:4105: Kaṅkhā tīsu panaddhāsu, vitaritvā ṭhitaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:4110: Nāmarūpassa ko hetu, konu vā paccayo bhave;
tika-abh06t:4113: Kesā lomā nakhā dantā, taco maṃsaṃ nahāru ca;
tika-abh06t:4127: Itime pañca dhammā hi, hetupaccayataṃ gatā;
tika-abh06t:4130: Janakaṃ pana kammaṃ tu, puttassa hi pitā viya;
tika-abh06t:4131: Dhātī viya kumārassa, āhāro dhārako bhave.
tika-abh06t:4139: So evaṃ nāmarūpassa, vuttiṃ disvāna paccayā;
tika-abh06t:4145: Tassevaṃ passato yā sā, pubbante pañcadhā tathā;
tika-abh06t:4156_0: Tattha ekajavanavīthiyaṃ sattasu cittesu kusalā vā akusalā vā paṭhamajavanacetanā
tika-abh06t:4156_1: diṭṭhadhammavedanīyakammaṃ nāma. Taṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ deti, tathā asakkontaṃ
tika-abh06t:4156_2: pana “ahosikammaṃ nāhosi kammavipāko, na bhavissati kammavipāko, natthi kammavipāko”ti
tika-abh06t:4156_3: imassa tikassa vasena ahosikammaṃ nāma hoti. Atthasādhikā pana sattamajavanacetanā
tika-abh06t:4156_4: upapajjavedanīyakammaṃ nāma. Tamanantare attabhāve vipākaṃ deti, tathā asakkontaṃ
tika-abh06t:4156_5: vuttanayena ahosikammaṃ nāma hoti. Ubhinnamantare pañcajavanacetanā aparāpariyavedanīyakammaṃ
tika-abh06t:4156_6: nāma. Tamanāgate yadā okāsaṃ labhati, tadā vipākaṃ deti, sati saṃsārappavattiyā ahosikammaṃ nāma na hoti.
tika-abh06t:4158: Aparaṃ catubbidhaṃ kammaṃ, garukaṃ bahulampi ca;
tika-abh06t:4163_0: Tattha janakaṃ nāma kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā kammaṃ paṭisandhiyampi pavattepi rūpārūpavipākakkhandhe
tika-abh06t:4163_1: janeti. Upatthambhakaṃ pana vipākaṃ janetuṃ na sakkoti, aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā
tika-abh06t:4163_2: janite vipāke uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ upatthambheti, addhānaṃ pavatteti. Upapīḷakaṃ
tika-abh06t:4163_3: pana aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ pīḷeti
tika-abh06t:4163_4: bādhati, addhānaṃ pavattituṃ na deti. Upaghātakaṃ pana sayaṃ kusalampi akusalampi
tika-abh06t:4163_5: samānaṃ aññaṃ dubbalakammaṃ ghātetvā tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ
tika-abh06t:4163_6: karoti. Evaṃ pana kammena okāse kate taṃvipākamuppannaṃ nāma hoti. Iti imaṃ dvādasavidhaṃ
tika-abh06t:4163_7: kammaṃ kammavaṭṭe pakkhipitvā evameko kammavipākavasena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṃ karoti.
tika-abh06t:4164_0: Iti evaṃ kammavipākavaṭṭavasena nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ disvā “yathā idaṃ etarahi, evamatītepi
tika-abh06t:4164_1: addhāne kammavipākavasena paccayato pavattittha, anāgatepi pavattissatī”ti iti kammañceva
tika-abh06t:4164_2: vipāko cāti kammavipākavasena loko pavattatīti taṃ samanupassati. Tassevaṃ samanupassato
tika-abh06t:4169: Evaṃ kāraṇato uddhaṃ, kāraṇaṃ na ca passati;
tika-abh06t:4176: Evaṃ kamme vipāke ca, vattamāne sahetuke;
tika-abh06t:4186: Taṇhāsotena vuyhantā, na te dukkhā pamuccare.
tika-abh06t:4191: Kammaṃ natthi vipākamhi, pāko kamme na vijjati;
tika-abh06t:4192: Aññamaññaṃ ubho suññā, na ca kammaṃ vinā phalaṃ.
tika-abh06t:4194: Yathā na sūriye aggi, na maṇimhi na gomaye;
tika-abh06t:4195: Na tesaṃ bahi so atthi, sambhārehi ca jāyati.
tika-abh06t:4197: Tathā na anto kammassa, vipāko upalabbhati;
tika-abh06t:4198: Bahiddhāpi na kammassa, na kammaṃ tattha vijjati.
tika-abh06t:4200: Phalena suññaṃ taṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ kamme na vijjati;
tika-abh06t:4201: Kammañca kho upādāya, tato nibbattate phalaṃ.
tika-abh06t:4240: Nicayo rāsi vā natthi, tathā uppajjatopi ca.
tika-abh06t:4242: Rāsito nicayā vāpi, natthi āgamananti ca;
tika-abh06t:4245: Niruddhassāpi ekasmiṃ, ṭhāne natthi cayoti ca;
tika-abh06t:4249: Katvā tasseva ñāṇassa, vibhaṅgassa vasena tu.
tika-abh06t:4257: Evaṃ rūpudayo hoti, evamassa vayo iti;
tika-abh06t:4258: Udeti evaṃ rūpampi, evaṃ rūpaṃ tu veti ca.
tika-abh06t:4261: Passato sabbadhammā ca, pākaṭā honti tassa te.
tika-abh06t:4267: Asārā pana nissārā, hutvā khāyanti yogino.
tika-abh06t:4270: Lakkhaṇāni ca paññāsa, paṭivijjha ṭhitaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:4272: Ñāṇaṃ adhigataṃ hoti, taruṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ pana;
tika-abh06t:4280: Obhāso pīti passaddhi, ñāṇaṃ saddhā satī sukhaṃ;
tika-abh06t:4300: Pīti vippassanāpīti, tassa tasmiṃ khaṇe pana;
tika-abh06t:4306: Lahūni ca mudūneva, kammaññāneva honti hi;
tika-abh06t:4315: Amānusī rati hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato.
tika-abh06t:4329: Asatte sattasaññī ca, hoti appassuto naro.
tika-abh06t:4335: Tassa cevaṃ ayaṃ maggo, nāyaṃ maggoti yogino.
tika-abh06t:4355: Udayabbaye ca bhaṅge ca, bhaye ādīnave tathā;
tika-abh06t:4365: Etesu pana ñāṇesu, yogo karaṇiyo pana.
tika-abh06t:4371: Aṭṭhannaṃ pana ñāṇānaṃ, vasena pana yogino.
tika-abh06t:4377: Idāni tassa maggo ca, samuppajjissatīti hi.
tika-abh06t:4379: Saṅkhārupekkhā saṅkhāre, aniccā dukkhāti vā tathā;
tika-abh06t:4380: Sammasitvā bhavaṅgaṃ tu, puna votarateva sā.
tika-abh06t:4392: Dutiyaṃ javanaṃ hoti, upacāranti taṃ mataṃ.
tika-abh06t:4416: Ito paraṃ tu bhikkhussa, hoti gotrabhumānasaṃ;
tika-abh06t:4426: Gottaṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ, tato bhavati gotrabhu.
tika-abh06t:4429: Tattha taṃ paṭhamaṃ maggaṃ, sampādetuṃ panicchatā.
tika-abh06t:4431: Aññaṃ kiñcipi kātabbaṃ, bhikkhunā tena natthi taṃ;
tika-abh06t:4432: Yañhi tena ca kātabbaṃ, siyā taṃ katameva tu.
tika-abh06t:4435: Uppādentena taṃ sabbaṃ, katameva ca yoginā.
tika-abh06t:4453: Maggassa pana taṃ saññaṃ, datvā viya nirujjhati.
tika-abh06t:4455: Maggopi tena taṃ dinnaṃ, amuñcitvāva sañhitaṃ;
tika-abh06t:4477: Tassevānantaraṃ tassa, vipākā dvepi tīṇi vā;
tika-abh06t:4478: Phalacittāni jāyante, na jāyante tato paraṃ.
tika-abh06t:4480: Keci ekañca dve tīṇi, cattārīti vadanti tu;
tika-abh06t:4481: Na panetaṃ gahetabbaṃ, ajānitvā vadanti te.
tika-abh06t:4484: Tehi āsevanaṃ laddhā, tatiyaṃ hoti gotrabhu.
tika-abh06t:4491: Pañcamaṃ maggacittañca, phalāni dve tato pana;
tika-abh06t:4503: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, phalādīnampi pekkhane;
tika-abh06t:4506: Maggo phalaṃ pahīnā ca, kilesā avasiṭṭhakā;
tika-abh06t:4526: Phalacittāni ñeyyāni, viññunā dvepi tīṇi vā.
tika-abh06t:4602: Etesu yena ye dhammā, pahātabbā bhavanti hi;
tika-abh06t:4604_0: Imesu pana catūsu maggañāṇesu ye dhammā yena ñāṇena pahātabbā, tesaṃ pahānamevaṃ
tika-abh06t:4605_0: Tattha saṃyojanānīti dasa saṃyojanāni. Seyyathidaṃ – rūparāgārūparāgamānauddhaccāvijjāti
tika-abh06t:4605_1: ime pañca uddhaṃbhāgiyasaṃyojanāni nāma. Sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso
tika-abh06t:4605_2: kāmarāgo paṭighoti ime pañca adhobhāgiyasaṃyojanāni nāma.
tika-abh06t:4606: Kilesāti dasa kilesā. Seyyathidaṃ – lobho doso moho māno diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti.
tika-abh06t:4607: Micchattāti dasa micchattā. Seyyathidaṃ – micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappo micchāvācā micchākammanto micchāājīvo micchāvāyāmo micchāsati micchāsamādhi micchāñāṇaṃ micchāvimuttīti.
tika-abh06t:4608_0: Lokadhammāti aṭṭha lokadhammā lābho alābho yaso ayaso nindā pasaṃsā sukhaṃ dukkhanti.
tika-abh06t:4608_1: Idha pana kāraṇūpacārena lābhādivatthukassa anunayassa, alābhādivatthukassa paṭighassa
tika-abh06t:4609_0: Macchariyānīti pañca macchariyāni āvāsamacchariyaṃ kulamacchariyaṃ lābhamacchariyaṃ
tika-abh06t:4609_1: dhammamacchariyaṃ vaṇṇamacchariyanti. Imāni āvāsādīsu aññesaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ asahanākārena
tika-abh06t:4610: Vipallāsāti aniccadukkhaanattaasubhesuyeva vatthūsu “niccaṃ sukhaṃ attā subha”nti evaṃ pavattā saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāsoti ime tayo vipallāsā.
tika-abh06t:4611: Ganthāti cattāro ganthā abhijjhākāyagantho, byāpādo, sīlabbataparāmāso, idaṃsaccābhiniveso kāyaganthoti.
tika-abh06t:4612_1: Oghayogānītipi tesamevādhivacanaṃ. Nīvaraṇānīti kāmacchandādayo. Parāmāsoti micchādiṭṭhiyā adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh06t:4613: Upādānāti cattāri upādānāni kāmupādānādīnīti. Anusayāti satta anusayā kāmarāgānusayo paṭighamānadiṭṭhivicikicchābhavarāgāvijjānusayoti. Malāti tayo malā – lobho doso mohoti.
tika-abh06t:4614_0: Akusalakammapathāti dasa akusalakammapathā. Seyyathidaṃ – pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ
tika-abh06t:4614_1: kāmesumicchācāro musāvādo pisuṇavācā pharusavācā samphappalāpo abhijjhā byāpādo micchādiṭṭhīti dasa.
tika-abh06t:4615: Akusalacittuppādāti lobhamūlāni aṭṭha, dosamūlāni dve, mohamūlāni dveti ime dvādasāti.
tika-abh06t:4616_0: Etesaṃ saṃyojanādīnaṃ etāni yathāsambhavaṃ pahānakarāni. Kathaṃ? Saṃyojanesu tāva
tika-abh06t:4616_2: sesā kāmarāgapaṭighā oḷārikā dutiyamaggañāṇavajjhā, sukhumā tatiyamaggañāṇavajjhā,
tika-abh06t:4617: Kilesesu diṭṭhivicikicchā paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā, doso tatiyamaggañāṇavajjho, lobhamohamānathinauddhaccaahirikānottappāni catutthamaggañāṇavajjhāni.
tika-abh06t:4618_0: Micchattesu micchādiṭṭhi musāvādo micchākammanto micchāājīvoti ime paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā,
tika-abh06t:4618_1: micchāsaṅkappo pisuṇavācā pharusavācāti ime tatiyamaggañāṇavajjhā, cetanāyeva cettha
tika-abh06t:4619: Lokadhammesu paṭigho tatiyamaggañāṇavajjho, anunayo catutthamaggañāṇavajjho, yase pasaṃsāya ca anunayo catutthamaggañāṇavajjhoti eke.
tika-abh06t:4621_0: Vipallāsesu pana anicce niccaṃ, anattani attāti ca saññācittadiṭṭhivipallāsā, dukkhe
tika-abh06t:4621_1: sukhaṃ, asubhe subhanti diṭṭhivipallāso cāti ime paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā, asubhe subhanti
tika-abh06t:4622: Ganthesu sīlabbataparāmāsaidaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthā paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā, byāpādakāyagantho tatiyamaggañāṇavajjho, abhijjhākāyagantho catutthamaggañāṇavajjhova.
tika-abh06t:4624: Āsavesu diṭṭhāsavo paṭhamañāṇavajjho, kāmāsavo tatiyañāṇavajjho, itare dve catutthañāṇavajjhā. Oghayogesupi eseva nayo.
tika-abh06t:4625: Nīvaraṇesu vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ paṭhamañāṇavajjhaṃ, kāmacchando byāpādo kukkuccanti tīṇi tatiyañāṇavajjhāni, thinamiddhauddhaccāni catutthañāṇavajjhāni.
tika-abh06t:4627_0: Upādānesu sabbesampi lokiyadhammānaṃ vatthukāmavasena “kāmā”ti āgatattā rūpārūpesu
tika-abh06t:4627_1: rāgopi kāmupādāne patati, tasmā tañca kāmupādānaṃ catutthañāṇavajjhaṃ, sesāni paṭhamañāṇavajjhāni.
tika-abh06t:4628: Anusayesu diṭṭhivicikicchānusayā paṭhamañāṇavajjhā, kāmarāgapaṭighānusayā tatiyañāṇavajjhā, mānabhavarāgāvijjānusayā catutthañāṇavajjhā.
tika-abh06t:4630_0: Akusalakammapathesu pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ micchācāro musāvādo micchādiṭṭhīti ime
tika-abh06t:4630_1: paṭhamañāṇavajjhā, pisuṇavācā pharusavācā byāpādoti tatiyañāṇavajjhā, samphappalāpo
tika-abh06t:4631: Akusalacittuppādesu cattāro diṭṭhigatacittuppādā, vicikicchāsampayutto cāti pañca paṭhamañāṇavajjhā, dve paṭighasampayuttā tatiyañāṇavajjhā, sesā catutthañāṇavajjhāti.
tika-abh06t:4632: Yañca yena vajjhaṃ, taṃ tena pahātabbaṃ nāma. Tena vuttaṃ “etesaṃ saṃyojanādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ etāni yathāyogaṃ pahānakarānī”ti.
tika-abh06t:4635: Yo yo hi dhammo samupeti ghātaṃ;
tika-abh06t:4636: So so asesena ca tena tena,
tika-abh06t:4651: Padīpo hi yathā loke, apubbācarimaṃ idha;
tika-abh06t:4665_0: Vuttampi cetaṃ “maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇaṃ dukkhepetaṃ ñāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudayepetaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
tika-abh06t:4665_1: dukkhanirodhepetaṃ ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāyapetaṃ ñāṇa”nti. Tattha
tika-abh06t:4665_2: yathā padīpo vaṭṭiṃ jhāpeti, evaṃ maggañāṇaṃ dukkhaṃ parijānāti. Yathā andhakāraṃ
tika-abh06t:4665_3: nāseti, evaṃ samudayaṃ pajahati. Yathā ālokaṃ vidaṃseti, evaṃ sahajātādipaccayatāya
tika-abh06t:4665_4: sammāsaṅkappādimaggaṃ bhāveti. Yathā telaṃ pariyādiyati, evaṃ kilesapariyādānena
tika-abh06t:4670: Obhāseti ca rūpāni, nāseti timirampi ca;
tika-abh06t:4673: Yathā ca mahatī nāvā, apubbācarimaṃ pana;
tika-abh06t:4676: Jahatī orimaṃ tīraṃ, sotaṃ chindati sā pana;
tika-abh06t:4682: Yathā chindati taṃ sotaṃ, taṇhaṃ jahati taṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:4683: Yathā vahati taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, sahajātādinā pana.
tika-abh06t:4685: Tatheva paccayattena, maggaṃ bhāveti nāma so;
tika-abh06t:4686: Yathā pāraṃ pana evaṃ, nirodhārammaṇaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t:4706: Dhammā te paccaye cāhaṃ, dassayissāmito paraṃ.
tika-abh06t:4708_0: Tattha hetupaccayoti lobho doso moho alobho adoso amohoti ime cha dhammā hetupaccayā.
tika-abh06t:4708_1: Ārammaṇapaccayoti sabbalokiyalokuttaraṃ yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbha ye ye dhammā uppajjanti
tika-abh06t:4708_2: cittacetasikā dhammā, te te dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
tika-abh06t:4709_0: Adhipatipaccayoti ettha sahajātādhipatiārammaṇādhipativasena duvidho. Tattha sahajātādhipati
tika-abh06t:4709_2: ca aniṭṭhasammatañca rūpaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ. Anantarapaccayoti anantaraniruddhā
tika-abh06t:4710_0: Sahajātapaccayoti cittacetasikā, mahābhūtā ceva hadayavatthu ca. Tathā aññamaññapaccayopi.
tika-abh06t:4710_1: Nissayapaccayoti vatthurūpāni ceva mahābhūtā, cittacetasikā ca. Upanissayapaccayoti
tika-abh06t:4711_0: Purejātapaccayoti vatthārammaṇavasena duvidho. Tattha vatthupurejāto nāma vatthurūpāni,
tika-abh06t:4711_1: ārammaṇapurejāto nāma paccuppannarūpādīneva. Pacchājātapaccayoti cittacetasikā ca.
tika-abh06t:4712_0: Kammapaccayoti sahajātanānakkhaṇikavasena duvidho. Tattha sahajātā lokiyalokuttarā
tika-abh06t:4712_1: eva, nānakkhaṇikā pana sāsavakusalākusalacetanā, anāsavakusalacetanā anantarameva
tika-abh06t:4712_2: attano vipākassa paccayo hoti. Vipākapaccayoti vipākacittacetasikā. Āhārapaccayoti
tika-abh06t:4713_2: tesu itthindriyapurisindriyāni vajjetvā vīsatindriyāni honti. Jhānapaccayoti vitakkavicārapītisukhacittekaggatāvasena
tika-abh06t:4714_0: Sampayuttapaccayoti cittacetasikāva. Vippayuttapaccayoti vatthupurejātāni ceva pacchājātā
tika-abh06t:4714_2: nissayapaccaye vuttadhammāpi ca. Natthipaccayoti anantarapaccayova. Tathā vigatapaccayo
tika-abh06t:4714_3: ca. Avigatapaccayoti atthipaccayova. Evamime catuvīsati paccayā nāma.
tika-abh06t:4715: Ettha pana katihākārehi rūpaṃ rūpassa paccayo hotīti? Yathārahaṃ sahajātaaññamaññanissayāhārindriyaatthiavigatavasena sattadhā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh06t:4716: Rūpaṃ arūpassa yathārahaṃ ārammaṇādhipatisahajātaaññamaññanissayūpanissayapurejātindriyavippa- yuttaatthiavigatavasena ekādasahi ākārehi paccayo hoti.
tika-abh06t:4720: Paccayo nāmadhammassa, missakassa na kiñci tu.
tika-abh06t:4722: Arūpaṃ rūpassa yathārahaṃ hetādhipatisahajātaaññamaññanissayapacchājātakammavipākāhārindriya- jhānamaggavippayuttaatthiavigatavasena pannarasadhā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh06t:4723: Arūpaṃ rūpārūpassa yathārahaṃ hetādhipatisahajātaaññamaññanissayakammavipākāhārindriyajhānamagga- atthiavigatavasena terasadhā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh06t:4726: Tipañcahi taṃ rūpassa, ubhinnaṃ terasadhā pana.
tika-abh06t:4727: Rūpārūpaṃ rūpassa yathārahaṃ sahajātanissayaatthiavigatavasena catudhā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh06t:4728: Rūpārūpaṃ arūpassa yathārahaṃ sahajātaaññamaññanissayindriyaatthiavigatavasena chadhā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh06t:4732: Chabbidhā nāmadhammassa, missakassa na kiñci tu.
tika-abh06t:4733_0: Etesu pana paccayesu kati rūpā, kati arūpā, katimissakāti? Purejātapaccayo eko rūpadhammova,
tika-abh06t:4733_2: vasena dvādasa paccayā arūpadhammāva, sesā pana ekādasa paccayā rūpārūpamissakāti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:4734_1: sampayuttavippayuttaatthiavigatānaṃ vasena pannarasa paccayā paccuppannāva honti.
tika-abh06t:4734_3: paccuppanno vā, ārammaṇādhipatiupanissayapaccayā pana tikālikā honti kālavinimuttā ca.
tika-abh06t:4742: Sabbe panime catuvīsati paccayā yathārahaṃ ārammaṇūpanissayakammaatthipaccayānaṃ vasena catūsu paccayesu saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t:4748: Icchatā nipuṇaṃ buddhiṃ, bhikkhunā pana sotabbo.
tika-abh06t:4760: Atthato ganthato cāpi, yuttito cāpi ettha ca;
tika-abh06t:4761: Ayuttaṃ vā viruddhaṃ vā, yadi dissati kiñcipi.
tika-abh06t:4794: Ayaṃ sumatinā sādhu, yācitena kato satā.
tika-abh06t:4801: Uragapuranivasanena ācariyena bhadantabuddhadattena sīlācārasampannena kato abhidhammāvatāro nāmāyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:4815: Tattha cittaṃ cetasikaṃ, nibbānanti mataṃ tidhā;
tika-abh06t:4863: Dutiyaṃ takkato hīnaṃ, tatiyaṃ tu vicārato;
tika-abh06t:4888: Phasso ca vedanā saññā, cetanekaggatā tathā;
tika-abh06t:4901: Sattati vīsati ceva, tāni cittāni dīpaye.
tika-abh06t:4906: Lobho lobhe tu diṭṭhi ca, diṭṭhiyutte viyuttake;
tika-abh06t:4907: Māno ca thinamiddhaṃ tu, sasaṅkhāresu pañcasu.
tika-abh06t:4915: Kammaññatā ca pāguññaujutāti yugā cha ca;
tika-abh06t:4920: Lokuttare sadā sabbā, saha kāmasubhe visuṃ.
tika-abh06t:4929: Nānā kadāci māno ca, thinamiddhaṃ tathā saha.
tika-abh06t:4931: Satta sabbattha jāyanti, cha tu dhammā yathārahaṃ;
tika-abh06t:5029: Sampayuttātha vā tena, cintentīti ca gocaraṃ.
tika-abh06t:5031: Phusatīti bhave phasso, phusanaṃ vātha kevalaṃ;
tika-abh06t:5032: Sampayuttātha vā tena, phusantīti ca gocaraṃ.
tika-abh06t:5034: Evaṃ kattari bhāve ca, karaṇe ca yathārahaṃ;
tika-abh06t:5217: Yogāti cāhu te eva, pāṇino bhavayantake;
tika-abh06t:5223: Kāmataṇhā ca diṭṭhi ca, upādānā catubbidhā;
tika-abh06t:5248: Diṭṭhi sīlabbataṃ māno, uddhaccena dasā bhave.
tika-abh06t:5288: Mūlabhāvena dhammānaṃ, hetū dhammā cha dīpitā.
tika-abh06t:5290: Vitakko ca vicāro ca, pīti cekaggatā tathā;
tika-abh06t:5297: Sammāsati samādhī ca, micchādiṭṭhi ca sambhavā.
tika-abh06t:5313: Saddhā ca sati paññā ca, vīriyekaggatāpi ca;
tika-abh06t:5314: Vedanā jīvitaṃ cittaṃ, aṭṭha rūpindriyāni ca.
tika-abh06t:5316: Kathaṃ jīvitamekaṃ tu, sukhaṃ dukkhanti vedanā;
tika-abh06t:5335: Chando cittañca vīriyaṃ, vīmaṃsāti ca tādinā.
tika-abh06t:5354: Sesā tu kusalā ñāṇaviyuttā ca dvihetukā;
tika-abh06t:5360: Catujhānaṃ tu dutiyaṃ, kāme ca sukhavajjitā;
tika-abh06t:5361: Pañcajhānaṃ tu paṭhamaṃ, kāme ca sukhitā matā.
tika-abh06t:5366: Lokiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, tathā kāme tihetukā;
tika-abh06t:5369: Sesaṃ mahaggataṃ jhānaṃ, sampayuttā ca diṭṭhiyā;
tika-abh06t:5375: Na hontāhetuke maggā, cittaṭṭhiti ca kaṅkhite;
tika-abh06t:5376: Viditā niyatatā ca, lokiyesu na uddhaṭā.
tika-abh06t:5419: Kāye ca vedanācitte, dhammesu ca yathārahaṃ;
tika-abh06t:5434: Pañca saddhā sati paññā, vīriyekaggatā tathā;
tika-abh06t:5486: Āvajjanaṃ tu yugaḷaṃ, dassanaṃ savanaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:5510: Ghānādayo tayo rūpe, pañca cakkhādayo tathā;
tika-abh06t:5513: Cha dvārā vīthicittāni, satta kāmīsu rūpisu;
tika-abh06t:5517: Majjhe bhavaṅgaṃ chetvāna, paccekaṃ vīthi jāyati.
tika-abh06t:5538: Vibhūte tu tadālambaṃ, vitthārā sattasaṭṭhi te.
tika-abh06t:5579: Kriyābhiññā ca voṭṭhabbaṃ, kriyā kāme tihetukā;
tika-abh06t:5591: Catasso dhātuyo rūpe, tīṇi vatthūni nissitā;
tika-abh06t:5615: Iccevaṃ chasu devesu, manussesu ca jāyare;
tika-abh06t:5630: Avihā ca atappā ca, sudassā ca sudassino;
tika-abh06t:5688: Maggaṭṭhesu sako maggo, puggalesu ayaṃ nayo.
tika-abh06t:5700: Bhavaṅgaṃ taṃ pana chetvā, hoti āvajjanaṃ tato.
tika-abh06t:5712: Na hoti domanassamhā, somanassaṃ tu sabbadā.
tika-abh06t:5721: Pañcamaṃ vā catutthaṃ vā, javanaṃ hoti appanā.
tika-abh06t:5739: Bhavaṅgādi ca voṭṭhabbaṃ, javanādi sakiṃ pana.
tika-abh06t:5745: Pañca vāre cha vā satta, samuppajjati sambhavā.
tika-abh06t:5748: Vīthicittāvasāne tu, bhavaṅgaṃ cuti vā bhave.
tika-abh06t:5781: Phalamhā cuddasevāhu, maggamhā tu sakaṃ phalaṃ;
tika-abh06t:5803: Tikā mahaggatā javā, maggā kāmajavā dvayā.
tika-abh06t:5818: Sabbesaṃ paṭisandhī ca, cuti cārahato tathā.
tika-abh06t:5867: Paccuppanne ca taṃ dukkhaṃ, āyatiṃ dukkhapākajaṃ.
tika-abh06t:5903: Pākadāyakakammaṃ tu, yaṃ kiñci janakaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t:5981: Chandādosā bhayā mohā, pāpaṃ kubbanti pāṇino;
tika-abh06t:5988: Dānaṃ sīlaṃ bhāvanā ca, tīsu dvāresu jāyati.
tika-abh06t:5994: Pāpā ca viramantassa, hoti sīlamayaṃ tadā.
tika-abh06t:5997: Puññaṃ bhāventi santāne, yasmā tena hitāvahaṃ.
tika-abh06t:6000: Kāyakammaṃ tadā hoti, dānaṃ sīlañca bhāvanā.
tika-abh06t:6006: Viramantassa viññattiṃ, vinā vā saha vā puna.
tika-abh06t:6032: Buddhe dhamme ca saṅghe ca, sīle cāge ca attano;
tika-abh06t:6038: Mettā karuṇā muditā, upekkhā bhāvanāti ca;
tika-abh06t:6097: Purimaṃ purimaṃ katvā, vasībhūtaṃ tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:6148: Iti channaṃ catukkānaṃ, vasā kammaṃ vibhāvaye;
tika-abh06t:6157: Bhūmi lokuttarā ceva, lokiyāti dvidhā ṭhitā;
tika-abh06t:6171: Niraye hoti deve ca, yonekā opapātikā;
tika-abh06t:6175: Asure ca bhavantevaṃ, catudhā yoni saṅgahā.
tika-abh06t:6177: Gatiyo nirayaṃ petā, tiracchānā ca mānavā;
tika-abh06t:6250: Datvā soḷasa pākāni, pavatte tu vipaccati.
tika-abh06t:6289: Aladdhā tādisaṃ hetuṃ, abhiññā na vipaccati.
tika-abh06t:6294: Iti tettiṃsa kammāni, pākā chattiṃsa bhāsitā;
tika-abh06t:6301: Nāmaṃ tidhā pakāsesi, cakkhumā vadataṃ varo.
tika-abh06t:6308: Buddho bodhitale yamāha sugato gantvāna devālayaṃ,
tika-abh06t:6327: Bhūtarūpaṃ tu pathavī, āpo tejo tathāparo;
tika-abh06t:6333: Cakkhu sotañca ghānañca, jivhā kāyoti pañcadhā;
tika-abh06t:6410: Rūpaṃ nibhāso bhūtānaṃ, saddo nigghosanaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:6411: Gandhova gandhanaṃ tattha, raso ca rasanīyatā.
tika-abh06t:6437: Sattā maranti nāsena, yassa pāṇanti vuttiyā;
tika-abh06t:6490: Loke papañcā vattanti, bahudhā yāya nimmitā;
tika-abh06t:6491: Kappenti kāyamattānaṃ, bālā yāya ca vañcitā.
tika-abh06t:6509: Lahū mudu ca kammaññaṃ, yadā rūpaṃ pavattati.
tika-abh06t:6547: Yena lakkhīyati rūpaṃ, bhinnākāraṃ khaṇe khaṇe;
tika-abh06t:6559: Vaṇṇo gandho rasojā ca, bhūtarūpañca bhāsitaṃ;
tika-abh06t:6595: Diṭṭhaṃ rūpaṃ sutaṃ saddo, mutaṃ gandhādikattayaṃ;
tika-abh06t:6599: Pasādā vatthu ca dvāraṃ, aññaṃ tubhayavajjitaṃ.
tika-abh06t:6619: Sabbe kāmabhave rūpe, āhāro na samīrito.
tika-abh06t:6622: Jīvamānassa sabbepi, matassotu siyā na vā.
tika-abh06t:6643: Nava cha caturo dveti, ekavīsati bhāvayuṃ.
tika-abh06t:6648: Tathā sotañca ghānañca, jivhaṃ kāyaṃ yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:6652: Iccevaṃ kammajā nāma, kalāpā navadhā ṭhitā.
tika-abh06t:6666: Suddhaṭṭhakaṃ tu paṭhamaṃ, saddena navakaṃ mataṃ;
tika-abh06t:6716: Tattha gandharasojā ca, na labbhantīti kecana;
tika-abh06t:6723: Arūpe pana rūpāni, sabbathāpi na labbhare.
tika-abh06t:6730: Rūpavibhāgamimaṃ suvibhattaṃ, rūpayato pana cetasi niccaṃ;
tika-abh06t:6752: Paccayā ceva saṅkhārā, saṅkhatā ca tatopare;
tika-abh06t:6756: Ārammaṇā eva nāma, nālambanti hi kiñcipi.
tika-abh06t:6783: Tadaññe araṇā nāma, pahātabbā na kehici.
tika-abh06t:6788: Bālā dhammā tapanīyā, kaṇhā ca kaṭukapphalā;
tika-abh06t:6800: Appamāṇā paṇītā ca, dhammā lokuttarā matā;
tika-abh06t:6809: Kriyā rūpañca nibbānaṃ, na pākaṃ na tu paccati;
tika-abh06t:6818: Satta lokuttarā heṭṭhā, vuttā sekkhāti tādinā;
tika-abh06t:6825: Ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā, sukhumoḷārikaṃ tathā.
tika-abh06t:6827: Hīnaṃ paṇītaṃ yaṃ dūre, santike vā tadekato;
tika-abh06t:6830: Tatheva vedanākkhandho, nāma yā kāci vedanā;
tika-abh06t:6837: Sandhāya vedanā saññā, katā nānāti kecana.
tika-abh06t:6851: Bhājanaṃ bhojanaṃ tassa, byañjanaṃ bhojako tathā;
tika-abh06t:6857: Cārako kāraṇaṃ tattha, aparādho ca kārako;
tika-abh06t:6897: Sesaṃ rūpañca nibbānaṃ, sabbe cetasikāti ca.
tika-abh06t:6920: Dukkhaṃ samudayo ceva, nirodho ca tathāparo;
tika-abh06t:6938: Tathā hi dukkhaṃ nābādhaṃ, nāññaṃ dukkhā ca bādhakaṃ;
tika-abh06t:6941: Taṃ vinā nāññato dukkhaṃ, na hoti na ca taṃ tato;
tika-abh06t:6944: Nāññā nibbānato santi, na ca santaṃ na taṃ yato;
tika-abh06t:6947: Nāññaṃ maggāca niyyānaṃ, aniyyāno na cāpi so;
tika-abh06t:6973: Jāti jarā ca maraṇaṃ, soko ca paridevanā;
tika-abh06t:6976: Appiyehi ca saṃyogo, vippayogo piyehi ca;
tika-abh06t:6977: Yampi na labhaticchanto, tampi dukkhamidaṃ mataṃ.
tika-abh06t:7001: Dukkhā ca dukkhavatthu ca, bahudhāpi papañcitā.
tika-abh06t:7063: Asmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, assuppādā idaṃ bhave;
tika-abh06t:7064: Asatāsmiṃ na taṃ hoti, tassa bhaṅgāva bhijjati.
tika-abh06t:7084: Phasso ca vedanā taṇhā, upādānaṃ bhavoti ca;
tika-abh06t:7085: Paccuppanno bhave addhā, bhave addhā anāgato.
tika-abh06t:7087: Jāti jarā maraṇanti, dvedhā hoti ca sabbathā;
tika-abh06t:7111: Sukhā dukkhā upekkhāti, vedanā tividhā bhave;
tika-abh06t:7112: Kāme bhave ca vibhave, taṇhāti tividhā matā.
tika-abh06t:7162: Vipākā puna kammāni, pākāni puna kammato;
tika-abh06t:7193: Ajātānaṃ jarā vātha, maraṇaṃ vā kuto bhave.
tika-abh06t:7294: Chadhā nāmaṃ tu nāmassa, pañcadhā nāmarūpinaṃ;
tika-abh06t:7295: Ekadhā puna rūpassa, rūpaṃ nāmassa cekadhā.
tika-abh06t:7298: Dvayassa navadhā ceti, chabbidhā paccayā kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t:7313: Dhammā te eva vuccanti, vigatappaccayoti ca.
tika-abh06t:7379: Paññatti ceva nāmānaṃ, paccayo duvidho mato.
tika-abh06t:7465: Iti taṃ tamupādāya, samaññātā tathā tathā;
tika-abh06t:7472: Upādāya ca paññatti, sā evopanidhāya ca.
tika-abh06t:7496: Khattiyo narasīho ca, bhātā lohitakaṃ yuvā.
tika-abh06t:7522: Satthā yaṃ paramatthamuttamaguṇo nāmañca rūpanti ca,
tika-abh06t:7525: Āraddhaṃ kamato mayevamakhilaṃ taṃ suṭṭhu niṭṭhāpitaṃ.
tika-abh06t:7527: Yaṃ dhammaṃ dhammarājā niratikamabhisambodhi maggena buddhā,
tika-abh06t:7541: Bhāvanā duvidhā tattha, samatho ca vipassanā;
tika-abh06t:7542: Samatho duvidho tattha, paritto ca mahaggato.
tika-abh06t:7548: Appamaññā ca saññā ca, vavatthāruppakāni ca.
tika-abh06t:7628: Sesāni pana sabbesaṃ, tatthāpi kasiṇaṃ budhā.
tika-abh06t:7654: Āvāsaṃ gocaraṃ bhassaṃ, puggalaṃ bhojanaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:7657: Sevanto satta sappāye, te evāti padhānavā;
tika-abh06t:7673: Na tu kassaci accantā, alaṅkārāva yācitā.
tika-abh06t:7783: Viddhaṃsetvā vinassanti, idha ceva parattha ca.
tika-abh06t:7786: Yattha bālā visīdanti, natthi saṅgo vijānataṃ.
tika-abh06t:7920: Uddhatā ca pamattā ca, dabbitā ketugāhino.
tika-abh06t:7977: Papātamiva gambhīraṃ, miḷhaṃ viya ca paṇḍito.
tika-abh06t:8123: Asubhaṃ pana bhāvento, nimittaṃ yattha katthaci;
tika-abh06t:8161: Yathā idaṃ tathā etaṃ, yathā etaṃ tathā idaṃ;
tika-abh06t:8170: Anattā ca parābhūtā, vibbhijjati khaṇe khaṇe.
tika-abh06t:8345: Cattāro ca paṭipannā, cattāro ca phale ṭhitā;
tika-abh06t:8398: Ādi cetaṃ patiṭṭhā ca, mukhaṃ pamukhamuttamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:8475: Subandhaṃ mama sabbattha, gahito ca kaṭaggaho”.
tika-abh06t:8480: Saddhaṃ sīlaṃ sutaṃ cāgaṃ, paññaṃ paṇḍitajātiko;
tika-abh06t:8498: Te sabbepi ca mayhampi, vijjanti anupāyino;
tika-abh06t:8502: Dullabhāpi ca me laddhā, saddhā sugatasāsane.
tika-abh06t:8516: Paññā vatthusabhāve ca, tikhiṇā mama vattati.
tika-abh06t:8530: Virāgo ca nirodho ca, cāgo mutti anālayo;
tika-abh06t:8579: Jātā puna marissanti, evaṃdhammā hi pāṇino.
tika-abh06t:8582: Abbhuṭṭhitova so yāti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattati.
tika-abh06t:8584: Sattā maranti gabbhepi, jāyamānā ca dārakā;
tika-abh06t:8609: Assāsepi avissaṭṭhe, jīvikā ce kathāva kā.
tika-abh06t:8626: Niccaṃ maccuvasaṃ yanto, vissaṭṭho kimahaṃ care.
tika-abh06t:8651: Kesā lomā nakhā dantā, taco maṃsaṃ nahāru ca;
tika-abh06t:8652: Aṭṭhi ca miñja vakkaṃ ca, hadayaṃ yakanaṃ tathā.
tika-abh06t:8702: Hitvā appaguṇe tattha, gaṇhaṃ suppaguṇaṃ budho;
tika-abh06t:8729: Sukhumā nipuṇā tikkhā, paripakkā bale ṭhitā;
tika-abh06t:8747: Pañcannaṃ na ṭhapetabbaṃ, heṭṭhā na dasatopari;
tika-abh06t:8756: Puthulaṃ vātha dīghaṃ vā, maṇḍalaṃ vātha vitthataṃ;
tika-abh06t:8762: Nimitte ṭhapayaṃ cittaṃ, tato pāpeti appanaṃ;
tika-abh06t:8792: Thūle te eva saṅkhāre, sametuṃ paribhāvayaṃ;
tika-abh06t:8845: Buddhaṃ dhammañca saṅghaṃ puthunanamahitaṃ suddhasīlaṃ sudānaṃ,
tika-abh06t:8855: Appamaññā tu bhāvento, vineyya paṭighaṃ kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t:8980: Sabbe sattā ca pāṇā ca, bhūtā jīvā ca puggalā;
tika-abh06t:8987: Modantu suhitā sabbe, mā kiñci pāpamāgamā.
tika-abh06t:9001: Mettāya mitte majjhatte, verike ca yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:9002: Karonto sīmasambhedaṃ, attani ca samaṃ phare.
tika-abh06t:9014: Bahukesu ca sattesu, sabbesu ca pavattati.
tika-abh06t:9036: Te tattha kaṭukaṃ ghoramanubhontā sakaṃ phalaṃ;
tika-abh06t:9051: Iti disvāna sutvā vā, sambhāvetvāna vā puna;
tika-abh06t:9098: Iti disvāna sutvā vā, sambhāvetvā punappunaṃ;
tika-abh06t:9133: Kassa vā ruciyā honti, sukhitā vātha dukkhitā.
tika-abh06t:9136: Na sakkā parivattetuṃ, aññena puna kenaci.
tika-abh06t:9147: Ahaṃ ko nāma ke cete, kimaṭṭhānabudhantaro;
tika-abh06t:9150: Sukhitā hontu vā mā vā, dukkhā muccantu vā na vā;
tika-abh06t:9151: Samiddhā vā daliddā vā, kā mamettha vicāraṇā.
tika-abh06t:9154: Palibodho papañco vā, byāpādo vā na me tahiṃ.
tika-abh06t:9197: Mātāva dahare putte, gilāne yobbane ṭhite;
tika-abh06t:9204: Sukhaṃ supati suttopi, pāpaṃ kiñci na passati.
tika-abh06t:9212: Phullaṃva kamalaṃ kāle, candaṃva vimalaṃ jano;
tika-abh06t:9230: Avañjhā tassa pabbajjā, yassa hetāsu gāravo;
tika-abh06t:9246: Appamaññā tato tāsu, na pamajjeyya paṇḍito.
tika-abh06t:9320: Saṅkhepena ca vitthārā, sambhārā ca salakkhaṇā;
tika-abh06t:9321: Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, catudhā vibhaje kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t:9359: Āyu usmā ca viññāṇaṃ, yadā kāyaṃ jahantimaṃ;
tika-abh06t:9388: Nibbindanto tato rūpe, tadākāre ca gocare;
tika-abh06t:9394: Na taṃ manasi karoti, nāvajjati na pekkhati;
tika-abh06t:9425: Eko bahi anissāya, taṃ taṃ nissāya cāparo.
tika-abh06t:9431: Aṅgabhedaṃ panetāsaṃ, na kathenti tathāpi ca.
tika-abh06t:9466: Tathā mānusakaṃ rūpaṃ, thūlaṃ sukhuma santikaṃ.
tika-abh06t:9468: Dūre pakāsaṃ channañca, yena passanti yogino;
tika-abh06t:9486: Punadeva ca vuṭṭhāya, parikammaṃ yathā pure;
tika-abh06t:9532: Tividhā ca samāpatti, nirodhā ca tathāparā;
tika-abh06t:9572: Tattha tattha vibhūtattā, ṭhānato bheditā kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t:9617: Aniccā ca pabhaṅgū ca, palujjanti cavanti ca.
tika-abh06t:9619: Addhuvā ca asārā ca, vibhavā ca vināsino;
tika-abh06t:9628: Jāyanti parihānāya, na tu jāyanti vuddhiyā;
tika-abh06t:9632: Hutvā antaradhāyanti, na tu katthaci sañcitā.
tika-abh06t:9635: Nirodhadhammā jāyanti, jātā byanti bhavanti te.
tika-abh06t:9637: Yathā nadī pabbateyyā, yathā dīpasikhā tathā;
tika-abh06t:9640: Jātā jātā nirujjhanti, aññe aññe tu jāyare;
tika-abh06t:9647: Rogā gaṇḍā ca sallā ca, aghato ca upaddavā.
tika-abh06t:9659: Jegucchā paṭikūlā ca, bībhacchā ca virūpino;
tika-abh06t:9663: Kapaṇā duggatā dīnā, vipannā ca vighātino.
tika-abh06t:9671: Jāyamānā ca jiyyantā, miyyantā ca khaṇe khaṇe;
tika-abh06t:9710: Na kiñcettha apekkhitvā, samaggā honti paccayā;
tika-abh06t:9711: Na janetuṃ na sakkonti, samaggā ca kudācanaṃ.
tika-abh06t:9714: Rakkhitā vā vidhātā vā, natthi assāmikā tathā.
tika-abh06t:9719: Rittā tucchā ca suññā ca, vivittā sāravajjitā;
tika-abh06t:9722: Jāyamānā ca jiyyantā, miyyamānā ca saṅkhatā;
tika-abh06t:9723: Vivasā parivattanti, vaso tesaṃ na katthaci.
tika-abh06t:9725: Na tesu kassacisseraṃ, na tesañcatthi katthaci;
tika-abh06t:9755: Jāyamānā ca jiyyantā, miyyamānā ca saṅkhatā;
tika-abh06t:9756: Taṃ taṃ bhāvamatikkamma, pavattanti khaṇe khaṇe.
tika-abh06t:9767: Nimitte ca pavatte ca, vatthuto yanti saṅgahaṃ;
tika-abh06t:9779: Niccā dhuvā ce saṅkhārā, kasmā pekkhanti paccaye;
tika-abh06t:9780: Ahutvā yadi nissāya, jātā kā tattha niccatā;
tika-abh06t:9810: Saṅkhāre dukkhato disvā, hitvāna paṇidhiṃ tahiṃ.
tika-abh06t:9816: Nimitte ca pavatte ca, upaṭṭhāti anattato.
tika-abh06t:9839: Tathā hi paccayārabbha, saṅkhārā nissayanti ce;
tika-abh06t:9848: Aniccā puna saṅkhārā, dukkhāti ca vavatthitā;
tika-abh06t:9881: Iccāniccānimittā ca, nirodhā ca khayā vayā;
tika-abh06t:9944: Bhaṅge ñāṇaṃ bhaye ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇamādīnavepi ca.
tika-abh06t:9984: Niccā ce na nirujjheyyuṃ, na bādheyyuṃ sukhā yadi;
tika-abh06t:9985: Vase vatteyyumattā ce, tadabhāvā na tādisā.
tika-abh06t:9993: Kālena sammase rūpaṃ, nāmaṃ kālena sammase;
tika-abh06t:10000: Sūpaṭṭhanti ca saṅkhārā, vodāyati ca bhāvanā.
tika-abh06t:10061: Obhāso pīti passaddhi, adhimokkho ca paggaho;
tika-abh06t:10077: Maggo visuddhiyā nāma, visuddhā ca vipassanā.
tika-abh06t:10101: Udayamhā vimuccitvā, bhaṅge ṭhāti yathā kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t:10118: Ātape viya ussāvo, parissāve jalaṃ viya;
tika-abh06t:10127: Jāyantāpi ca jiyyantā, miyyantā ca nirantaraṃ;
tika-abh06t:10190: Leṇaṃ tāṇaṃ patiṭṭhā vā, saraṇaṃ vā na vijjati.
tika-abh06t:10234: Mīnāva kumīne baddhā, pañjare viya pakkhino;
tika-abh06t:10237: Paṅke sanno mahānāgo, cando rāhumukhaṃ gato;
tika-abh06t:10258: Aggiṃ viya ca samphuṭṭha-masuciṃ gahitaṃ viya;
tika-abh06t:10277: Gandhaṃ viya ca pisento, pisitaṃyeva sādhukaṃ.
tika-abh06t:10288: Aniccā vata saṅkhārā, niccāti gahitā pure;
tika-abh06t:10291: Aniccā dukkhānattā ca, saṅkhatā puna sabbathā;
tika-abh06t:10297: Ahaṃ mamanti vohāro, paro vātha parassa vā;
tika-abh06t:10298: Attā vā attanīyaṃ vā, vatthuto natthi katthaci.
tika-abh06t:10300: Yathāpi aṅgasambhārā, hoti saddo ratho iti;
tika-abh06t:10301: Evaṃ khandhesu santesu, hoti sattoti sammuti.
tika-abh06t:10303: Tattha kappenti attānaṃ, bālā dummedhino janā;
tika-abh06t:10304: Ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā, passato natthi kiñcanaṃ.
tika-abh06t:10306: Sukhito dukkhito vātha, puggalo nāma katthaci;
tika-abh06t:10309: Jāyamānā ca jiyyantā, miyyamānā ca saṅkhatā;
tika-abh06t:10310: Attāva dukkhitā hete, na tu dukkhāya kassaci.
tika-abh06t:10312: Dukkhameva hi sambhoti, dukkhaṃ tiṭṭhati veti ca;
tika-abh06t:10313: Nāññatra dukkhā sambhoti, nāññaṃ dukkhā nirujjhati.
tika-abh06t:10318: Aniccā hontu saṅkhārā, dukkhitā vā mamettha kiṃ;
tika-abh06t:10321: Iti disvā yathābhūtaṃ, yāva bhaṅgā tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:10336: Na pasārīyatī cittaṃ, na tu sajjati bajjhati;
tika-abh06t:10345: Añjasaṃ maggamuḷhova, dīpaṃ viya ca aṇṇave.
tika-abh06t:10354: Pakkhīva nipphalaṃ rukkhaṃ, hitvā vuṭṭhāti saṅkhatā.
tika-abh06t:10384: Vuṭṭhānaṃ ubhato tasmā, khandhato ca kilesato.
tika-abh06t:10386: Dve tathā tīṇi vā honti, phalāni ca tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:10390: Hīne kilese sese ca, paccavekkhati vā na vā.
tika-abh06t:10393: Tato paraṃ pariggayha, nāmarūpaṃ yathā pure.
tika-abh06t:10415: Pariññā ca pahānañca, sacchikiriyā ca bhāvanā;
tika-abh06t:10418: Taṃ sabbaṃ maggakālamhi, karissati tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:10425: Paraṃ klesā na jāyanti, daḍḍhabījaṅkuraṃ yathā.
tika-abh06t:10428: Maggova maggaṃ bhāveti, jāyamānotha vā puna.
tika-abh06t:10442: Maggo eva hi niyyāti, sesā tassopakārakā;
tika-abh06t:10448: Katvānābhinivesaṃ tu, yattha tattha yathā tathā;
tika-abh06t:10451: Yato kutoci vuṭṭhānaṃ, yadi hoti aniccato;
tika-abh06t:10458: Saṅkhāre dukkhato disvā, vuṭṭhahanto sa puggalo.
tika-abh06t:10472: Arūpato ca maggena, āneñjena ca rūpato;
tika-abh06t:10481: Tasmā saddhā ca paññā ca, vatthunicchayalakkhaṇā;
tika-abh06t:10504: Sakiṃdeva imaṃ lokaṃ, āgantvā puna puggalo;
tika-abh06t:10510: Anāgāmī ca tatiyo, catuttho arahāti ca;
tika-abh06t:10511: Itthaṃ phalaṭṭhā cattāro, maggaṭṭhā ca tatopare.
tika-abh06t:10514: Cattāro ca yugā honti, aṭṭha cāriyapuggalā.
tika-abh06t:10526: Paṭibhāne ca bhāsanti, ñāṇaṃ bhedagataṃ budhā.
tika-abh06t:10535: Yo vohāro sabhāvena, sā niruttīti sammatā.
tika-abh06t:10599: Visuṃ visuṃ vibhattāti, vibhāgettha tidhā matā.
tika-abh06t:10650: Tesaṃ dāni pavakkhāmi, vibhāgaṃ tu yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:10740: Dutiyaṃ takkato hīnaṃ, tatiyaṃ tu vicārato;
tika-abh06t:10758: Cattāri pañcakāneva, maggesu ca phalesu ca;
tika-abh06t:10774: Kāmesu catupaññāsa, rūpesu dasa pañca ca;
tika-abh06t:10787: Pāpaṃ natthi kriyāpāpā, na vijjanti anuttare.
tika-abh06t:10793: Chattiṃsa tesaṃ pākāni, kriyā vīsa na cobhayaṃ.
tika-abh06t:10808: Bhavaṅgaṃ cuti sandhīti, cittaṃ cuddasadhā ṭhitaṃ.
tika-abh06t:10810: Āvajjanādayo dve dve, yugā satta yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:10825: Aṭṭhasaṭṭhi tathā dve ca, navaṭṭha dve yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:10850: Āruppe pana sabbampi, rūpāyattaṃ na vijjati.
tika-abh06t:10852: Asaññīnaṃ tu sabbāni, cittāneva na labbhare;
tika-abh06t:10864: Datvā tihetukaṃ sandhiṃ, kāme sugatiyaṃ pana;
tika-abh06t:10868: Datvā dvihetukaṃ sandhiṃ, kāme sugatiyaṃ tathā.
tika-abh06t:10920: Majjhe bhavaṅgaṃ chinditvā, vīthi nāma pavattati.
tika-abh06t:10944: Na sambhoti tadālambaṃ, sopi moghoti vuccati.
tika-abh06t:10977: Pañcamaṃ vā catutthaṃ vā, javanaṃ hoti appanā.
tika-abh06t:10985: Pañca vāre cha vā satta, parittajavanaṃ bhave;
tika-abh06t:10991: Sakiṃ dve vā nirodhassa, samāpattikkhaṇe pana;
tika-abh06t:11014: Sattāpi vīthicittāni, kāme rūpe cha sambhavā;
tika-abh06t:11072: Phalamhā cuddasevāhu, maggamhā tu sakaṃ phalaṃ;
tika-abh06t:11079: Tettiṃsa pana nissāya, hadayaṃ mānasā siyuṃ.
tika-abh06t:11088: Nissāya hadayaṃ honti, arūpe nissayaṃ vinā.
tika-abh06t:11103: Chasu dvāresu jāyanti, dasa muttā ca vīthiyā.
tika-abh06t:11111: Chattiṃsa tayekatiṃsa, dasa ceva naveti ca;
tika-abh06t:11159: Cha sabbatthāpi hontīti, sattadhā mānasā ṭhitā.
tika-abh06t:11167: Ajjhattā ca bahiddhā ca, pañcadvāresu gocarā;
tika-abh06t:11183: Ante cuti bhave majjhe, bhavaṅgampi pavattatīti.
tika-abh06t:11190: Cittānaṃ pana sabbesaṃ, kamato saṅgahaṃ kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t:11198: Chaḷete devalokā ca, mānavāti ca sattadhā;
tika-abh06t:11210: Vehapphalā asaññī ca, suddhāvāsā ca pañcadhā;
tika-abh06t:11213: Avihā ca atappā ca, sudassā ca sudassino;
tika-abh06t:11234: Tatiyamhi catutthaṃ tu, catutthamhi ca pañcamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:11235: Āruppā ca kameneva, āruppe honti sandhiyo.
tika-abh06t:11244: Bhāvetvā tividhā honti, tīsu bhūmīsu yogino.
tika-abh06t:11274: Na ciraṭṭhāyino tattha, lokiyāpi ca yogino.
tika-abh06t:11277: Pabbajjāyañca bhumme ca, brahmattepi ca tiṭṭhare.
tika-abh06t:11312: Kappeko dve ca cattāro, aṭṭha kappā ca soḷasa.
tika-abh06t:11317: Kappasahassaṃ dve cattāri, aṭṭha soḷasa cakkamā;
tika-abh06t:11338: Vinipātāsure ceva, mānave ca tayopi ca.
tika-abh06t:11347: Ñatvā viññū vibhāveyya, tattha cittāni sambhavāti.
tika-abh06t:11387: Catudhā tividhā ceva, ekadhāti ca bhedato.
tika-abh06t:11396: Cattārekādasa dve dve, satta tevīsa cuddasa.
tika-abh06t:11416: Ekūnasattati rūpe, suddhe paññāsa pañca ca;
tika-abh06t:11441: Maggaṭṭhānaṃ sako maggo, natthaññaṃ kiñci sabbathā.
tika-abh06t:11455: Sattavīsa ca tevīsa, tevīsa ca yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:11459: Ariyā ceva aṭṭhāti, dvādasannaṃ vasā siyuṃ.
tika-abh06t:11464: Chabbīsa cuddasevātha, terasa dve ca mānasā;
tika-abh06t:11465: Dasa sattādhikā ceva, puna sattādhikā dasāti.
tika-abh06t:11486: Tasmā tesaṃ na vattanti, tāni cittāni sabbathā;
tika-abh06t:11487: Maggaṭṭhānaṃ tu maggova, nāññaṃ sambhoti kiñcipi.
tika-abh06t:11496: Natthi sahetukā pākā, duggatattā hi sandhiyā.
tika-abh06t:11505: Sattapāpapahīnā ca, tasmā natthettha tāni ca.
tika-abh06t:11528: Ñeyyā cetasi sambhūtā, dhammā cetasikā kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t:11530: Phasso ca vedanā saññā, cetanekaggatā tathā;
tika-abh06t:11533: Vitakko ca vicāro ca, pīti ca vīriyaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:11534: Chando ca adhimokkho ca, cha pakiṇṇakanāmakā.
tika-abh06t:11540: Alobho ca adoso ca, paññā majjhattatāpi ca.
tika-abh06t:11546: Kammaññatā ca pāguñña-tā ca ujukatāti ca.
tika-abh06t:11566: Cittena saddhi aṭṭhannaṃ, vippayogo na katthaci.
tika-abh06t:11604: Lobho ca lobhamūlesu, diṭṭhiyuttesu diṭṭhi ca;
tika-abh06t:11607: Dosamūlesu doso ca, issā macchariyaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:11613: Māno ca thinamiddhañca, saha vātha visuṃ na vā;
tika-abh06t:11620: Satta sādhāraṇā ceva, cha dhammā ca pakiṇṇakā;
tika-abh06t:11638: Vitakkaṃ dutiye hitvā, vicārañca tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:11650: Vitakkaṃ dutiye hitvā, vicārañca tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:11651: Pītiṃ hitvā catutthe ca, pañcamepi ca sabbathā.
tika-abh06t:11659: Viratī appamaññā ca, gahetvā pana sabbaso;
tika-abh06t:11660: Ekamekaṃ gahetvā ca, paccakkhāya ca sabbathā.
tika-abh06t:11662: Kāmesu sattadhā puññe, catudhā ca kriye tathā;
tika-abh06t:11669: Ñatvā yojeyya medhāvī, sāvajjesu ca saṅgahaṃ.
tika-abh06t:11671: Satta sādhāraṇā ceva, cha dhammā ca pakiṇṇakā;
tika-abh06t:11680: Paṭighe ca vinā pītiṃ, asaṅkhāre tatheva te;
tika-abh06t:11686: Chandaṃ pītiñca uddhacce, hitvā pañcadaseva te;
tika-abh06t:11687: Hitvā vimokkhaṃ kaṅkhañca, gahetvā kaṅkhite tathā.
tika-abh06t:11692: Hitvā chāniyate dhamme, gahetvā ca yathārahaṃ;
tika-abh06t:11701: Voṭṭhabbe ca vinā pītiṃ, vīriyaṃ sukhatīraṇe;
tika-abh06t:11710: Iti cetasike dhamme, cittesu gaṇite puna;
tika-abh06t:11711: Cittena saha saṅgayha, gaṇeyyāpi ca paṇḍito.
tika-abh06t:11713: Aṭṭhatiṃsāti ye vuttā, cittena saha te puna;
tika-abh06t:11716: Bāvīsevaṃ dasa dve ca, pañca ceti yathārahaṃ;
tika-abh06t:11719: Vitakko ca vicāro ca, pīti paññā tathā pana;
tika-abh06t:11729: Na calanti dasa aññe, cuddasā cha ca sambhavāti.
tika-abh06t:11741: Ekadhā chabbidhā ceva, catudhā sattadhā ṭhitā;
tika-abh06t:11745: Sattasataṃ dasa dve ca, sabbe honti samissitā.
tika-abh06t:11772: Tisataṃ navuti dve ca, bhinnā honti pakiṇṇakā.
tika-abh06t:11793: Catudhā diṭṭhimāno ca, catudhā diṭṭhiyo visuṃ.
tika-abh06t:11820: Kusalañca kriyā ceti, bheditaṃ duvidhampi ca.
tika-abh06t:11822: Taṃ dvayampi sammissetvā, pañcābhiññā ca lokiyā;
tika-abh06t:11842: Yuganandhā ca samathā, tathā yevāpanāti ca.
tika-abh06t:11844: Phasso ca vedanā saññā, cetanā cittameva ca;
tika-abh06t:11847: Vitakko ca vicāro ca, pīti cekaggatā tathā;
tika-abh06t:11850: Saddhindriyañca vīriyaṃ, sati ceva samādhi ca;
tika-abh06t:11851: Paññā catubbidhā vuttā, mano pañcāpi vedanā.
tika-abh06t:11868: Tattha jīvitarūpañca, aṭṭhettha na tu gayhare;
tika-abh06t:11872: Sammāsati samādhi ca, micchādiṭṭhi ca dhammato.
tika-abh06t:11875: Sammāmicchāti saṅkappo, vāyāmo ca samādhi ca.
tika-abh06t:11903: Chando ca adhimokkho ca, tatramajjhattatā tathā;
tika-abh06t:11906: Māno ca thinamiddhañca, issā macchariyaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:11910: Tato ca sesā sabbepi, niyatāti pakittitā.
tika-abh06t:11912: Keci rāsiṃ na bhajanti, keci cāniyatā yato;
tika-abh06t:11931: Vedanā tīsu vīriyaṃ, sati ca caturāsikā;
tika-abh06t:11932: Samādhi chasu paññā ca, sattaṭṭhānesu dīpitā.
tika-abh06t:11945: Saññā ca cetanā ceva, bhinnā chadhā ca sattadhā.
tika-abh06t:11954: Indriyāni ca bāvīsa, dhammato pana soḷasa.
tika-abh06t:11956: Nava maggaṅgadhammā ca, bhinnā dvādasadhāpi te;
tika-abh06t:11959: Dasa kammapathā dhammā, chaḷeva pana desitā;
tika-abh06t:11962: Paññā dasavidhā tattha, vedanā navadhā ṭhitā;
tika-abh06t:11963: Samādhi sattadhā hoti, vīriyaṃ pana pañcadhā.
tika-abh06t:11965: Sati bhinnā catudhāva, vitakko tividho mato;
tika-abh06t:11968: Sesā dvattiṃsa sabbepi, dhammā ekekadhāpi ca;
tika-abh06t:11971: Phasso ca cetanā saññā, vicāro pīti jīvitaṃ;
tika-abh06t:11977: Cittaṃ manindriyaṃ cittaṃ, saddhā saddhindriyaṃ balaṃ;
tika-abh06t:11978: Balesu lokiyā vuttā, lokiye ca dukadvaye.
tika-abh06t:11992: Catudhā sati tattheva, vīriyampi ca pañcadhā.
tika-abh06t:11994: Samādhi sattadhā vutto, jhānaṅgesu ca tattha ca;
tika-abh06t:12001: Tepaññāseva dhammā ca, aṭṭhārasa ca rāsayo.
tika-abh06t:12041: Dhammā pana samatiṃsa, tattha honti sarūpato.
tika-abh06t:12046: Tattha dvādasa dhammā ca, desitā savibhattikā;
tika-abh06t:12050: Sattavīsa ca satteko, dvekeko ca yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t:12055: Tattha cāniyate sabbe, gahetvā ca pahāya ca;
tika-abh06t:12071: Appamaññā ca hitvātha, mahāpāke ca yojaye.
tika-abh06t:12074: Pañcame appamaññāya, hitvā rūpe ca yojaye.
tika-abh06t:12116: Yojanānayabhedo ca, tasmā tattha na vijjati.
tika-abh06t:12118: Māno ca thinamiddhañca, issā macchariyaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:12128: Dve dvāvīsaṃ tayo ceva, nava cātha yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t:12160: Vitakko ca vicāro ca, adhikā jhānarāsiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:12165: Adhikā hasite honti, pīti ca vīriyādayo;
tika-abh06t:12187: Aṭṭhārasa ca satteko, eko cekova pāpake.
tika-abh06t:12189: Dve yevāpanakā honti, rāsayo ca catubbidhā;
tika-abh06t:12223: Magge ca tulyapākattā, phale ca niyatā siyuṃ.
tika-abh06t:12226: Lokiye labbhamānāpi, visuṃ ceva siyuṃ na vā.
tika-abh06t:12228: Pāpā labbhanti pāpesu, satta chakkekakā kamā;
tika-abh06t:12250: Tettiṃsa ceva dvattiṃsa, ekatiṃsa ca tiṃsa ca;
tika-abh06t:12256: Itthaṃ cuddasadhā bhinnā, koṭṭhāsā tu sarūpato;
tika-abh06t:12257: Vibhattā tehi yuttā ca, cittuppādā yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t:12268: Nava dve dve tatheko ca, yevāpanakasaṅgahā.
tika-abh06t:12271: Dve dve dve tīṇi cekaṃ dve, aṭṭha dasa yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t:12277: Catudhā dvīsu catūsu, catūsu dvīsu caṭṭhitā.
tika-abh06t:12283: Tehi yuttā panaṭṭhātha, vīsa dve dve tikekakā.
tika-abh06t:12298: Navadhā anavajjesu, tehi yuttā ca mānasā.
tika-abh06t:12301: Tevīsa kamato satta, dve ca pañcadasāpare.
tika-abh06t:12303: Dve ca dve tikadve dvekā, sāvajjesu ca soḷasa;
tika-abh06t:12322: Tattha sukhā ca dukkhā ca, adukkhamasukhāti ca;
tika-abh06t:12329: Somanassaṃ domanassaṃ, iti nāmaṃ labhanti na.
tika-abh06t:12331: Aññattha pana sabbattha, sukhā dukkhā ca vedanā;
tika-abh06t:12332: Somanassaṃ domanassaṃ, iti nāmaṃ labhanti ca.
tika-abh06t:12346: Sukhayuttā tu tesaṭṭhi, dukkhayuttā tayo tahiṃ;
tika-abh06t:12368: Dasa pañcādhikā honti, bhūmibhedā tato tahiṃ;
tika-abh06t:12372: Voṭṭhabbane ca hasite, hetu nāma na vijjati.
tika-abh06t:12437: Avitakke pakatiyā, tasmā jhānaṃ na vijjati;
tika-abh06t:12447: Tehi yuttā ca viññeyyā, cittuppādā yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t:12459: Itthaṃ jhānānaṃ bhedena, pañcadhā mānasā ṭhitā.
tika-abh06t:12474: Ekañca soḷasa ceti, chabbidhā tattha saṅgaho.
tika-abh06t:12479: Lokiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, tathā kāme tihetukaṃ;
tika-abh06t:12482: Sesaṃ mahaggataṃ jhānaṃ, sampayuttā ca diṭṭhiyā;
tika-abh06t:12503: Itthaṃ pañca cha satta cha-koṭṭhāsā kamato ṭhitā;
tika-abh06t:12511: Khandhādayo ca koṭṭhāsā, uddiṭṭhā hi yathārahaṃ.
tika-abh06t:12538: Khandhā ṭhapetvā nibbānaṃ, natthi paṇṇatti tīsupi.
tika-abh06t:12540: Āhārādi ca koṭṭhāsā, pubbe vuttanayāva te;
tika-abh06t:12544: Ye sāvajjāva tesampi, saṅgaho dāni niyyate.
tika-abh06t:12547: Cattāro āsavā vuttā, tayo dhammā sarūpato.
tika-abh06t:12554: Kāmabbhavo ca paṭigho, māno diṭṭhi ca saṃsayo;
tika-abh06t:12564: Dasa saṃyojanā vuttā, sutte satta sarūpato.
tika-abh06t:12566: Ganthā dhammā ca cattāro, tayo dhammā sarūpato;
tika-abh06t:12575: Dhammā nivaraṇā nāma, chadhā ca pana desitā;
tika-abh06t:12590: Dasete tu samānāva, parato ca sarūpato.
tika-abh06t:12592: Kāmarāgo ca paṭigho, māno diṭṭhi ca saṃsayo;
tika-abh06t:12594: 620. Gāhā ca palibodhā ca, papañcā ceva maññanā.
tika-abh06t:12595: Taṇhā māno ca diṭṭhi ca, diṭṭhi taṇhā ca nissayā.
tika-abh06t:12601: Saṃyojanā kilesā ca, daseva parato ṭhitā.
tika-abh06t:12616: Avijjā sattasu vuttā, paṭigho pana pañcasu.
tika-abh06t:12618: Māno ca vicikicchā ca, catuṭṭhānesu uddhaṭo;
tika-abh06t:12619: Tīsu dvīsu ca thīnanti, aṭṭhete savibhattikā.
tika-abh06t:12631: Subhaṃ sukhaṃ niccamattā, iti dvādasadhā ṭhitā.
tika-abh06t:12633: Tattha kāye vedanāsu, citte dhammesu cakkamā;
tika-abh06t:12648: Chando ca vīriyaṃ cittaṃ, vīmaṃsāti ca tādinā;
tika-abh06t:12651: Saddhindriyañca vīriyaṃ, sati ceva samādhi ca;
tika-abh06t:12655: Iti bhinnā vibhattā ca, duvidhāpi mahesinā.
tika-abh06t:12658: Passaddhi ca samādhi ca, upekkhāti ca tādinā.
tika-abh06t:12664: Sammāsati samādhī ca, maggo aṭṭhaṅgiko mato.
tika-abh06t:12669: Navadhā vīriyaṃ vuttaṃ, chasu rāsīsu pañcasu;
tika-abh06t:12672: Pañcasveva tu paññā ca, samādhi caturāsiko;
tika-abh06t:12688: Apathā ca sucaritā, tathā duccaritāpi ca.
tika-abh06t:12702: Pathavāpo ca tejo ca, vāyo ceti catubbidho;
tika-abh06t:12755: Rūpaṃ nibhāso bhūtānaṃ, saddo nigghosanaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:12756: Gandho ca gandhanaṃ tattha, raso ca rasanīyatā.
tika-abh06t:12767: Taṃ dvayaṃ panupādinne, kāye sabbattha labbhati;
tika-abh06t:12807: Lahū mudu ca kammaññaṃ, yadā rūpaṃ pavattati.
tika-abh06t:12822: Tadāyaṃ santatākārā, jāti gayhati tassa tu.
tika-abh06t:12839: Yena lakkhīyati rūpaṃ, bhinnākāraṃ khaṇe khaṇe;
tika-abh06t:12856: Bhūtattayaṃ tu phoṭṭhabbaṃ, katvā chabbīsadhāpi ca;
tika-abh06t:12881: Pasādā visayā ceva, pañcakā dvepi sambhavā;
tika-abh06t:12884: Yadedaṃ pana sabbampi, rūpaṃ sappaṭighaṃ mataṃ;
tika-abh06t:12893: Pasādā ceva viññatti, dvārarūpaṃ tu sattadhā;
tika-abh06t:12899: Vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā, bhūtarūpanti aṭṭhadhā;
tika-abh06t:12918: Na vatthu tassa sesaṃ tu, sattavīsatividhaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t:12933: Kiñci sārammaṇaṃ nāma, na gayhatīti sabbathā.
tika-abh06t:12935: Upādā ajjhattikaṃ rūpaṃ, upādā bāhiraṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:12941: Diṭṭhaṃ rūpaṃ sutaṃ saddo, gandhādi tividhaṃ mutaṃ;
tika-abh06t:12945: Aṭṭhārasekakaṃ pañca, catukkanti ca taṃ tathā.
tika-abh06t:12947: Dvārañca hoti vatthu ca, na vatthu dvārameva tu;
tika-abh06t:12948: Na dvāraṃ vatthumevātha, nobhayanti ca niddise.
tika-abh06t:12959: Saddo cittotujo tasmā, rūpamekaṃ dvijaṃ mataṃ;
tika-abh06t:12977: Jāti jarā ca maraṇaṃ, na kutocipi jāyati;
tika-abh06t:12992: Kammaṃ janeti rūpāni, attajāni khaṇe khaṇe;
tika-abh06t:12998: Sandhiyampi kammajaṃ tu, pavattepi ca sambhavā;
tika-abh06t:12999: Janeti rūpaṃ sesāni, pavatte, na tu sandhiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:13002: Janeti rūpaṃ matake, bāhire tu yathārahaṃ.
tika-abh06t:13004: Iti kammādayo rūpaṃ, janenti ca yathāsakaṃ;
tika-abh06t:13005: Sesānampi ca rūpānaṃ, paccayā honti sambhavā.
tika-abh06t:13018: Nava cha caturo dve ca, kalāpā ekavīsati.
tika-abh06t:13041: Suddhaṭṭhakaṃ tu paṭhamaṃ, saddena navakaṃ bhave;
tika-abh06t:13063: Jātimekañca katvā vā, vinātha hadayaṃ tahiṃ.
tika-abh06t:13066: Vatthurūpaṃ na niddiṭṭhaṃ, paṭṭhāne desitaṃ tu taṃ.
tika-abh06t:13077: Bhāvaddasakamekaṃ vā, katvā vatthuṃ vinā tathā.
tika-abh06t:13080: Suddhaṭṭhakā ca satteva, kammajā dasakāni ca.
tika-abh06t:13086: Catukkā ca tikadvikā, ekakā ca yathārahaṃ.
tika-abh06t:13088: Dve satta nava cha tayo, tayopi ca yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:13156: Vuttā cettāvatā tesaṃ, uppādo dāni niyyate.
tika-abh06t:13226: Dve satta ca nava pañca, tayo ceko yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:13243: Bhuttāhāro ṭhitippatto, mātarā ca sayampi ca;
tika-abh06t:13271: Kalāpā tattha labbhanti, dve ca rūpāni uddise.
tika-abh06t:13277: Rūpāni ca kalāpā ca, sabbepi ca pavattiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t:13282: Dasakesveva gahitaṃ, visuṃ kāme na labbhati;
tika-abh06t:13286: Ādikāle na labbhanti, pacchā labbhanti kecipi.
tika-abh06t:13292: Asaññibhūmiyaṃ pubbe, vuttāpi ca na labbhare.
tika-abh06t:13297: Tasmā tevīsa rūpāni, kalāpā pana cuddasa;
tika-abh06t:13320: Duvidhā missitā ceti, bhavanti ca catubbidhā.
tika-abh06t:13340: Chakkena saddhiṃ viññeyyā, tasmā tattha cha saṅgahā.
tika-abh06t:13343: Aṭṭhako rāsi tattheko, tasmā santati vuccati.
tika-abh06t:13361: Dandhaṃ hi vattikaṃ rūpaṃ, nāmaṃ tu lahuvattikaṃ.
tika-abh06t:13363: Tathā hi rūpe tiṭṭhante, cittuppādā tu soḷasa;
tika-abh06t:13364: Uppajjitvā pavattitvā, bhijjanti ca lahuṃ lahuṃ.
tika-abh06t:13378: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe jātaṃ, tasmā rūpaṃ tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:13381: Tassa ṭhitikkhaṇe jātaṃ, rūpampi ca tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:13384: Tassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe jātaṃ, rūpampi ca tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t:13394: Eko jāyati eko ca, bhijjatīti ca sabbathā.
tika-abh06t:13408: Taṃ nayaṃ paṭibāhitvā, cittena saha bhijjati;
tika-abh06t:13415: Rūpaṃ janeti tatthāpi, utu bhaṅgakkhaṇepi ca.
tika-abh06t:13424: Ghaṭikā saha labbhanti, tasmā sattaraseva te.
tika-abh06t:13430: Dhammānaṃ yamake vuttā, iti pāḷi vadanti ca.
tika-abh06t:13433: Iti vatvā pure vuttaṃ, icchantācariyā nayaṃ.
tika-abh06t:13436: Rūpāni ca kalāpā ca, ekābaddhā yathārahaṃ.
tika-abh06t:13441: Āyukkhayā ca maraṇaṃ, tathā kammakkhayā siyā;
tika-abh06t:13456: Utusambhavarūpaṃ tu, avasissati vā na vā.
tika-abh06t:13492: Appamaññā ca saññā ca, vavatthāruppakāti ca.
tika-abh06t:13503: Aṭṭheva pāḷiyaṃ hitvā, ante tu kasiṇadvayaṃ.
tika-abh06t:13511: Buddhe dhamme ca saṅghe ca, sīle cāge ca attanā;
tika-abh06t:13530: Disvā sutvā phusitvā vā, parikammaṃ tu kubbato.
tika-abh06t:13532: Uggaho nāma sambhoti, nimittaṃ tattha yuñjato;
tika-abh06t:13535: Sādhu sattā sukhī hontu, dukkhā muccantu pāṇino;
tika-abh06t:13536: Aho sattā sukhappattā, hontu yadicchakāti ca.
tika-abh06t:13553: Ekā dasekā dasa ca, tayo pañceti sabbathā;
tika-abh06t:13566: Pañcamaṃ vā catutthaṃ vā, javanaṃ hoti appanā.
tika-abh06t:13587: Yathāsakaṃ phalānaṃ tu, maggā honti niyāmatā.
tika-abh06t:13624: Natthettha koci attā vā, satto jīvo ca puggalo.
tika-abh06t:13626: Yathāpi aṅgasambhārā, hoti saddo ratho iti;
tika-abh06t:13627: Evaṃ khandhesu santesu, hoti sattoti sammuti.
tika-abh06t:13653: Cha vatthūni ca nissāya, cha dvārārammaṇāni ca;
tika-abh06t:13659: Avijjāpaccayā honti, saṅkhārā tu tato tathā;
tika-abh06t:13662: Phasso ca vedanā taṇhā, upādānaṃ bhavo tato;
tika-abh06t:13742: Patvā kalāpato tāva, sammaseyya tato paraṃ.
tika-abh06t:13756: Aniccā te khayaṭṭhena, khandhā dukkhā bhayaṭṭhato;
tika-abh06t:13766: Samudayā nirodhā ca, pañcannaṃ dassitā tathā.
tika-abh06t:13787: Obhāso pīti passaddhi, adhimokkho ca paggaho;
tika-abh06t:13788: Sukhaṃ ñāṇamupaṭṭhānaṃ, upekkhā ca nikanti ca.
tika-abh06t:13821: Patante ca vayante ca, bhijjanticceva saṅkhate;
tika-abh06t:13830: Niccā ce na nirujjheyya, na bādheyya sukhā yadi;
tika-abh06t:13831: Vase vatteyya attā ce, tadabhāvā na te tathā.
tika-abh06t:13839: Aniccā dukkhānattā ca, saṅkhārāva na cāparo;
tika-abh06t:13840: Attā vā attanīyaṃ vā, nāhaṃ na tu mamāti ca.
tika-abh06t:13852: Tīradassīva sakuṇo, yāva pāraṃ na passati.
tika-abh06t:13865: Vuṭṭhānagāminī nāma, yadā hoti tadā pana.
tika-abh06t:13868: Maggo tato phalaṃ hoti, bhavaṅgā paccavekkhaṇā.
tika-abh06t:13873: Catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ vātha, chaṭṭhaṃ vāpi yathārahaṃ;
tika-abh06t:13876: Tato phalāni tīṇi dve, ekaṃ vātha yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t:13885: Hīne kilese sese ca, paccavekkhati vā na vā.
tika-abh06t:13887: Tato ca puna saṅkhāre, vipassanto yathā pure;
tika-abh06t:13903: Sakimeva imaṃ lokaṃ, āgantvā hoti mānusaṃ.
tika-abh06t:13912: Dvidhāpi catudhā yuggā, aṭṭha honti vibhāgato.
tika-abh06t:13946: Maggo ca parijānāti, dukkhaṃ tebhūmakaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:13965: Aggamaggo pajahati, klese sese ca sabbathā.
tika-abh06t:14003: Cittaṃ cetasikaṃ rūpaṃ, nibbānampi ca bhājitaṃ;
tika-abh06t:14007: Duvidhā hoti paññatti, atthapaññatti tattha ca.
tika-abh06t:14015: Atthā hi paramatthatthā, paññattatthāti ca dvidhā;
tika-abh06t:14027: Yena vuccati taṃ nāmaṃ, paññapetīti vuccati;
tika-abh06t:14028: Paññattīti ca sā nāmapaññattīti tato matā.
tika-abh06t:14030: Saṅkhā samaññā paññatti, vohāroti ca bhājitā;
tika-abh06t:14052: Nayaṃ gahetvā etthāpi, paññatti duvidhā katā.
tika-abh06t:14084: Tasmā saṃsāramāpanno, satto nāma sa puggalo;
tika-abh06t:14087: Svāyaṃ khandhādito satto, aññoti ca na vuccati;
tika-abh06t:14090: Khandhā khandhānamevāyaṃ, sattoti ca na vuccati;
tika-abh06t:14099: Mato jāto ca na sveva, khandhabhedopacārato;
tika-abh06t:14141: Bālo yo so ca me attā,
tika-abh06t:14158: Tadaññe pana bālā ca, titthiyāpi akovidā;
tika-abh06t:14187: Catudhā tividhā vātha, cintanā tattha icchitā.
tika-abh06t:14226: Vibhattā nāmapaññatti, chabbidhā hoti tattha hi.
tika-abh06t:14235: Tevijjo chaḷabhiñño ca, sīlavā paññavāpi ca.
tika-abh06t:14250: Paññatti duvidhā ceti, ñeyyatthā chabbidhā matāti.
tika-abh06t:14297: Cakkhu sotañca ghānañca, jivhā kāyo pabhā ravo;
tika-abh06t:14298: Gandho rasojā itthī ca, pumā vatthu ca jīvitaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14300: Khaṃ jāti jaratā bhaṅgo, rūpassa lahutā tathā;
tika-abh06t:14307: Bhāvadvayaṃ tu kāyaṃva, byāpi no sahavuttikaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14313: Rūpanibbatti pāko ca, bhedo ceva yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14315: Lahutādittayaṃ taṃ hi, rūpānaṃ kamato siyā;
tika-abh06t:14328: Vatthunā vatthu tāneva, dvārā viññattibhī saha.
tika-abh06t:14334: Vināpaṃ ādito yāva, rasā thūlaṃ na cetaraṃ.
tika-abh06t:14339: Aṭṭhārasādito rūpā, nipphannaṃ tu na cetaraṃ;
tika-abh06t:14340: Phoṭṭhabbamāpavajjaṃ tu, bhūtaṃ kāme na cetaraṃ.
tika-abh06t:14343: Vaṇṇaṃ taditaraṃ thūlaṃ, sukhumañceti taṃ tidhā.
tika-abh06t:14348: Diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutañcāpi, viññātaṃ vata cetasā;
tika-abh06t:14349: Ekamekañca pañcāpi, vīsati ca kamā siyuṃ.
tika-abh06t:14352: Vatthu dvārañca sesāni, vatthu dvārañca no siyā.
tika-abh06t:14361: Ñeyyā pavatti rūpassa, piṇḍānañca vasā kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14363: Kammajaṃ sendriyaṃ vatthu, viññatti cittajā ravo;
tika-abh06t:14366: Aṭṭhakaṃ jāti cākāso, catujā jaratā khayaṃ;
tika-abh06t:14367: Kutoci neva jātaṃ tappākabhedaṃ hi taṃ dvayaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14370: Lakkhaṇābhāvato tassā, sati tasmiṃ na niṭṭhiti.
tika-abh06t:14372: Kammacittānalannehi, piṇḍā nava ca satta ca;
tika-abh06t:14373: Cattāro dve ca viññeyyā, sajīve dve ajīvake.
tika-abh06t:14376: Cakkhādī pañca dasakā, kalāpā nava kammajā.
tika-abh06t:14382: Cittajā iti viññeyyā, kalāpā satta vā cha vā.
tika-abh06t:14388: Satta cattāri dve ceti, kalāpā vīsatī dvibhi.
tika-abh06t:14390: Tayaṭṭhakā ca cattāro, navakā dasakā nava;
tika-abh06t:14391: Tayo dveko ca ekena, dasa dvīhi ca tīhi ca.
tika-abh06t:14399: Yena santappanaṃ yena, jīraṇaṃ dahanaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t:14409: Dvijā dvattiṃsa koṭṭhāsā, sesā eva catubbhavā.
tika-abh06t:14414: Dvijesu manatejehi, dve dve honti panaṭṭhakā;
tika-abh06t:14430: Dasakā navakā ceva, aṭṭhakā ca siyuṃ kamā.
tika-abh06t:14436: Ṭhiti na pāṭhe cittassa, na bhaṅge rūpasambhavo.
tika-abh06t:14439: Atthīti ce pabandhena, ṭhiti tattha pavuccati.
tika-abh06t:14449: Tato parañca kammaggicittajā te ca piṇḍikā;
tika-abh06t:14450: Aṭṭhakā ca duve pubbe, vuttavuttakkhaṇe vade.
tika-abh06t:14458: Bhaṅgā sattarasuppāde, jāyate kammajaṃ na taṃ;
tika-abh06t:14459: Taduddhaṃ jāyate tasmā, takkhayā maraṇaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t:14471: Yuttiyā idha viññeyyā, pañca vā caturopi vā.
tika-abh06t:14477: Pañca cha utucittehi, pañca chāsaññinaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t:14489: Atha vā tehi viññeyyaṃ, dasakaṃ navakaṭṭhakaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14501: Kāyikaṃ mānasaṃ dukkhaṃ, sukhopekkhā ca vedanā;
tika-abh06t:14504: Yathā tathā vā saññāṇaṃ, saññā satinibandhanaṃ;
tika-abh06t:14512: Saddhā sati hirottappaṃ, cāgo mettā mati puna;
tika-abh06t:14518: Lobho doso ca moho ca, diṭṭhi uddhaccameva ca;
tika-abh06t:14521: Māno issā ca maccheraṃ, kukkuccaṃ thinamiddhakaṃ;
tika-abh06t:14524: Byāpāro cetanā phasso, phusanaṃ saraṇaṃ tahiṃ;
tika-abh06t:14528: Vīriyaṃ pīnanā pīti, chando tu kattukāmatā.
tika-abh06t:14535: Alaggo ca acaṇḍikkaṃ, cāgo mettā mati pana;
tika-abh06t:14570: Kāme rūpe ca sesā cha-cattālīsa tidhātujā.
tika-abh06t:14573: Dayādī pañca mānādī, cha yevāpana soḷasa.
tika-abh06t:14582: Pīti ekaggatā ceti, satta vittittayena ve.
tika-abh06t:14618: Diṭṭhi dosena te ganthā, ganthato diṭṭhiha dvidhā.
tika-abh06t:14635: Dudhādiṭṭhi tidhā lobhaṃ, bhitvā sutte dasīritā.
tika-abh06t:14640: Diṭṭhi eva parāmāso, ñeyyo evaṃ samāsato;
tika-abh06t:14651: Aṭṭha pañca cattāri ca, cattāri kamato kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14662: Etesvekamayaṃ hutvā, vatthuṃ nissāya vā na vā;
tika-abh06t:14672: Pacchā paccati pākānaṃ, pavatte aṭṭhake duve.
tika-abh06t:14674: Tesuyeva nihīnaṃ tu, datvā sandhiṃ duhetukaṃ;
tika-abh06t:14675: Deti dvādasa pāke ca, pavatte dhīyutaṃ vinā.
tika-abh06t:14717: Pāpaṃ kāmikamevekaṃ, hetuto taṃ dvidhā puna;
tika-abh06t:14730: Nissāya vā na vā honti, vadhādisahitā kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14736: Paccate gocaraṃ tassa, sakalaṃ amalaṃ vinā.
tika-abh06t:14742: Ahetū pañca ñāṇāni, gahaṇaṃ tīraṇā ubho.
tika-abh06t:14766: Hitvā mokkhamukhaṃ taṃ hi, dvidhā magge tidhā phale.
tika-abh06t:14777: Vuttiyā na phale pupphaṃ, yathā chinnalatā phalaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14780: Na phale vattamānampi, moghapupphaṃ phalaṃ yathā.
tika-abh06t:14795: Tadālambaṃ tato tamhā, cuti hoti javehi vā.
tika-abh06t:14804: Tajjaṃ vatthuṃ sahuppannaṃ, nissāya vā na vā tahiṃ.
tika-abh06t:14806: Tajjā sandhi siyā hitvā, antarattaṃ bhavantare;
tika-abh06t:14807: Antarattaṃ vinā dūre, paṭisandhi kathaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t:14812: Nāsaññā cavamānassa, nimittaṃ na cutī ca yaṃ;
tika-abh06t:14824: Pañcadvāre siyā sandhi, vinā kammaṃ dvigocare;
tika-abh06t:14827: Tamevante cuti tasmiṃ, gocare cavanena tu;
tika-abh06t:14839: Santīraṇaṃ tato tamhā, voṭṭhabbañca sakiṃ tato;
tika-abh06t:14843: Javā mahante voṭṭhabbā, paritte nitare manaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14845: Voṭṭhabbassa paritte tu, dvattikkhattuṃ javo viya;
tika-abh06t:14846: Vadanti vuttiṃ taṃ pāṭhe, anāsevanato na hi.
tika-abh06t:14852: Javokāme vibhūte tu, kāmavhe visaye tato.
tika-abh06t:14854: Kāmīnaṃ tu tadālambaṃ, bhavaṅgaṃ tu tato siyā;
tika-abh06t:14855: Avibhūte paritte ca, bhavaṅgaṃ javato bhave.
tika-abh06t:14861: Viruddhattā bhavaṅgaṃ na, kiṃ siyā sukhasandhino.
tika-abh06t:14870: Ime sandhi bhavaṅgā ca, cuti cekūnavīsati.
tika-abh06t:14872: Dve dve āvajjanādīni, gahaṇantāni tīṇi tu;
tika-abh06t:14898: Tidhā chanava caṭṭha ca, tinavā ca yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14900: Dvipañca cittaṃ viññāṇaṃ, tisso hi manodhātuyo;
tika-abh06t:14907: Sesaṃ chārammaṇaṃ taṃ hi, tecattālīsa saṅkhyato.
tika-abh06t:14925: Sesā cuddasa bhinnāvacuti sandhi na tīṇipi.
tika-abh06t:14934: Tayaṃ mutaṃ manodhātuttayaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ.
tika-abh06t:14936: Diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ ñātaṃ, sābhiññaṃ sesakāmikaṃ;
tika-abh06t:14949: Tettiṃsa ca bhavantete, rūpesu pana puññato.
tika-abh06t:14952: Āruppapuññato te ca, sako pāko sayaṃ puna.
tika-abh06t:14966: Sakaṃ sakaṃ paṭicchaṃ tu, viññāṇehi dvipañcahi;
tika-abh06t:14978: Kāme javā bhavaṅgā ca, kāmarūpe sayampi vā;
tika-abh06t:14984: Te ca pākā sayañcante, phalaṃ majjhā mahaggatā;
tika-abh06t:14985: Kriyāti vīsati honti, sesadvīhi dukehi tu.
tika-abh06t:14990: Atha sātakriyā sātaṃ, sesaṃ sesakriyāpi ca;
tika-abh06t:14999: Dvīhi kāmajavā tīhi, rūpārūpā catūhi tu;
tika-abh06t:15000: Maggā chahi phalādi dve, sesā dve pana sattahi.
tika-abh06t:15015: Ñeyyā sesāni cattāri, bhavaṅgena ca labbhare.
tika-abh06t:15024: Hāsāvajje jave rūpe, aṭṭhachakkehi tehi tu.
tika-abh06t:15048: Rūpe javāti bāvīsa, dvijā sesā tidhātujā.
tika-abh06t:15056: Dosahīnajavā so so, pāko rūpe anāriye;
tika-abh06t:15071: Tike ca tatiye ekaṃ, dve honti dutiyattike.
tika-abh06t:15105: Dve balāni ahetvantadvaye tīṇi tu saṃsaye;
tika-abh06t:15109: Abalāni hi sesāni, vīriyantaṃ balaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t:15114: Tatiye sāmale tīṇi, cattāri dutiye tathā;
tika-abh06t:15115: Kāme nippītike cāpi, pañcaṅgāni hi sesake.
tika-abh06t:15132: Kriyato vā tadālambaṃ, sopekkhāya sukhī na hi;
tika-abh06t:15146: Ete pītādhikā hāse, vāyāmena ca dvādhikā;
tika-abh06t:15169: Matiṃ pītiṃ matippītiṃ, hitvā te kamato siyuṃ.
tika-abh06t:15172: Tatthetā niyatā vittiṃ, vade sabbattha sambhavā.
tika-abh06t:15188: Ye vuttā ettakā ettha, iti cetasikākhilā;
tika-abh06t:15210: Lobho aṭṭhasu cittesu, thinamiddhaṃ tu pañcasu.
tika-abh06t:15212: Māno catūsu diṭṭhi ca, tathā dvīsu manesu hi;
tika-abh06t:15213: Doso issā ca maccheraṃ, kukkuccañca bhavantime.
tika-abh06t:15222: Kadalī māyā viññeyyā, khandhānaṃ tu yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t:15228: Tatthādī dukkhavatthuttā, dukkhā bhārā ca khādakā.
tika-abh06t:15241: Abhāvassa hi kummānaṃ, lomasseva na vācatā.
tika-abh06t:15243: Khayoti vuccate maggo, tappāpattā idaṃ khayaṃ;
tika-abh06t:15256: To rūpaṃ natthi attādivatthūti ca vavatthape.
tika-abh06t:15262: Yanti yuttā yathā evaṃ, nāmarūpavhayā kriyā.
tika-abh06t:15264: Na nāmarūpato añño, attādi iti dassanaṃ;
tika-abh06t:15270: Sadā sabbattha sabbesaṃ, sadisaṃ na yato tato;
tika-abh06t:15273: Evaṃ tīrayate kaṅkhā, yāya paññāya paccaye;
tika-abh06t:15274: Diṭṭhattā suddhi sā kaṅkhātaraṇaṃ iti vuccati.
tika-abh06t:15312: Sati pītādhimokkho ca, nikanti ca dasīritā.
tika-abh06t:15318: Na maggo gāhavatthuttā, tesaṃ iti vipassati.
tika-abh06t:15330: Bbayādī ghaṭamānassa, nava honti panettha hi.
tika-abh06t:15339: Bhaṅgeva tiṭṭhate ñāṇaṃ, tadā bhaṅgamatī siyā.
tika-abh06t:15341: Evaṃ passayato bhaṅgaṃ, tibhavo khāyate yadā;
tika-abh06t:15342: Sīhādiva bhayaṃ hutvā, siyā laddhā bhayikkhaṇā.
tika-abh06t:15348: Mati yadā tadā laddhā, siyā nibbidapassanā.
tika-abh06t:15351: Jālādīhi ca macchādī, tadā laddhā cajjamati.
tika-abh06t:15360: Catudhā chabbidhā cāpi, bahudhā passato bhusaṃ.
tika-abh06t:15368: Na passe yāva sā tīraṃ, sāmuddasakuṇī yathā.
tika-abh06t:15376: Aniccato hi vuṭṭhānaṃ, yadi yassāsi yogino;
tika-abh06t:15379: Dukkhatonattato tañce, siyā honti kamena te;
tika-abh06t:15397: Te sabbe aṭṭhamokkhānaṃ, lābhī ce chasu majjhasu;
tika-abh06t:15400: Anulomāni cattāri, tīṇi dve vā bhavanti hi;
tika-abh06t:15413: Phalāni ekaṃ dve tīṇi, tato vuttamatikkamā.
tika-abh06t:15431: Na labbhālātacakkaṃva, taṃ hi rūpādayo vinā.
tika-abh06t:15433: Tena tena pakārena, rūpādiṃ na vihāya tu;
tika-abh06t:15436: Labbhate parikappena, yato taṃ na musā tato;
tika-abh06t:15442: Pathavādi viyekopi, puggalo na yato tato;
tika-abh06t:15445: Etaṃ visayato katvā, saṅkhādīhi padehi tu;
tika-abh06t:15449: Kāyaṃ paññatti ce suṭṭhu, vadato suṇa saccato.
tika-abh06t:15463: Vibhāgaṃ ñāpanatthaṃ hi, tathuddeso katoti ce;
tika-abh06t:15476: Iti sā nāmapaññatti, dutiyāti ca kittitā.
